Xue Baochai Gosh, things get so awkward and hostile here at Daguanyuan every time there's any mention of him.
Xue Baochai Well, I guess it's fortunate that he won't be coming after me once the competition begins.
Outis ... And why is that?
Xue Baochai Because I'm simply too charming and adorable to kill outright, of course.
Outis …….
Xue Baochai Besides... whatever big brother Qiu's goals are... they probably have nothing to do with the Xue family.
Hong Lu Mm, I can see that.
Xue Baochai …….
Baochai took a step toward Hong Lu and leaned in close to his face.
Xue Baochai Do you smell my fragrance still, Baoyu?
Hong Lu You have never reeked, big sister Baochai.
Xue Baochai …….
Xue Baochai Baoyu, I've always been, and will always be, residing at Ginger-plant Court Hengwuyuan. Promise to pay me a visit before you leave.
With that, she gracefully walked out of the room.
Hong Lu Well, how about we also start heading back? This place can get pretty dark around Hai hour(亥時).
Heathcliff You... why'd you leave...?
Hong Lu Ha ha, she's just a childhood friend. I call her ‘big sis’ since she’s older than me... it’s just something we do here when one friend’s a bit older.
Hong Lu She's also one of the very few in Daguanyuan who was nice to me.
Dante <... So where should we head to next?>
Rodion Good question. Just going by the scale of everything in here… it should be safe to expect something real ritzy, right?
Hong Lu You’re my guests, so you should be able to stay at my building within Daguanyuan.
Hong Lu It's within walking distance from here. We should be there in no time, even on foot.
Episode: 8
Location: Daguanyuan - Yihongyuan
Hong Lu Ta-da, here we are~
Ishmael That was a pretty long walk. Still technically within walking distance, but...
Hong Lu Hehe, this place is called Joyous Red Court Yihongyuan(怡紅院).
Hong Lu This room was made from the most aromatic flower tree within H Corp. Try taking a deep breath, and…
Hong Lu … you can smell the lovely fragrance of flower aroma, pervading, spreading from the very tip of your nose. It's unique to this building.
Yi Sang Very much so. It is an unseen and invisible thing, yet it retains much of its pleasant redolence.
Dante <This place is huge, too… You’ve been living here alone all along?>
Hong Lu Yes. I was told to stay in a larger room, but I preferred this place more.
Xiren It has been long, young master. Xiren reporting.
Dante <Oh hey, is she—?>
Hong Lu Have you been well, Xiren?
Xiren Yes. I am as I always have been.
Xiren watched us emotionlessly as our rowdy crowd poured into the yard. Her expression did not change even when she saw Hong Lu, who presumably hadn't been home in quite some time.
Xiren Are they young master’s guests? I will guide them to their room. Please follow me.
Hong Lu Now that we're here, I’ve got to pay a visit somewhere. I’ll be back soon, though.
Don Quixote To where wilt thou journey? Allow us to accompany thee—
Hong Lu Ahaha, it's okay.
Hong Lu Just on my way to say hello and pay my respects to the elders, so it’ll be better if I go there alone.
Xiren ... This way.
Location: Daguanyuan - Yihongyuan Interior
Ishmael Well, I guess I could say this about every operation, but...
Ishmael ... the weight of our mission doesn't really sink in until we're actually there.
Sinclair You're talking about the Family Hierarch war... right?
Ishmael Yeah. The other candidates have been preparing for this for years, while we have… what, an overnight?
Rodion I dunno, I’m a procrastinate-until-the-last-minute kinda gal, so I’m pretty sure we got a handle on this.
Meursault This is not the first instance in which we are demanded to work through a task in an unfavorable, inequitable situation.
Outis Why does it matter? Our goal...
Outis ... isn't to claim the throne of the Family Hierarch anyway.
A few hours ago...
Location: Palanquin Interior, A Few Hours Ago
Saude Well, isn't it such a relief that our goal isn’t to come first place in the Family Hierarch war?
Don Quixote Dost thou meanest to say that we needn't be the first?!
Saude ... Yeah? Obviously? Why would we want a Sinner to become the head of H Corp.?
Outis Would it not provide a much more reliable means of control to plant an individual of this company at the highest seat of a Wing, instead of letting an unaffiliated individual assume it?
Saude There's a lot more going on behind the scenes, guys... besides, LCB still has much left to do as the LCB.
Faust …….
Gregor Then… would I be right to assume that this isn't a winner-take-all kinda situation here? Do other candidates get something for participating, too?
Hong Lu Anyone who places within the top ten will gain the right to take one item of their choice from the family treasury. Of course, the one who places the highest goes first~
Saude But we're going to have to come in at least second place in order to ensure that we obtain the item we're looking for.
Heathcliff Now that’s weirdly insulting. Sod it, why don’t we just shoot for the top anyway?
Saude Your confidence seems to have gone through the roof since our last operation together.
Gregor Well... we did go through a lot of crazy stuff.
Saude Anyways... care to guess what's deep inside Hongyuan's gargantuan treasury?
Ishmael The Golden Bough.
Saude Right on~ Buried in the middle of all kinds of other treasures, along with any knowledge of its true value.
Location: Daguanyuan - Yihongyuan Interior
Outis So... Faust. What did manager Saude share with you as our strategy for the first round?
Yi Sang I very much wish to know that as well, for the suggestion of mutual understanding seemed to exist exclusively betwixt miss Faust and Saude.
Faust The first round of the Family Hierarch Evaluation... tests what the descendants have prepared and brought for the elders of Hongyuan.
Dante <What the descendants have prepared, huh... So this must be what Jia Xichun's been referring to this whole time...>
Faust Yes. To be free from aging and death—immortality.
Faust Each candidate is to present an answer before the judge to demonstrate their idea of true immortality.
Dante <Right, so… what’s the answer to true immortality, then...?>
Faust Not even Faust can answer that.
Outis Then what are we even doing here...?
Faust But we may be able to demonstrate a facsimile of immortality—or, at least pretend as though we are close to the answer.
Faust Given that they are the ones who are seeking that very answer, they will not disqualify us—Hong Lu, to be exact—from the competition.
Outis I see... They will cling onto whatever clue they can get their hands on, so we'll be using that desperation.
Faust Precisely.
Heathcliff That important lookin' old bat Jia Mu favours him, don’t she? Maybe she’ll give ‘im bonus points or something.
Outis So that's what we'll be using Hong Lu for.
Faust That is...
Hong Lu Yes, you're right. It is my turn to be used.
Sinclair Woaaah! W-when’d you get back!?
Hong Lu nonchalantly chimed into the conversation, having slipped in between us unnoticed.
Dante <Hey, uhm... you're back pretty soon, huh.>
Unfortunately, what Outis just said... could sound quite crass depending on how you cut it.
Dante <Hong Lu, you don’t have to… don’t mind what she just said.>
Hong Lu Hmm~ But why would I mind it?
Hong Lu My use is to be a ticket to participating in the Hierarch war, the only option for obtaining the Golden Bough in H Corp. She didn't say anything wrong.
Dante <Your 'use'...>
Hong Lu Well, if you'll be using me, hopefully this'll lead to an outcome we can all be happy with.
Don Quixote Verily, such outcome would be best; yet... young Xichun hath already exhaled with great gusto out of her nostrils before turning away from our party when our eyes met...
Hong Lu Well... Xichun...
Hong Lu’s eyes twinkled briefly, as though he was shifting into a dream.
Hong Lu … I didn’t think it was possible for me to be friends with Xichun again.
Hong Lu We're back to not being on speaking terms again, but...
Hong Lu … it was as though I'd gone back in time, back to when we were both children.
Hong Lu But we can't go back to the past.
Location: Daguanyuan, Past
Jia Xichun What… did you say?
Jia Xichun Are you drunk or on something? Did you really just say that to me?
Jia Xichun Oh, what a stupid thing of me to ask.
Jia Xichun You’ve never been drunk in your life. Your mind’s always been so, so damn clear.
Jia Xichun None of this matters to you, does it? Even when I get angry at you or when I shout at you like this… none of it gets to you, does it?
Jia Xichun Just… just what happened to you that day? How can someone become so...
Hong Lu Xichun, I...
Jia Xichun Forget it, I don’t care. Do whatever you wanna do. It’s my fault for expecting to have at least one normal sibling in this messed up family.
In that memory, Hong Lu...
... was wearing a quiet smile, even before her hushed anger.
Location: Daguanyuan - Yihongyuan Interior
Dante <But… don’t you want to be friends with her again?>
Hong Lu Mm…
Hong Lu At the end of all things... these connections between people, they're just moments. Ephemeral things.
Hong Lu So what I ‘want’ doesn’t matter.
... Hong Lu.
A Sinner so aloof, so detached that it feels as though he's always floating through the clouds.
I once thought that was just the kind of guy he was. Someone who just happened to be above everything that's happening around us, instead of just another messed-up person with messed-up problems of their own.
But... slowly, and gradually, I had begun to realize that there was something off about him under the surface.
Dante <Hong Lu, about participating in the Family Hierarch war...>
Dante <... do you really not feel anything about it? Have you completely excluded yourself from it?>
Hong Lu I don't, and I have. It's just the way things worked out, right?
Outis Executive Manager, it is true that his value judgment will have no tangible influence on this company's direction.
Faust Faust is in agreement. Sinners do not have the right to refuse their missions.
Yi Sang That may be true, yet...
Yi Sang ... I find it unnecessary to turn away and neglect the suffering conditions of their hearts... stemming from the obligation to their missions.
Hong Lu Conditions of our hearts... But perhaps unnecessarily peering into them is how we beget suffering?
Yi Sang What manner of…
Hong Lu Back then, when I lived here in Daguanyuan…
Hong Lu … so, so many choices passed before my eyes.
Hong Lu Should I kill that child, who was from a different family? Should I even survive? Should I walk past that dying boy, or should I stop to help him?
Hong Lu When they were first presented to me, I tried to make a choice.
Hong Lu But it didn't take that long for me to realize that my choices meant nothing.
Hong Lu So I…
Hong Lu … decided not to choose at all.
Hong Lu And that’s me, as I am now.
Hong Lu There were so many wonderful things about joining Limbus Company, but…
Hong Lu … I think my favorite part of the experience was that I was never given a choice.
Dante <…….>
Ishmael That’s, uh… That’s… definitely... kinda weird…
Hong Lu Oh? Looks like things have gotten weirdly quiet around here.
Faust ... That was enough discussion of private matters. There is much ground for us to cover.
Faust Let us begin by discussing our plan for the first round.
The next morning...
Location: Daguanyuan - Yihongyuan Yard
Dante <There's still some time until we have to leave.>
Yi Sang What... may be the purpose of these... scarecrows? Veiled in nocturnal shadows they were at yesternight.
Hong Lu Oh wow, they're still here~
Hong Lu There are training courts next to every building where children of this place live.
Hong Lu Here, every child of walking, running age all get to play with these dummies.
Ryoshu Play... puff. Early education is important.
Don Quixote Yet how doth one ‘play’ with these dummies? And it appeareth that this dummy is adorned with a most dashing piece of fashion for its head!
Hong Lu Aha, that’s the first dummy I received when I was seven.
Hong Lu Hehe, back then, I thought even dummies could feel pain when struck.
Yi Sang Such was the blissful rumination of all those who were once children...
Rodion So is it like, tradition for kids born here to formally learn how to fight?
Hong Lu Oh, not exactly.
Location: Yihongyuan Yard, Past
??? Woaah! So this is what grandmother gifted you, big bro…?
Hong Lu Yep. I don’t know how it works, though.
Daiyu? It must be a doll or an effigy for dress-up. Oh, perhaps you could adorn it with some trinkets?
??? Maybe it’s got like, a guardian spirit that protects your house, big bro Baoyu!
??? ... Oh boy.
??? Here, lemme show you how it's done.
??? … Why’d you punch grandma’s gift?!
Hong Lu Um... Don't you think you're hurting it?
??? Hurt it...? Really now, this wooden thing?
Location: Daguanyuan - Yihongyuan Yard
Hong Lu It’s more that they have to grow up this way if they want to survive.
Ryoshu ... This W.T.D. isn’t so bad.
Outis Hm… this wooden training dummy appears to have been designed and crafted with some precise engineering craftsmanship. We still have some time until departure, so why don’t we try using them for a warm-up exercise?
Rodion Ack, I don’t wanna get all sweaty, though…
Ishmael Well… it’s not like these things will pose us any danger. I think we can try them out once just to see how we’re doing today.
Outis Atten-tion! We have orders from the Executive Manager! From this moment forth, we will put our all into laying utter ruin unto these training dummies!
Dante <Hey, I didn't even give an order...>
Oh well... it won't hurt to get our blood pumping now.
Outis All forces, charge!
Episode: 9
Location: Daguanyuan - Yihongyuan Yard
Outis Hooah… How refreshing!
Gregor Ooh... I guess morning workouts really do wake you up.
Ishmael We've gotten so used to getting in tussles before we get to the real meat of the missions that... mornings feel incomplete without some action.
Meursault Mm. Nevertheless, this was a meaningful warm-up activity.
Sinclair So I’ve been meaning to ask, Hong Lu. Why did you never consider participating in the Family Hierarch war before?
Sinclair It seems to me that all of your other siblings have been waiting and training all their lives for this event…
Hong Lu ... It's simple.
Hong Lu Because I never once thought I wanted to be the Family Hierarch.
Location: Daguanyuan - Yihongyuan Interior, Past
Lady Wang Is it not… truly, most fortunate?
Lady Wang Had you not been born with the jade, my son… you would have had to toil all your life, preparing for the Family Hierarch war like your other siblings do…
Lady Wang You needn’t waste your strength on those things... to win the favor of the elders and Jia Mu, venerated be their blessings.
Lady Wang Simply... witness as much of the world as it has to offer, jade of our family… my precious son, Baoyu...
Location: Daguanyuan - Yihongyuan Yard
Dante <More memories...>
Yi Sang …….
Dante <What’s wrong, Yi Sang? You seem kinda distraught.>
Yi Sang It is to do with the plan miss Faust had explained to us last night.
Yi Sang I find the plan… rather detestable.
Sinclair Me too...
Sinclair ... B-but… Hong Lu said he’s okay with it, so…
Ishmael Can we even call it a plan, if we’re being honest here?
Meursault It matches the definition of a ‘plan,’ given that it illustrates certain instructions to be followed for the purpose of achieving a defined goal.
Faust And please remember that... there are no second chances in the Family Hierarch war.
Episode: 10
Location: Daguanyuan - Tubitang
Beticent Servant Young Master Baoyu and his twelve companions, arriving at Elevated Virescent-Jade Hall Tubitang(凸碧堂)!
We entered the hall where the first round was to be held. As always, the servant by the gate announced our arrival with the resounding holler we'd grown to expect.
Outis An arena or a stadium, I see... Hm. We have many eyes on us, Executive Manager.
I looked up to see that the audience seats, which were brimming with people, were divided into stair-like terraces; and on the platform at the opposite end of the hall, three shadows of chairs could be seen cast on the obscuring curtain fabric.
As for us... we followed the attendants' guidance and stood next to the other participants at the circular area in the center.
Dante <So, are the evaluations happening past those curtains?>
Hong Lu …….
Hong Lu ... Daiyu?
Dante <Hm? See someone you recognize?>
Hong Lu No. It's nothing, Dante.
Hong Lu Even if we were to meet again… we don't really have anything to talk about anyway.
Hong Lu Maybe we'll have another chance later, if fate wills it.
Ishmael Oh hey, I think it's finally getting started.
The curtain slid open, and the old woman we saw from yesterday's banquet walked out to the platform.
Jia Mu Many scores ago, I ascended to the seat of Jia Mu with a stroke of fortune. Yet, a lifetime has passed since I assumed this great responsibility; such as it is, I seek to abdicate and walk the path of mountains and streams as a river does.
Jia Mu With the seat voided, the responsibility seeks the one with the qualities of the Family Hierarch to fill it.
Jia Mu Thus here at Daguanyuan, a collective upheld by pillars of four great houses of Jia, Xue, Wang, and Shi, we once again ask you the perennial question.
Jia Mu Have you brought us aught to prove that the answer indeed exists?
Jia Zheng …….
Dante <Who's the woman next to her...?>
Hong Lu Ah, she’s my oldest sister, big sis Yuanchun.
Hong Lu She married a very important person in Q Corp. and spends most of her time there… Looks like she's visiting for the event.
Jia Yuanchun ... Though I have resided long in a foreign Nest, I now return fleetingly to share the love with my flesh and blood, to fulfill my duties as observed by the order of filial piety.
Jia Yuanchun I return, that the truth shall be observed to the best of my abilities.
Jia Yuanchun Some of you may have walked a laid path gentle to your feet; yet some of you may have struggled through an unlaid, brutal path of cragged mountains a thousandfold to find your answers.
Jia Yuanchun Yet, regardless of the severity of your suffering... all of you, equally, have but one opportunity for the first round.
Jia Yuanchun Even still, you were all once prospective heirs of the great house; even your failures shall bring power and prosperity to Daguanyuan.
Jia Yuanchun Now, come forth in the order you are summoned, and demonstrate the invaluable answers to the question of three freedoms: one from aging, one from death, and one from brevity of life.
Jia Yuanchun If the nature of your answer be indemonstrable, present ironclad proof.
Jia Yuanchun Lose not, and discard not. Let fresh youth be unending and eternal.
After their respective speeches, Jia Yuanchun and Jia Mu disappeared behind the curtains atop the platform.
Jia Zheng First candidate...
It seemed that Hong Lu's father assumed the role of the host for the first round.
Jia Zheng ... Ren, of the Wang family.
Wang Ren, the first to be summoned, walked up to the platform.
Behind him was his faction, who were dragging someone by a rope toward the platform.
Wang Ren Hurry up! Foolish thing…
Ishmael What… who are they dragging up to the stage?
Outis Whoever it is, they clearly don't want to be here...
Gregor To be free from aging and death, huh...
Gregor I suppose every Wing dreams of escaping and rising beyond the body they were born with. Puff... H Corp.'s pursuit of immortality probably isn't special in that regard.
Don Quixote …!
Don Quixote He...
Don Quixote He hath brought a Bloodbag.
That's when we were finally able to recognize who the candidate dragged up to the stage.
The eyes, unfocused and red; mouth slick with drool dribbling down the mouth guard, meaningless snarling…
That is a mindless Bloodbag.
Yi Sang How does... a Bloodfiend become an answer to immortality?
Faust In laymen's eyes, Bloodfiends may appear to have truly attained freedom from 'aging'...
Faust However, as we are now all aware, Bloodfiends can grow old and weak after a prolonged period of blood deprivation.
Faust Thus, it is unlikely to provide the 'answer' they seek.
After some struggle, the Bloodbag was dragged kicking and growling past the curtains atop the platform.
Stunned Audience So that creature is the fabled... 'Bloodfiend', then?
Suspicious Audience I doubt that'll do the job. Bloodfiends would indeed be quite the esoteric knowledge, but... to the judges of this contest, I doubt they're anything more than lukewarm trivia.
Whispering Audience That Wang kid must’ve been pretty desperate, huh?
??? He's either lazy as balls... or that boy ain't right in the upstairs.
Yi Sang Mm. It appears that the knowledge of Bloodfiends is oddly common amongst this ilk.
Don Quixote Indeed, Bloodfiends are present in every Nest... 'tis little surprise that those privy to arcane knowledge art well aware of their existence.
After a brief moment that lasted less than a minute, Wang Ren and his faction emerged from behind the curtains and descended from the platform.
Jia Zheng Wang Ren, candidate of the Family Hierarch Evaluations. Stand upon the podium and await your judgment.
Then, they ascended the round podium behind the platform as ordered.
Jia Zheng Thus announcing Wang Ren's Results for round 1 of the Family Hierarch Evaluations.
Jia Zheng Elimination.
Wang Ren N-no...!
Wang Ren Listen, all they need is Blood... As long as you supply them with enough blood, they will be eternal and everlasting...! Venerable Jia Mu, please...!
Don Quixote Nay.
Don Quixote What awaits them is no eternity at all.
Don Quixote Verily, I know not the shape of this ‘true immortality’ the evaluation seeketh to attain, yet...
Don Quixote ... the longevity of a Bloodfiend, shackled by blood and endless suffering… is unlikely to be one.
Wang Ren W-what...? But those damn hunters told me they still retain all of their memories...!
Don Quixote … To become a Bloodfiend is to surrender all the desires and emotions that exist within thy being for a singular hunger for blood, and only blood.
Don Quixote Perhaps that is an acceptable condition for those who expect nothing but fathomless torment for the rest of their lives. Yet, for those with much to lose, with much in life they cling onto, as those present seem to…
Don Quixote ... the fate of a Bloodfiend is no 'freedom' from aging and death—'tis but a sanguine shackle to enslave their minds.
Jia Mu A member of Baoyu’s faction has given an excellent reply. No further elaboration is necessary.
Jia Yuanchun And you have failed to bring us a high Kindred, let alone a Bloodfiend at all... This creature is but a miserable Bloodbag. I cannot even well commend your efforts.
Jia Zheng ... Hear, Ren of the Wang family. They have spoken, and mercifully given you the full explanation of your mistake—a privilege that failed candidates do not deserve. Let this be the final blessing of your life.
Wang Ren AAAAAGH!
The podium suddenly opens under their feet, casting Wang Ren and the Bloodbag to its depths with a bloodcurdling screech.
Dante <... So that's what happens when you fail to pass.>
Rodion That’s just… that was just for dramatic effect, right? There’s gotta be like, a side path leading back upstairs, right?
Ryoshu Of course not. Can't you smell the stench of festering pain, rising like heat from the depths?
Rodion Ha ha, Ryōshū… you’ve been honing your sense of humor, huh? These are some pretty nasty jokes, though.
Outis Where does that hole lead? Judging by the time between the drop and the sound of the fall, I presume it goes quite far down.
Hong Lu It... probably leads to a place with lots of old family secrets. Oh, not treasures, of course, but trying to figure that out might get you a visit from a Heishou, probably?
Ishmael ... They went all out with the theatrics, huh.
Gregor Yeah, and we could very well be the ones screaming and falling down the hole later...
The next candidate was summoned before we were even able to shake off the initial shock.
Jia Zheng Second Candidate hails from the Xue family...
We sat through a few more names and subsequent failures.
We couldn't hear what exactly they were talking about beyond the curtains, and unlike the very loud and obvious Bloodbag, the 'answers' other candidates brought were less obvious. So...
... all we had to go on were the shadows of their desperate attempts to explain things before the judges.
Gregor Another one...?
Ryoshu B.A.H. It means "Boring as hell".
The longer we watched the death toll rise, the less shocking they became.
Gregor Are they planning to fail everyone?
Jia Zheng Eighth Candidate, Baochai of the Xue family.
Rodion Oh my, look! We know her~
She was technically our competition, but it seemed that she managed to give the Sinners quite the positive impression with yesterday's brief encounter; some of them were even cheering her on.
We couldn't see exactly what it was that Xue Baochai brought, but...
... she was also holding something as she entered past the curtains.
Jia Zheng ... Baochai, of the Xue family...
After her brief meeting with the judges—which, going by the shadows cast on the curtains, appeared to have gone better than we had expected—she emerged.
And as soon as she did, Baochai immediately turned in our direction. At Hong Lu, to be exact...
Xue Baochai Wah, Baoyu! You were watching me?
... and began excitedly waving her hand.
Jia Zheng ... She passes.
The podium beneath her remained shut.
Yi Sang Passing connection it may have been, yet I ill wish to see a familiar face be claimed by the abyss...
Yi Sang ... thus, I am glad.
Jia Zheng ... Seventeenth candidate, Jia Xichun of the Jia family.
Dante <…!>
Sinclair ... It's Xichun's turn.
She slowly ascended the platform, unaccompanied.
She held in her hands a tightly sealed gourd bottle.
Hong Lu Looks like she found it.
Dante <She found... the water from the river we saw in Don Quixote's memories back then...?>
Outis ... Impossible. She reached Lethe?
Faust The possibility that she actually reached there in person is infinitely minuscule.
Faust There is an infinitesimal statistical possibility that she could have reached the river, yet... not even Faust can conceive how someone of their capabilities could reach the fountainhead of one of the deepest fathoms; this becomes even more impossible when considering the relatively short passage of time since then and now.
Faust A more likely explanation might be that she obtained the waters by collecting its dew or a portion of what has seeped out.
Don Quixote Hmm. Alas, that river's water serveth only to put to slumber one's memories... Pray, doth it truly hold a link to the immortality they seek?
Faust Yes. It is likely closely connected to the 'immortality of the mind' they pursue.
Faust As there are but an extremely small number of people privy to the knowledge of the rivers, if the contents of that bottle are genuine, Faust expects her to pass.
Jia Zheng ... Xichun of the Jia family passes.
Jia Yuanchun You have brought before us a priceless treasure. It must have taken unparalleled efforts to obtain this, given the meager size of your clan.
Jia Xichun ... Thank you, big sister Yuanchun.
As Faust expected, all three judges appeared quite satisfied by what Jia Xichun brought before them.
Episode: 11
Location: Daguanyuan - Tubitang
Jia Zheng Next. Eighteenth candidate...
Heathcliff Bloody hell, just how many people are there in this household...?
Jia Zheng Huan, of the Jia family.
Yi Sang …….
Our first meeting with that man was less than amicable, and I had a strong feeling that another one wasn't going to do anything to improve that. Jia Huan walked up to the platform.
We all fell silent, hearing a familiar name...
Gregor Bastard...
I could feel that some Sinners were growing tense, some of them even gritting their teeth.
And the other man, closely following Jia Huan, holding what looked like the egg of an Abnormality was... also a familiar face. I'd seen him many times in Yi Sang's memories.
Ishmael ... Dante, are you seeing what they're wearing?
Meursault E.G.O gears.
Faust It can be speculated that they have either developed their own method of extraction, or have scavenged them from Lobotomy Corp.
Yi Sang Gubo... carries what appears to be an egg... of an Abnormality.
Gregor ... Are they planning to just offer them an Abnormality egg?
Dante <How's that... an answer to anything?>
Faust While there is room for interpretation...
Faust ... some may present a reasonably argued interpretation that Abnormalities are entities that neighbor immortality.
Outis So the linchpin of their success hinges on which Abnormality's egg that ends up being.
Hong Lu If it's big brother Jia Huan I know... he's never going to risk his life for something he thinks will fail.
Jia Zheng ... Huan of the Jia Family passes the first Evaluation.
Contrary to most of our wishes, Jia Huan managed to pass the first round as well.
Many more candidates came and went. One of them carried a massive, mysterious coffin...
Wang Dawei …….
... one of them brought a thick book, and one of them presented a cage so tiny that we couldn't see what was within.
Some of them managed to pass, while some of them were sent screaming into the mysterious abyss.
As we waited and watched the candidates come and go, people from N Corp., their turn complete, approached us.
Yi Sang Yet early it is for twilight to arrive—thus, early too is this meeting of ours.
As if to prove his own words back at the LCE, that he's come to accept certain things as they are, Yi Sang coolly regarded his old friend who was now working for N Corp.
Gubo You must find this small and barren respite of yours quite enjoyable. I have not seen you jest as you do now since the League fell.
Yi Sang ... For what do you now approach me? The rift is too great betwixt us to chatter on with any affection to speak of.
Gubo Do not mistake my intent, for it wasn't I who desired to approach you. My teammate simply wished to have a look at his brother's face, and I thought I might as well see how you are faring.
Hong Lu Looks like everyone's coming back to Daguanyuan now that the Family Hierarch war's started, brother. This is our first meeting since then, right?
Jia Huan Hah! If it isn't the doltish fool who has eyes but knows not how to see. I know you well enough; you'd normally turn purple with aversion upon hearing even a brief mention of the word Hierarch... So, why are you here?
Jia Huan Who are you and your stinking entourage working for this time?
Jia Huan Is it that Xue girl, blinded by your looks to the revolting rot within? Or... is it Xichun, who still defends you and your meaningless, faux-profound spiel, deluded in her belief that you're still the same boy from her childhood?
Jia Huan ... Why didn't you save him?
Jia Huan No, let me ask you a different question.
Jia Huan Why did you save her... and only her, Jia Baoyu?!
Hong Lu Brother.
Hong Lu Humans die. It's what they're born to do.
Location: Daguanyuan - Tubitang
Beticent Servant The next candidate will be judged soon. Candidates must return to their seats.
Jia Huan Tsk, you're a servant. You're barely even a living thing...
Gubo ... Let us return. This discourse will not bear any fruit.
Outis ... What's this, a reunion party?
Heathcliff Tsk, that sure soured things. Those shameless bastards... It's obvious they're here to nick our things again.
Ishmael Hmm... maybe, but something about them feels different today...
Faust Whichever is the case... the safer option would be to place higher than them.
Sinclair Another one falls...
Sinclair His family has to be watching this, right? I wonder if they'll be okay...
Sinclair mutters, watching another candidate fall down the trapdoor.
Sinclair I can't imagine how anyone would be okay watching their own fall like...
Gregor Sinclair, the people sitting behind us...
Gregor ... they're his parents. The guy who just fell.
Disappointed Audience We raised that failure as our own son? What a pathetic disappointment...
Excited Audience Don't worry... I have faith in our third child. I mean, it's not like we expected anything from this one, right?
Sinclair …….
Sinclair Now I see what it means... to dedicate your whole life to becoming the Family Hierarch.
Hong Lu Many people desperately vie for the seat of Family Hierarch. Of course, some of them, like his parents, hope to...
Hong Lu ... have their friend or a close blood relative become the Family Hierarch instead.
Outis So they seek to seize a lifetime's worth of riches, power, and recognition by planting someone they can control in the Family Hierarch seat, without becoming one themselves.
Ryoshu That kind's got a low shelf life.
Hong Lu Looks like I finally got to know how my long-lost siblings are doing, thanks to this unforeseen opportunity.
Jia Zheng Twenty-seventh candidate, Pan of the Xue family.
Xue Pan …….
Gregor Xue... Pan? Have we heard that name before?
Hong Lu Ah, he's big sis Baochai's older brother.
Xue Pan walked up to the platform, holding what appeared to be a large jar with multiple talismans plastered over it.
Rodion Hey, is it just me, or does that guy look like he's totally up to something?
Ishmael Let's be honest, who here doesn't?
Heathcliff Yeah, but that sod's different. He's...
Instead of ascending to the platform and into the curtains, he walked up to the podium.
Heathcliff ... Mate, looks to me he's completely lost the plot...
Xue Pan …….
Jia Zheng Candidate Xue Pan, you will ascend to the platform and enter the curtain threshold.
Xue Pan Where's the fun in walking down the straightforward road?
Xue Pan It's only right that something so precious and entertaining should be shared with everyone, wouldn't you agree?
Outis …!
He places the jar on the ground...
And from within...
... a desiccated hand emerges.
Ryoshu Pathetic sorcerous trickery.
Ryōshū muttered with palpable distaste.
Dante <Why's he...?>
Rodion What the heck is that?!
Corpses, their desiccated flesh covered in a light, sparse layer of old papers, crawled out of the jar... and began to shamble.
Dante <They're neither Distortions nor Abnormalities...>
Outis ... Their behavior reminds me of Bloodbags or sub-entities enslaved by Abnormalities... Any semblance of consciousness has been stripped from them. They'll attack indiscrimiately.
Outis But it seems that they're just as intent on maiming and killing whatever, whoever they can get their claws on. Executive Manager, we must prepare for battle! Your orders!
??? Gnnnhhhh....
Audience Aaaaghhhhh!
The jar monsters set upon the audience, stuffing the struggling, still-breathing victims into their jars.
Sinclair Why aren't the organizers doing anything? This is still an event hosted by a Wing, isn't it?
Hong Lu Because there isn't a rule in the Family Hierarch war that prohibits bringing harm to other people.
Gregor So they're just gonna sit back and twiddle their thumbs because no one specifically told them to step in? Hah, what the hell...
Rodion W-what do we do now? Should we step in?
Hong Lu We should probably survive and ensure our safe participation in the Family Hierarch war.
Fleeing Candidate Wha-what the hell are these...?!
Stumbling Candidate Get away from me!
As the monsters began to swarm in, some candidates scattered and ran away, while some stood their ground and fought back. Those who did neither were the ones getting slaughtered.
I was simultaneously reminded of Saude and the confident smile she flashed at me as she reassured us that we should be able to pass the first round with little to no trouble.
Dante <Looks like we have no choice but to take them down...>
Episode: 12
Location: Daguanyuan - Tubitang
What remained inside the hall after the battle was devastating.
Many in the audience seats had fled, as the seats that were once brimming with people were only half-filled...
... and the candidate zone down here was littered with bodies of candidates who were mauled to death.
Meanwhile, the jar monsters, having eaten their fill, had already crawled back into the jar.
I looked around and saw some candidates still holding tightly onto the treasures they each had brought to the contest, even as they drew their last breaths.
In midst of all this destruction stood the cause of this chaos, watching the slaughter play out with assured confidence...
Xue Pan Heheh, ha, ahahaha!
Xue Pan How will you attain freedom from aging, how will you argue freedom from death, with minds so dull and bodies so frail?
Xue Pan What say you, judges?!
Xue Pan I present before you not only the clue to immortality, but also a treasure that brings ruin to those who would dare to deceive you! Here is my answer to the perennial question!
Jia Mu ... So you have brought us the clay of the jar.
Jia Yuanchun It can be said that those who failed to survive this do not qualify as Family Hierarch candidates, yes?
Jia Zheng …….
Jia Zheng Pan of the Xue family passes.
Gregor He gets to pass when he almost got everyone in here killed...?
Faust All that matters is that what he has brought meets their standards.
Outis Looks like he managed to get two birds with one stone. He eliminated the distracting rabble from the competition.
Heathcliff If we ever run into that bastard in round 2, you better let me take more than a few swings at 'im.
Jia Zheng Twenty-eighth candidate... Shi Dazhen from the Shi family.
But no one walked up to the platform.
Jia Zheng ... As he has failed to appear... he is eliminated by default.
Jia Zheng called a few more names thereafter, but...
Jia Zheng Twenty-ninth candidate...
Jia Zheng Thirtieth candidate...
Outis ... The number of candidates has clearly been culled.
But none appeared.
Ryoshu Disappointingly M.B.
Sinclair Yeah... all the mediocre bunch got wiped out from that attack...
Ryoshu And the leftovers are exhausted.
Ryōshū looked around as though she was doing some sort of critique.
Ryoshu ... Hah? That lug...
??? …….
Ryoshu That motherfu—
??? Hwell, I'll be... thought you'd gone and vanished into the earth! What the hell you doin' crawlin' 'round out here?
??? Girl! I saw ya givin' me the evil eye, 'least have the decency to say hi, eh?
Dante <Ryō... Ryōshū, that guy's talking to you, right?>
Ryoshu ... Hah.
And in a very, very rare display of raw emotion...
... I realized that she was anxious... and furious.
Sinclair Oh... do you know him?
Heathcliff What an absolute unit... Bloke's got to be at least two metres tall.
Faust ... Do not look at that man, Dante. And everyone, avert your eyes as well.
Faust It is strongly recommended that we do not say a word to him.
??? That's right, ya shrimps. Ya gotta first wrack them teensy' brains o' yours, gotta think real hard 'bout whether you even come close to my rank before runnin' ya mouths, ya hear?
Ryoshu That shithead, Lei Heng... he's a Finger.
Faust The Thumb is a Syndicate with the strictest adherence to rigid hierarchical structure even among the Fingers.
Faust And his placement in the hierarchy is the highest even among their Capos—his rank is immediately beneath the position of a Sottocapo, or underboss.
Faust A small mistake could drag us into a battle we do not want to fight. Please order everyone to not say a word, Dante.
Dante <I don't know what's going on... But I get it. You're saying that we're this close to having another Ricardo hunting us down, right?>
Dante <Yeah, let's avoid that. Do as Faust asks, everyone.>
Lei Heng began stomping his way through the crowd toward us, casually but forcefully shoving anyone in his way to the sides. His gait was blasé and brutish, but I noticed that his eyes were fixed intently on Ryōshū.
It seemed that among the crowd were some people in higher positions as well, but even they either averted their eyes or voluntarily got out of his way.
He marched confidently through the frozen crowd, as though he was familiar with this kind of reception, until a cry rang out from the crowd.
Furious Attendant You there, you big brute! How dare you block young master Nangong Xianhe's view?! I'll have you know that you stand before the retinue of the Nangong family, the house that shall soon be one of the four houses—
Instead of a reply, we heard a blast of gunpowder, then saw the right arm of the man who spoke out catapult into the air.
Furious Attendant AAAAARG—
The scream muffled as Lei Heng forcibly shoved his giant hand down the man's throat. Then, with the sound of wet meat being pulled apart, he ripped the entire length of the man's tongue out through the mouth.
Lei Heng Young master Nangong Xianhe, ain't ya? Ya owe me an arm now. Mighty sorry, but ya shoulda kept a tighter leash on ya boy's jawin'.
The young master of some prestigious house presented his right hand, though it was clear that he was utterly terrified. Lei Heng proceeded to grab his hand and break it off his forearm like snapping a twig.
Lei Heng I went easy on ya, boy. Seein' a friendly face put me in a good mood.
Lei Heng Anyhoo... I don't reckon ya miss the Spider's House? Eh, can't imagine why anybody would. Gives me the heebie-jeebies too, whenever I gotta swing by.
Lei Heng We got some catchin' up to do later. I'll teach ya how to hold your sword real good right like back when.
Lei Heng Weren't mine the best out of 'em all? I thought I taught ya how to make every cut real fuckin' delicious.
Faust Ryōshū, now is not yet the time.
Faust whispered to Ryōshū in a low voice without raising her head.
Ryoshu Shut up for a damn second...
Faust Faust trusts that you still remember the promise made prior to your employment.
Lei Heng Get that stick outta ya behind, kiddo. I ain't here to pick ya up, I sure as hell ain't tryna teach ya a lesson either like back when.
Lei Heng Your baby's still at that house, ain't that right?
... Ryōshū was grabbing the hilt of her sword like she was about to unsheathe it.
The same sword she refused to unsheathe for the duration of our entire journey.
Lei Heng Huh, am I wrong 'bout that? Just hwat in tarnation happened, then? I ain't exactly nose-deep in them fellers' business, ya gotta understand. Guess somethin' sure as hell went down though, didn't it?
Lei Heng Hyahhh~ Now ain't that somethin'. So, ya really fixin' to unsheathe that blade?
Faust ... Miss Ryōshū.
In a quiet but coldly stern voice, Faust calls Ryōshū's name.
Ryoshu …….
Ryōshū...
......♬......
Lei Heng Aw dangit, what in the goshdang... Haah~ My bad, y'all. I really gotta take this. It's the underboss callin', y'all gotta understand.
Lei Heng Awrighty then, I'll meetcha'll later. We can talk about your daddies or shoot some other shit then. Seeya 'round, Yoshihide!
The strange man turns around and stomps his way through the crowd again, his booming voice reverberating across the entire hall as he loudly and boisterously answers the call.
Dante <He's gotta be here for the Family Hierarch war, right?>
Faust The outcome of the Family Hierarch Evaluation determines the immediately foreseeable future of H Corp., which brings parties of varying, possibly clashing interests here.
Ishmael Hey, Heathcliff. Noticed you didn't rush ahead this time. I was worried it was going to be like the time with the Middle.
Heathcliff Tch, I know a thing or two about the Thumb back from my Syndicate days. And about what happened with the Middle—like I said, I had no bloody idea who those things belonged to. Besides, that sod...
Meursault ... Is more powerful and violent than Ricardo, an individual we had encountered in the past.
Yi Sang The Thumb commands its own manner of terror and violence unlike that of the Middle...
As we were all sharing our impressions of Lei Heng, I found Ryōshū frozen in place, in the same position she had been in when Lei Heng walked past her, spacing out.
Ryoshu All the way to the Pinky, huh...
Ryōshū muttered something to herself. As even further chaos was about to overtake the crowd and the candidates...
Jia Zheng Thirty-second candidate, Jia Qiu.
Jia Zheng called upon the next candidate.
And, at the mere mention of the name, the chaos that had swallowed the hall immediately settled into a hushed silence.
Jia Qiu …….
??? …….
??? …….
Jia Qiu walked up to the platform,
unaccompanied by his own faction, but not alone.
Dante <Who are those people next to Jia Qiu...?>
Hong Lu I've never met them before.
Hong Lu ... Ohh~ Then that must mean that they're big brother Jia Qiu's answers to immortality.
Ishmael Who could they possibly be...?
Outis Neither of them appear to be particularly skilled in combat...
Sinclair Yeah, they're both constantly looking around, like they're nervous...
Faust They... are...
Faust Faust believes that they are survivors of the Library.
Dante <Survivors?>
Faust The only ones who survived the impossible, inevitable odds and the insurmountable force...
Faust They're the only survivors who may be able to explain that very force. ... Possibly.
Jia Zheng Candidate Qiu of the Jia family...
Jia Qiu didn't spend much time behind the curtains. He walked out soon after, his steely expression unchanged from when he entered it.
Jia Mu The testimony rings true. They are both survivors of the place that soared beyond a Star of the City... before it vanished.
Jia Yuanchun It is a shame that we were unable to procure ourselves an invitation then.
Jia Zheng He passes.
Jia Qiu's expression did not budge.
Rodion Anxiety's gotta be a foreign concept to that guy.
Jia Zheng Then... that covers all the candidates, it seems.
Jia Zheng With the first round complete, to all four families who have graced this hall—
Hong Lu Excuse me~!
Unlike Jia Qiu, whose appearance plunged the hall into utter stillness, Hong Lu's sudden interjection roused the room to a roaring chaos of confusion once again.
Jia Zheng Baoyu, what...?
Hong Lu I think you might have missed a candidate.
Jia Zheng ... What do you mean? I believe we have covered every candidate present in the list...
Hong Lu You missed me.
Hong Lu Jia Baoyu, of the Jia family, will partake in the Family Hierarch Evaluations.
Episode: 13
Location: Daguanyuan - Tubitang
Gossiping Audience ... Isn't that Jia Baoyu?

Meursault A large portion of the audience is vociferously expressing their collective confusion, wrath, and concern. These emotions are expressed by their jaws that have been opened past a certain degree.
As Meursault observed, I realized that the chaos wasn't restricted to the audiences; the candidates were starting to get agitated, too.
Jia Huan And there he is. The disgusting, duplicitous bastard who brings annihilation to everyone around him with that silly, innocent smile...!

Up close, it was much larger, grander, and more imposing than I thought it'd be.
Jia Mu Enter the fabric threshold.
Location: Tubitang - Atop the Platform
Once we walked past the curtains as instructed, we saw Jia Yuanchun, Jia Mu, and Jia Zheng waiting for us inside.

Hong Lu gave Ryōshū a nod.
Hong Lu Yes. I'm okay.
Ryoshu …….
Location: Daguanyuan - Tubitang
Faust Our "answer" that we may be able to demonstrate before them...
Faust ... is resurrection via Dante's power. To show them that to us, death is but a temporary setback.
Faust And a most dramatic demonstration of that ability would be to...

Ryoshu Clock. Spin it.
Dante <…….>
... And so it turned, in one of the most high-intensity situations I'd ever turned it.
The muscle fibers, the nerves, the flesh that was split, all begin to reconnect like a rewinding videotape...
Dante <Hnngh... huh? Wait, why doesn't this hurt at all?>
Ryōshū's skill with the sword was no joke. I didn't feel even the slightest bit of discomfort.
Dante <I doubt Hong Lu even realized that he was dying...>
Jia Yuanchun Baoyu… I truly realize that it has been a while since we've met.
Jia Yuanchun He has grown quite bold.
Dante <…!>

... Dark shadows had appeared outside the curtains, surrounding us before I even realized what was happening.

Jia Yuanchun The task was to find the answer to freedom from aging and death...
Jia Yuanchun ... not to break a taboo and precipitate the destruction of our home.
Jia Yuanchun ... It has not been long since the family that once led H Corp. was brought to ruin. No Arbiter nor Claw shall ravage a family of Hongyuan again—
Jia Yuanchun appeared ready to command the Heishou to kill us all, but...
Jia Mu …….
Jia Mu silenced her with a wave of her hand.
Jia Mu You will wait.
Jia Yuanchun Venerable Jia Mu...
Jia Yuanchun Once the resurrection is complete, the Head will...
Jia Yuanchun We must end this before they—
Jia Mu Hold but fifteen minutes, at least.
Jia Mu To be rash in judgment is to judge incompletely.
Jia Mu I wish not to lose either—our treasure, and a clue to immortality.
Jia Yuanchun …….
And Hong Lu was whole again.
Hong Lu Ah...

Ryoshu N.P.
Hong Lu Grandmother, big sister Yuanchun.

Jia Yuanchun …….
Jia Yuanchun ... Are we safe?
Jia Mu …….
Jia Mu If aught be owed, a swift vengeance shall arrive in time; it is simply yet to return. (不是不报, 时候未到)
Jia Mu's quiet utterance seems to dissipate the forces that had surrounded us outside the curtains.
Jia Mu Jia Baoyu, in the first round of the Family Hierarch Evaluations...
Jia Mu ... you pass.
Location: Daguanyuan - Tubitang
Jia Zheng ... Baoyu of the Jia family passes.
Gossiping Audience What trickery is this?
Gabbing Audience I thought he was off on some sightseeing tour away from Hongyuan like a jobless rich kid. When'd he even manage to find his own answer?

Jia Zheng Those who passed must prepare for the second round, set to commence tomorrow.
Jia Zheng Remember. The candidates are barred from harming one another between now and the commencement of the second round of the Evaluations.
Jia Zheng This is your one and only rule, thus remember it well: anyone who dare break it shall immediately be disqualified.
Jia Zheng ... That is all.
As soon as Jia Zheng announced the end of the first round, everyone in the audience seats began rushing toward the first floor...
Dante <G-getting mixed up with that crowd's probably not a great idea. Let's get out of here...!>
Faust Indeed. Let us immediately return to Hong Lu's room.
... and we decided to slip out of here before the curious crowd swept us away.
However, as we turned around to leave...
Jia Qiu …….
... stood Jia Qiu in our path.

Zigong I hear that you have passed as well, young master. Congratulations are in order, it seems.

Rodion Well, ya know. Sometimes people get swept up by random surges of ambition.

Dante <... Well, if our last meeting didn't confirm it, it sure seems like they know us well.>

Zigong My lord. Perhaps you have overestimated this young master.

Jia Qiu Are you... still of the belief that inaction is a path without consequences?

Hong Lu Baoyu of the Jia family formally extends his greetings to you.

Hong Lu Speaking of which, did you manage to stitch big brother Yihua and Mr. Qingtao's heads back onto their bodies?
Heathcliff …?
Heathcliff was the first to let out a flabbergasted gasp before the other Sinners followed suit.
Ishmael I guess that's just how siblings of Hongyuan greet each other, huh?
Gregor Seems like Miss Baochai was just a particularly nice exception...

Jia Qiu You have arrived here, unprepared, yet ready to cast yourself into the flames all for the mere reason that your 'turn' had come.

Noticing Jia Qiu's hand tighten around his weapon, Ishmael quickly jumped in.
Ishmael Oh, in case you forgot, there's a rule preventing candidates who passed the first round from killing each other. Hopefully I'm not the only one who remembers that.

Outis Mhm. The reinforcements are standing by at the front gates.
Heathcliff Huh? What reinforceme—
Outis WHICH! is why I am warning you that taking any rash action prior to the start of the second round could result in a pointless skirmish for both of us.
Zigong A loud boast from an illusory army in an empty fortress. Though, I believe that sheer might is hardly the quality one should flaunt.
Outis ... Tch.
Jia Qiu I am not intent on fighting you here.
Jia Qiu Jia Baoyu, you will beget great suffering by endeavoring to embrace beyond your abilities.
Zigong Yet if he still wishes to challenge and be broken, then perhaps that outcome is simply meant to be.

Outis Hmmh...

Xue Baochai Don't forget to say hello and give me a wave if we ever run into each other, okay?
Xue Baochai left us to rejoin her faction, waving sweetly as she did so.
Episode: 14
Location: Daguanyuan - Yihongyuan Interior

Xiren …….

Xiren It will take at least a thousand nights.
Xiren Given what they did to him.

Xiren Young master. It's been years, but young master Jia Ling's body is still decaying.
Xiren He has lost control of over half of his body.

Xiren I was told to relay that your Boluses were useless, young master.
Xiren The decay reached his brain, and I overheard the other servants gossip that it is impossible to recover from such a wound.
Xiren The body is functionally dead. Death would be preferable, in fact.
Xiren So give up your naive hope and forget about him.
Hong Lu …….
Hong Lu You're... always so smart, Xiren.
Location: Daguanyuan - Yihongyuan Interior

As I stood there pondering, Outis walked up to the front with the letter in hand.
Outis ... This is from Manager Saude.
Saude Hello everyone, heard you managed to pass the first round.
Saude I wrote this letter before I heard the news, actually. You wouldn't even be reading this letter if you hadn't passed.
Rodion The heck...?
Saude But let's save the celebrations for later. The real game starts in round 2.
Saude The other candidates must've been making alliances, strategies, sharing information about the next round...
Saude ... meanwhile you guys stumbled around, aimless and alone, before returning to your lodging. And here you are now, reading my letter.

Saude ... because it'll be messy and continuous battle after battle.
Saude So battle on, as you always do.

Saude It's what you do best, right?
Rodion H-hold on...
Saude I would like to go into more detail in this letter, but I'm sure this letter will be—and has been, most likely—intercepted by someone from other candidates' clans or coalitions.
Saude So, in order for you to obtain our objective, you have to rely on what you have learned and gained so far: your intuition and fearlessness.
Saude Like I said earlier, we have but one purpose.
Meursault Contextual clues suggest that the 'one purpose' is implied to be 'come in second place and obtain the Golden Bough'.
Saude Well, that wraps everything up, then. Oh, one last thing...!
Saude Shameless curs who have rested their eyes upon the contents of this letter without authorization shall be struck down with a curse of misfortune that lasts generations upon generations; ne'er shall they ever be successful in any endeavor regardless of nature—
Dante <The bottom part of the letter's been torn off, huh...>
Ishmael What a way to end a letter...
Gregor So... does anybody know what to expect in round 2? That letter really didn't help with anything at all.
Faust ... It would be better to learn the exact rules on-site and hear from the organizers themselves.
Faust It is likely that there are forces who already have their eyes and ears on us.
Outis ... Executive Manager, there is someone by the door.
Heathcliff Right on cue, eh...
Hong Lu Mm~ I don't think that's what this is.
Dante <…!>
Outis Dammit, you! Grab your weapons, prepare for batt—
Despite our rush, the person by the door was none other than Jia Xichun.
She wore an expression that we had grown quite familiar with by now: an interesting combination of annoyance and disappointment.
Jia Xichun Why do I ever expect anything better from you anymore?
Jia Xichun So you're just opening your front door to anyone, without even checking who knocked? Just like that?
Ishmael Uh, I thought you were done talking with—
Rodion Ha ha ha, yeah, we can be pretty heedless from time to time.
Hong Lu Mm~ But I don't think anyone who's intending to kill us would have the decency to stand and hesitate in front of my door wondering if she should knock or not.
Jia Xichun …….
Jia Xichun Earlier, in round 1...
Jia Xichun You had yourself killed in front of Jia Mu and big sister Yuanchun, didn't you?
Jia Xichun And revived yourself in front of them too, I presume...
Hong Lu ... Yeah.
Jia Xichun Why even go that far, huh...?
Jia Xichun What's gotten into you, brother? Family Hierarch, really? Why now, why all of a sudden?
Jia Xichun I can tell, just from that look on your face...
Jia Xichun ... that you couldn't care less about becoming something like the Family Hierarch.
Jia Xichun Is that... really it? That they told you to do it?
Rodion Xichun, imagine, just for the sake of it. What if, juuuuust what if, like, what if... our actual goal isn't to come in first place?
Jia Xichun ... Do you seriously expect me to believe that?
Rodion Ha ha... right? Totally. Heck, I wouldn't buy that either...
Jia Xichun Anyways...
Jia Xichun I'm not here to ally or parlay with you. I am never, ever doing anything like that with you again, brother.
Jia Xichun It'll be nighttime soon, you know.
Jia Xichun And your room's always been so dark because you barely let so much as a ray of moonlight in.
Outis Seems like she's warning us that we'll be visited by some... uninvited guests soon.
Jia Xichun Yeah. No way they're letting you, a sudden, unforeseen variable, spend the night in peace.
Dante <But didn't they warn us earlier that round 2 candidates are prohibited from hurting each other...?>
Outis ... I see. The only thing that matters is the exact wording of the law, not the spirit of it.
Jia Xichun Right. They won't intervene as long as a candidate's not trying to kill a fellow candidate, literally, with their own hands.
Jia Xichun So don't trust anyone, even your maidservants.
Hong Lu …….
Hong Lu Thanks for coming here in person, Xichun.
Jia Xichun Tomorrow, we'll be... we'll really be enemies.
Jia Xichun I know it's too late to change anything... but tomorrow...
Jia Xichun stumbled over her words, trailed off, then turned around and left as though she swallowed what she wanted to say.
Wei …….
Wei When she expressed a wish to visit you herself, I made three attempts to talk her out of it.
Wei It was highly impertinent of someone of my station to advise against her three times, yes, but...
Wei ... I implore you all to know that her choice to come here was not an easy one.
Ishmael ... I know this question can sound a bit nosy, but... are things okay over there?
Wei We will face the trial to the best of our abilities.
Wei I wish with all my heart that our paths will not cross tomorrow.
Yi Sang And I share his sentiment.
Yi Sang I wish not to ever bring harm to them, nor they to us in turn.
Heathcliff Well, when's anything ever gone as we wished, eh...?
But Heathcliff sounded just as uneasy.

Episode: 17
Location: Daguanyuan - Yihongyuan Interior

Hong Lu ... erode away. Like a stone weathering merciless gusts and rainstorms, the memory shrinks and shrinks, slowly losing its definition... until the form itself is lost.
Hong Lu It only leaves the faint sensation that the stone was once there, until it was no more.
Hong Lu But I... hope that faint sensation remains a warm remembrance to Xiren, at least.
Xiren …….
Xiren quietly cleared away the tea set. We could not tell if she had heard Hong Lu, or if she cared at all, if she did.
Regardless, we left her to her job and made our way to the palanquin that was waiting to take us to the round 2 venue.
Location: Palanquin Interior
Outis When marching out to meet your foes in a deadly war...
Normally, most Sinners would've laughed Outis off for being overdramatic. But today, they were all listening intently to her every word.
We've already had several close run-ins with the candidates and their factions...
... and even the formidable Heishou Pack.

Outis And that is Jia Qiu.

Rodion And... it seemed like he was the one who sent the assassins from last night too, right?
Ishmael Yeah. We know that he's definitely wary of us, so we should also stay on guard.
Hong Lu As we all know by now... Daguanyuan is led by four ancient and great houses—the Jia, the Shi, the Xue, and the Wang.
Hong Lu Ever since the times before my own birth, this place was a den of political intrigue, a jungle where a single misstep could spell your death. Today, the Jia family holds the most power and influence among the four.
Hong Lu Which means that I was at the top of the world, afforded a life of luxuries and leisure, the kind of envious life that everyone looks up to and aspires to attain.
Hong Lu But big brother Qiu, he...
Hong Lu ... He was beneath even the rock bottom of the same world.
Yi Sang Rock bottom...? A metaphor for aught, perhaps?
Outis If it isn't, then I presume he's implying that someone pushed Jia Qiu to the depths.
Hong Lu Yes. Many, many hands pushed him toward the cliff, until there was no more room for him to back up to... until his only remaining choice was to plummet.
Hong Lu Brother Qiu is... the last surviving descendant of the annihilated Kong family.
Don Quixote Mm? Yet his surname was 'Jia' was it not?
Hong Lu His mother was from the Kong family.
Don Quixote Ahh... how...
Hong Lu My hand was probably one of the many that pushed him off the cliff.
Sinclair I-I don't think you're the kind of person to do something like that, Hong Lu...
Hong Lu Fuhu, no need to make excuses for me.
Hong Lu Envy and jealousy came about from my Grandmother and the elders' favoritism...
Hong Lu ... and where there is a zenith, so exists a nadir.
Hong Lu Hiding won't let me get away from it, so I'm going to accept it.
Hong Lu remained placid throughout that entire reveal, as though he was making some innocent commentary about the weather and the clouds going by.
In fact...
Ryoshu Watch out for the ones working with the Thumb, too.
... it was Ryōshū who appeared more agitated than he was.
Ishmael The Thumb...? Oh, that walking brick shithouse from earlier?
Ryoshu Lei Heng.
Rodion Hmm... you're weirdly worried, Ryōshū. Don'tcha usually just—
Ryoshu It's because he's powerful.
Silence descended in the palanquin.
Rodion ... Has Ryōshū ever called anyone straight up powerful before...?
No one replied.
Episode: 18
Location: Round 2 Evaluations Assembly
Befined Servant We have arrived at the venue for the second round of the Evaluation!
We found ourselves at some kind of deep subterranean area with multiple lifts installed inside it.
Some contestants were already rising on those lifts, but most of them had elected to remain down here to quietly and furtively discuss their strategies.
As for us, we were slowly getting used to our presence drawing the attention of every single person in the room the moment we entered.

Sinclair I feel like we're drawing way too much attention, so let's—
But we were stopped by a voice calling us.

I'd seen a child who looked just like her a few times in Hong Lu's memories. I remember her beaming at Hong Lu as she made a mound of petals with one hand—
... But now, she looked on at him without a discernible emotion, a spear in the very same hand.

Hong Lu took a step toward her, but she raised her hand and pushed him away.
It was not a threat, but her gesture carried such implicit resoluteness that it brought Hong Lu to a stop.

Location: Round 2 Evaluations Assembly

Daiyu Our meeting never should have come to pass.

Daiyu … may we each become a lone thread of formless smoke, to be scattered to the winds.
With that, Daiyu walked away from us.

... Means that we'll be enemies the next time we meet.

Hong Lu Connections are such fickle things, after all.
Location: Grand Lift
Hong Lu muttered with a faint hint of loneliness as we entered the grand lift, enclosed by four pillars.
The lift rises ploddingly.
When I looked down, I could see the other candidates, still waiting for their lifts, looking up at us. The candidates whose fates may or may not intermingle with our own in this battle.
Xue Pan Jia Baoyu!
Xue Pan You will never leave this place alive!

Hong Lu Mm... but to them, we are the villains.
Hong Lu Then are they to be evil in our eyes? Hehe, it's a distinction without a difference.
Ishmael Well, whichever is the case, I'm pretty sure that...
Ishmael ... trying to draw a clear line between enemies and allies won't mean much.
It seemed that we finally arrived at our destination as the lift slowed down.
Location: Somewhere in Hongyuan
We were greeted by a sight that, at first glance, appeared as though it belonged outside. But we were still clearly within the confines of Hongyuan.
Underneath the blue sky were two metal gates leading into a massive, looming structure. Red lights flickered ominously around the building.
Ishmael Looks like they decorated this huge space to look like the outside... I can't even fathom how much money they must've poured into this project.
Jia Yuanchun Family Hierarch Evaluations round 2.
A disembodied voice echoed from the speakers with a buzz.
Jia Yuanchun ... Begins now.
The door to the lift that carried us up here closed shut.
Hong Lu Ohh... I finally recognize where we are.
Gregor You've been here before?
Hong Lu ... This place is~
Hong Lu ~ the site of the former H Corp. that was once headed by the Kong family.
Hong Lu This place still bleeds from the wounds made then. I wonder if we will be spilling fresh blood over them today.

We are surrounded by the loud and crowded bustle of the teeming audience.
Is Hong Lu smiling still, as he always has since our first meeting?
I turn around to face him...
... only to see a much younger Hong Lu.
The deep sorrow in the child's eyes was about to overflow, as if he were ready to burst into tears.

Location: Somewhere in Hongyuan
In the silent, windless sands...
... stood only the desolate ruins of a building, swept through and thoroughly destroyed by a brutal, unstoppable force that was determined to leave nothing in its wake.
Remember the day ruin came to the Kong family,
who have brought this destruction upon themselves through their grave transgressions.
To violate the laws of Hongyuan is no tragedy—as such, it warrants no pity, only humiliation and scorn.
This site of history stands as a monument to the inevitability of karma.

Hong Lu explained that we're still within the subterranean area of Hongyuan, but...
... most of the Sinners were having a hard time believing that with the pale blue sky above them.
Faust Though this is a practice limited to the affluent class of Hongyuan, many have taken to installing artificial environments within their rooms. In fact, there are several buildings within Daguanyuan decorated in much the same manner.
Hong Lu Yes, the road taken to visit the elders is similarly decorated. Always so sunny and green.
Hong Lu And it feels more like the outside than the actual outside.
Rodion So what's uh... that?
I realized that what Rodya was looking at was a parasol. It was installed in such a random place that I doubted it was actually there for anyone to sit under.
Hong Lu Oh, that's a parasol.
Rodion I-I know what a parasol is, alright...? I'm asking what that old thing is doing there all on its own?
Hong Lu Mm…
Hong Lu tilted his head, thinking.
Hong Lu A real big shot who brought the Claws watched the whole thing from that seat.
Hong Lu The four houses left the parasol there because...
Hong Lu ... they wanted it to be a lasting reminder. A warning for the remaining houses, too.
Sinclair Reminder? ... Reminder for what?
Hong Lu That we mustn't seek what is not permitted to us.
Hong Lu That we should know our place, live the life we deserve, and part from this world the way we deserve.
Hong Lu ... Said the elders.
Hong Lu Shall we enter, now?
While we all gaped about like fish out of water in this unfamiliar environment,
Hong Lu casually walked ahead of us into the building like he was out on a mundane stroll.
Dante <I know you said you heard it all from the family elders, but...>
Dante <... you saw everything that happened here, didn't you? All of it.>
Hong Lu paused, then turned around.
Hong Lu …….
Hong Lu Yes, I probably did.
I'm starting to have less and less idea as to what his smile really means.
Episode: 20
Location: Evaluation Arena 1F

Don Quixote Heeugh...! Th-thou must make haste and take these tokens of life, young Hong Lu! T-thy life dependeth on thee!
Blood drained from Don Quixote's face as she hastily tried to return the bundle of coins to Hong Lu, but Heathcliff casually snatched it out of her hands.
Heathcliff Lemme see that, lass. Hm... these look like coins, but aren't actual cash. So how are these 'lifetokens' again?
Host By now you must be wondering something like "So how are these 'lifetokens' again?", and you would be absolutely right to ask that question!
Host Allow me to now explain the rules of the second round of the Family Hierarch Evaluations.
Host Each candidate must keep their coins secured by the rope threaded through them and attach the bundle to their waists.
Host Hiding them, swallowing them, hanging only some of them on your waist and keeping the rest in your pockets... basically, any behavior that does not allow them to be on full display at all times is cause for disqualification!
Outis Disqualification...
Heathcliff Oi! Take this rope, now! Quit faffin' about and tie it 'round your waist!
Sinclair Weren't you the one who snatched it away...?
Host Each of you have been given three coins at the start of the game. If you lose all of your coins, you will be immediately eliminated!
Don Quixote Y-young Ishmael!!! Thou must tie the, uh, the Des-Desperate's Knot upon the bundle of coins! Never let this knot be undone!
Ishmael Yep, working on it already...
Hong Lu Ahaha, I don't think there's any need to hurry~
Host In the second round, you will have a total of two hours to collect as many coins as you can! Might wanna get on with it, because the candidates' rankings will be decided by the number of coins they each have!
Hong Lu Aha~ So that's how I'm supposed to hang it.
Outis Ohoh! Be careful with that!
Ishmael Relax. Short of a sword cutting through, it's staying put. I've seen to that.
Three coins now hung from Hong Lu's waist, threaded by a rope.
And with that...
Host Let the second round of the Hierarch Evaluation commence!
The second round begins, and the two-hour time limit begins to count down.
Episode: 21
Location: Evaluation Arena 1F
Ishmael It's one thing to keep our coins as safe as possible from any candidates we might come across, but...
Ishmael ... it also means that our only means of gaining more coins is by taking them from the other candidates.
Outis Good point. Unless we're informed of a new rule mid-game, we must also prioritize taking as many coins as we can from the other candidates.
Ishmael Yeah, the host said that our ranks are decided by how many coins we have.
Faust The subject of the first round of the Hierarch Evaluation has been an open secret for a long time.
Faust To find a clue toward freedom from aging and death.
Faust However, the only information that has been made public regarding the second round of the evaluation is that it will be a martial contest.
Faust Indeed, there may be secret rules or rules that the host has intentionally neglected to reveal to us. However, it is of high likelihood that, in terms of informational advantage, all participants in this game are equally underequipped.
Faust This leads to the prediction that, should we engage in our usual form of confused brawls...
Faust ... we should at least place somewhere in the middle of the pack.
Rodion Aw, don't be such a downer, Fau! We gotta make it to the top two at least to get what we came here for~!
Sinclair Well, at least we're not under attack... yet...
Sinclair gingerly scouts the surrounding area, anxious that another candidate might suddenly jump out of nowhere and snatch all of Hong Lu's coins away.
Outis No enemy movements detected... yet...
Outis muttered something similar as she marched forward, on high alert and standing protectively next to Hong Lu's bundle of coins.
Gregor Not sure if it's a good thing, but... at least the huge size of this building means that we won't be running into other candidates left and right.
Ryoshu ... Peeping machines. They're everywhere.
Host Mm~ I'm seeing some people making threatening gestures at the cameras up here, but... please be informed of this rule: you break a camera, you pay up with a coin of your own!
Gregor ... I'm pretty sure she just made up that rule.
Hong Lu Ah, we should be able to keep moving by following this hallway.
Despite everything, Hong Lu still remains calm.
Ishmael Hong Lu, you've been here before, haven't you...?
Hong Lu I have. But I don't suppose any other candidates have. Oh, except big brother Qiu, maybe.
Hong Lu Besides, anyone who's ever set foot in here's already...
Hong Lu stopped.
Hong Lu Mm, at least we won't have to worry about getting lost, so that's nice~
Gregor He was absolutely about to spill something before he decided to bite his tongue, right?
Rodion So guys, I... have this weird sinking feeling that I just can't seem to shake.
Rodion Daguanyuan... that place was huge, right? Like stupidly huge, right?
Rodion Like, think about it. We chatted a while on that Palanquin before we got anywhere near Hong Lu's room.
Ishmael Yeah, apparently they have deer frolicking in the garden, a whole lake to themselves...
Rodion Right! So why are they holding the Family Hierarch Evaluation at some creepy abandoned building like this when they've got more than enough space to spare there?
Ryoshu Simple. Art deserves an exhibition of equal extravagance.
Rodion Okay, but why? Why drag us all the way out here? It's almost like... they're trying to show us something.
Gregor Show us what?
??? The pride and glory of Daguanyuan. And the cautionary tale of the house of the Kong family.
??? So that the prospective Hierarch and the other candidates would be reminded of their downfall.
Outis …….
Outis We weren't asking you, intruder. Here to ambush us?
The Sinners all immediately took a defensive stance at the sudden appearance of a different candidate.
??? Oh, don't get me wrong. I'm not here to fight you guys.
??? Saw you guys earlier, back during the first round.
??? I also saw that interesting healing method of yours. I'm guessing that's what you used to get past the first round of the Hierarch war.
Ishmael ... Do you know this guy, Hong Lu?
Hong Lu Um... nope. But I think he's from the Wang family, though I haven't exchanged many words with him before.
Wang Zhao Wang Zhao. Not surprised that you don't know who I am.
Wang Zhao It's not like I gave you much chance to get to know me... I was always the type to prefer sitting in my room and passing the time reading books.
Dante <If he's not here to fight... is he here to make an alliance?>
Gregor Hah... Listen here, fella. We're not here to make any friends, alright? We've had enough bad experiences with it as is.
Wang Zhao Yeah, totally. I get you guys. I'm not here to make an alliance, either. I just thought that maybe we could at least travel together, given that our goals don't seem to clash.
Wang Zhao I'm not actually here looking to become the next Hierarch. My goal is, uh, how should I put this...
Wang Zhao ... more like wanting to become a cannon pao(砲) in a game of Xiangqi. I have enough self-awareness to know that that even a chariot ju(車) is too much for me.
Wang Zhao Let me give you a demonstration. Catch.
Dante <…!>
Meursault deftly snatched the coin out of the air with one hand.
Rodion Dang! Nice catch, Meur!
Meursault Mm.
Dante <This is...?>
Sinclair Is this a r-real coin? One of those life tokens or whatever...?
Wang Zhao Feel free to bite into it if you don't believe me.
Heathcliff Oi, bite into it!
Faust ... That method of material discernment is ineffective for coins not made from soft metals such as gold.
Sinclair Why would you just...
Sinclair Are you sure this is a good strategy?
Wang Zhao Hm, well...
Wang Zhao I'm sure our dear host has something to say about that.
The host's voice buzzed from the speakers not long after Wang Zhao's reply.
Host Aha, a candidate has willingly handed over his coin to another!
Host Yes, of course! The candidates are permitted to trade coins and favors amongst each other without necessarily having to take them by force. You may use it to convince others to do your bidding, or use them to formulate various other strategies.
Meursault Then the decision to use coins as representation of tokens is symbolically appropriate.
Dante <The host doesn't immediately catch on to what's going on, huh? It took her a moment to react to what Ryōshū was doing in front of that camera, too.>
Outis A highly discerning observation, Executive Manager. It appears that she chimes in to add commentary based on the actions of each candidate.
Faust ... It is to keep the audience informed on the actions of the candidates.
Wang Zhao I knew it.
Wang Zhao We don't have to take the coins by force, after all.
Wang Zhao muttered with some satisfaction once the speakers fell silent again.
Sinclair So... um... would you like to have this back, now?
Wang Zhao Don't worry about it. Consider it my token of appreciation for helping me figure out the game.
Ishmael Sure... thanks for the coin, I guess... But are you sure it's a good strategy to just give away your coin like that?
Wang Zhao Probably not, if my goal was to come in first place. ... But like I said earlier, I'm more of a prey animal than a predator.
Wang Zhao Prey animals like myself have to remain highly aware of our surroundings and observe. And once you get good enough at that... you'll see which of the prospective candidates should hold the most coins.
Wang Zhao And that's my strategy.
Rodion Ooh... and that's us, huh? Are ya saying that we're the team that deserves to hold the highest number of coins?
Rodion Mhmm, hmm... hey, I'm starting to feel pretty optimistic! Gee, it's real refreshing to finally have someone recognize us like this, ya know?
Outis He's trying to butter us up. This man is just another boring old wheedling schemer.
Gregor Still... we're already at four coins right from the get-go. I'd say it's a good start, huh?
Sinclair We might actually end up coming in first place at this rate.
Wang Zhao So... what do you say? Informational advantage can be a pretty significant variable this early in the game.
Wang Zhao I follow you, seek my chances and feel out the game, while you gain information.
Wang Zhao It's a win-win, right? We both get what we want, and we'll go our separate ways when the time is right.
Sinclair W-what should we do? I don't think he looks... agile enough to stab us in the back and steal our coins.
Sinclair asks, giving Wang Zhao a side eye.
Ishmael I think he makes a decent case. It's not like he's offering us an alliance out of the blue... Like he said, I think it's a nice win-win strategy for both parties.
Outis The decision is yours, Executive Manager. It does not seem like he has any ulterior motives... Perhaps we could use our superior numbers to demand more coins from him in return for letting him accompany us.
Meursault A net profit of one additional coin has already been secured. If alliance with this individual causes you concern, it would be a rational choice to simply cut ties while we are ahead.
Dante <Hmm...>
The Sinners' arguments all sounded pretty reasonable, so I tried to signal Hong Lu, the actual candidate of the Family Hierarch war, but...
Dante <Any thoughts on this, Hong Lu?>
Hong Lu I think they all sound pretty nice!
His reply is terse, cheery, and thoughtless.

Hong Lu Let's do this, Wang Zhao.
Wang Zhao Okay, Jia Baoyu. Let's.
Wang Zhao ... So, are you still the favorite child of Daguanyuan?

Episode: 22

Episode: 24
Location: Evaluation Arena 1F - Lab Ruins

??? W-what the hell, that's bullshit!

??? Fine... my coins are yours. Take them all...
