Host If you've been eliminated, please come out to the hallways, forfeit your weapons, and wait for further instructions. Please note that any eliminated candidate loses all rights and privileges appertaining to candidates of Family Hierarch Evaluations, and...
Hong Lu Ohh, I remember now. His name's Shi Huazhen~
Rodion We're already up to seven coins, huh?
Rodion Hey, that's not bad! Let's wrap this up asap and get the heck outta this creephouse~
Yi Sang We are beset in all directions by sorrow and tragedy. This appears to have been a laboratory for an unknown purpose...
Yi Sang's eyes scan over the various machines that are messily strewn about the room.
Wang Zhao Kong family's laboratory, most likely.
Gregor Yeah... saw the plaque earlier. Apparently their entire family got completely annihilated after presumably breaking a taboo or something.
Sinclair Going by what Hong Lu said earlier... and gathering from everything we've heard about the Kong family so far... i-it sure sounds like they're all dead...
Wang Zhao It was in the time before the Jia family wielded as much power as it does now...
Wang Zhao Boy, the Kong family really was something back then.
Wang Zhao Outputting a constant stream of new, groundbreaking Boluses with all kinds of unique qualities can't have been easy. But they somehow managed it back then.
Wang Zhao Because the Kong family had made such impressive contribution to the City as a whole, even past the boundaries of Hongyuan itself...
Wang Zhao ... the other families had no choice but to watch in awe as it stood like a mountain so far above them.
Hong Lu Yes, I heard that they delved into various research subjects here.
Wang Zhao Well. Despite all that glory, what awaited them at the end was a tragedy.
Ishmael So there's no record or evidence of any kind left that could tell us what kind of experiments they carried out down here?
Wang Zhao Nope. It all got purged. Anything to do with their experiment has been practically atomized by the Claws that came here.
Yi Sang ... Perhaps, in search of the novel, they failed to notice the avarice spiraling out of control; a recurring development among those whose passion is research.
Wang Zhao For a while, people from the high-and-mighty families of Hongyuan refused to even look in the general direction of this building. They thought it was heretical, that it would bring them misfortune.
Wang Zhao Of course, I was pretty young then, so all this is just what the adults told me.
Yi Sang Do you recall aught from then... Hong Lu?
Hong Lu I was also very young, only ten years old, so my memories aren't very clear...
Hong Lu But I do. I recall.
Hong Lu ... I recall the day when the weight of avarice broke both the heavens above and the earth beneath the Kong family and smote them.
Dante <…….>
Hong Lu But our existence is as fragile as paper, bound to fade away into nothingness just as they have.
Hong Lu So... I guess that's why we should always be mindful of excess, to empty ourselves that we will not overflow.
Hong Lu spoke so calmly and clinically about the day when countless lives were lost.
Announcement …….
Announcement Thank... you so... much again... everyone... who is here today... for the Kong family and Hongyuan's... eternal... prosperity.
This... must be a recording from before the Kong family's complete annihilation.
Announcement Let this... experiment... be another resounding success for us... so that everyone... in Hongyuan... will be a step closer... to achieving... immortal life...
Announcement Do... know that our success... is...
Location: Hongyuan's Laboratory, Past
Announcement Do know that our success is a guarantee, so we would like to ask all research personnel to put their best into every project.
Jia Mu Do you see now? It was not a matter of formula but rather the process, the order of formulation that diminished the efficacy of your previous Bolus.
Jia Mu Let me demonstrate by example. Directly mixing two diametrically opposed ingredients—safflower (紅花), which carries an element of fire, with fleeceflower (何首烏), which carries an element of water—will cause a repelling reaction. What does the Kong family do in such a case?
Kong Youjin Mm. Use white peony (白芍藥) or gold in between the addition of either ingredient so that they may coexist.
Jia Mu Yes, a rudimentary application of the Bolus production methodology. However, one thing we must know is that the law followed by our ingredients is not defined solely by the five phases and eight trigrams. Though the five phases are correctly aligned, ingredients each imbued with elements of the sexagenary cycle—distinguished by both the heavenly stems and the earthly branches—all exhibit different effects.
Jia Mu Another aspect of this art to consider is that spacetime itself is a variable that modifies the laws by which yin and yang operate; thus, even if the same recipe were to be followed to the letter, the hour, the minute, and the second during which the Bolus is combined affects its quality and characteristics.
Kong Sihui So that's why following the same family recipes could yield Boluses of varying effects.
Jia Mu You must also remain wary of where one stores the Boluses once they are completed, and when to remove them from shade.
Jia Mu Do keep in mind that a wise forger of Boluses always remains acutely aware of the harmony and discord that exists between ingredients.
Kong Youjin You certainly have an exceptionally high degree of expertise when it comes to Boluses.
Kong Youjin I cannot help but always depend on you so. You're the only person who would ever come up with such innovative ways to forge these boluses.
Kong Sihui You've managed to untangle this side effect in a matter of moments, when we've struggled with it for months. We cannot help but feel a tinge of shame before your skill.
Jia Mu ... Consider this boon good karma for your vast and profound generosity.
Kong Sihui It is all thanks to your wisdom and acumen, venerable Jia Mu.
Kong Sihui You deserve every reverence and admiration for coming this far, armed with nothing but your skill and wit.
Kong Sihui And as they admire your achievements, they'll find hope as well.
Jia Mu ... Of course.
Jia Mu No one could have possibly foreseen that the declining Shi family would produce the next Hierarch, after all. Especially someone without a proper clan.
Kong Sihui Oh...! That is not what I had intended to convey, venerable Jia Mu. If I had offended you, by any chance—
Jia Mu Worry not, for you have spoken true.
Jia Mu I understand that it was all thanks to the Kong family's generosity that I could rise. I know better than anyone that you could have easily eliminated me before I had the chance to ascend to the seat of the Family Hierarch.
Jia Mu And you would have done so, had you wished to further solidify the Kong family's position here.
Kong Youjin In fact, our hearts were truly stirred by the most unexpected outcome of the Family Hierarch war.
Kong Youjin You have clutched victory with nothing but wisdom when all odds were against you.
Kong Youjin Not to mention that we are greatly appreciative of all the assistance you have so graciously provided us.
Jia Mu Save your compliments, please. I am only honored that you saw any use for my insignificant tricks.
Jia Mu After all, our collective pursuit is to prolong the eternal prosperity of Hongyuan, is it not?
Jia Baoyu ... Grandma, are you making new Boluses again?
Jia Mu Indeed, little Baoyu.
Jia Mu There is karma to be repaid.
Jia Baoyu And do I have to... keep coming here with you, grandma?
Jia Mu Yes. This beautiful scenery will not be complete without you as its witness.
Location: Evaluation Arena 1F - Lab Ruins
Yi Sang You have frequented this place… with regularity, Hong Lu?
Hong Lu ... Yes. Grandmother often brought me here to play, hand-in-hand.
Wang Zhao …….
Wang Zhao Oh, are you guys done collectively spacing out? I've been thinking while you were gone.
Wang Zhao And I've come up with something quite interesting.
Wang Zhao So, since the results of the second round are decided only when the time's up...
Wang Zhao ... I'm sure there are candidates out there coming up with strategies like...
Wang Zhao "Collect a moderate amount of coins, find a nice, hidden corner to lie low, wait until everything blows over, and we just might walk away with a decent rank." Know what I mean?
Outis There are many points of failure to that plan, but... it would indeed be an appropriate strategy for candidates who are not so confident about their odds in open combat.
Wang Zhao Right?
Wang Zhao But here's the thing. Wouldn't it make for such a boring show if most of the candidates are just hiding and doing nothing for the majority of the game? I mean, they even made the show of gathering an audience for this song and dance.
Wang Zhao There must be—
Location: Evaluation Arena 1F
I sensed a very subtle vibration the moment we walked out of the lab and into the hallways.
Wang Zhao must've felt it, too. He stopped in his tracks and looked around.
Gregor Hold on. Do you guys hear that?
Wang Zhao Well... looks like this is where our brief fellowship comes to an end.
Wang Zhao That was a short but sweet exchange, Jia Baoyu.
Wang Zhao But... I don't think you're the one who should hold the most coins.
Dante <What...?>
Wang Zhao Once the games end, I hope we'll all find what we came here for.
Outis We weren't planning on sticking with him through the entire round, but...
Ishmael Yeah, it's a bit sudden, huh? I guess it's better than a full-on betrayal.
Sinclair W-we're going our separate ways, just like that...?
Faust ... There is no time to spare worrying about him.
Outis ...!
Outis Atten-tion! Full-speed sprint toward the 3'O clock direction! Go, go, go!
Heathcliff Huh? W-what?! Oi, at least tell us what's going on!
Outis Eyes forward! The walls are... rising from the floor!
That's when the host's cheerful voice began booming from the speakers, excitedly explaining the situation.
Host Let's keep things interesting with... a new rule!
Host And this one's for you, dear viewers who must've been bored outta your minds with how safe the candidates were playing things! Starting now, walls are gonna start closing off rooms and corralling our candidates every set interval, shrinking the arena!
Host If you somehow end up trapped in a room, if you fail to make it into the shrinking arena...? Well, that's an elimination, of course!
Outis Of course...
Host Aha~ Looks like it's real chaotic out there! Now, let's try not to push your luck and get yourselves stuck between walls, mmkay? It'll be one hell of a clean-up job to have to scrape and scrub your bits off the walls. Better get moving!
We began sprinting full-speed to where the walls were starting to rise from the floor, the host's snidely chipper tone taunting us the whole time.
Host Oof! Looks like some of you didn't make it! You were so close, too... And... ouch, I spy a candidate who's been separated from her clan in the chaos. Whoa, try not to lose your coins in the chaos!
Episode: 25
Location: Evaluation Arena 1F

Dante <Huff... man... I... really should've done some... cardio... with you... guys... Huff... huff...>
My legs were screaming at me to take a seat and rest, but... we simply did not have the time to sit still.
Dante <We've got no choice but to keep on running...>
Yi Sang Hong Lu... This place must not have offered much diversion for a child...
Yi Sang Was it not drab or tedious?
Hong Lu Grandmother really knew a lot about Boluses.
Hong Lu Every time I was here, I would always watch her take command of the room, fiercely bringing about a storm of directions and orders for the researchers.
Hong Lu So no, it wasn't drab or tedious. And...
Hong Lu …….
Yi Sang Hong Lu?
Hong Lu ... Thinking back on it, whenever grandmother summoned me to visit this place together, I...
Hong Lu ... I think I felt a bit of happiness.
Sinclair Why?
Hong Lu That's...
That's when Outis suddenly came to a stop, raised her fist, and motioned in a way that caught everyone’s attention. She'd been walking ahead in the vanguard.
Gregor Stop, stop. She saw something up ahead.
Outis Figure up ahead. Solo.
Outis Hopefully, she's a candidate who's been separated from her clan. It should be easy coins for us if that's the case.
Outis muttered with a bit of anticipation. It really seemed like she was in her element here...
Hong Lu Don't worry, Outis.
Hong Lu I am acquainted with her.
However, contrary to Outis's wishes, she was not one of the candidates.
Daiyu …….
Outis She's a... bodyguard of a Xue family candidate.
Hong Lu Why are you here all alone, Daiyu?
Hong Lu How funny, I was just thinking about you.
Daiyu You...?
For the briefest moment, Daiyu's eyes looked at Hong Lu with disbelief—before hardening into a stern expression.
Daiyu Ah... I must have alarmed you all. Apologies.
Daiyu The walls came out of nowhere—excuse me. My inattentiveness has separated me from the rest of the clan.
Ishmael So... you have no idea where the rest of your clan or your candidate is?
Daiyu ... No.
Sinclair But if a different candidate finds you here alone...
Daiyu ... they will attempt to eliminate me, though I am but a follower. Because it would be beneficial for them to do so.
Hong Lu Daiyu, then... have you been waiting here all along, waiting for the one you follow to return?
Daiyu ... Yes.
Daiyu I suppose I did, in the belief that if I simply waited in the same place we became separated, they would... eventually come back for me.
Outis A foolish belief. The arena is constantly shrinking; they wouldn't take the risk of coming back here just to pick up a straggler.
Daiyu ... Of course. They wouldn't.
The air between us had become palpably awkward with impressive rapidity.
Daiyu I suppose... it could be said that you have a certain advantage over other candidates here.
Daiyu You're more familiar with this place than anyone else, are you not?
Hong Lu …….
Daiyu Silence again. Just like then... Just like when you refused to tell me anything to the end.
Daiyu In all those years I was in your service after the complete annihilation of the Kong family...
Location: Kong Family Building, Past
Daiyu Baoyu, big bro Baoyu! Here, here!
Daiyu Ugh, what happened now? You're looking so glum again! We're still gonna play the game you like today, right?
Daiyu Oh, don't tell me. Are those meanies back at it again? I'll kick their butts with this new move I learned yesterday—
Jia Baoyu No, it's okay. Don't worry, Daiyu.
Jia Baoyu I still don't understand why they say those things to me, but...
Jia Baoyu ... I still think I could be their friend one day.
Nervous Stranger Young master Baoyu... do you know the whereabouts of the venerable Jia Mu?
Jia Baoyu She said she'll be at the lab for a little bit.
Nervous Stranger Oh, oh no, that's not good. I... I have something to tell her... It's actually, umm, very urgent...
Nervous Stranger I need more of those Boluses to maintain this body... but she just wouldn't return my attempts to reach her, so I thought I would pay her a visit myself and—
Nervous Stranger Kuh—
Jia Baoyu ...!
Jia Baoyu A-are you okay?
Daiyu Big bro... h-hide behind me...!
Daiyu He's... he's not from Hongyuan...!
Claw …….
Jia Mu I see... She must not have discarded her clone for over a week.
Jia Mu Foolish girl. I warned her time and again that either the clone with a cloned brain or the original must be discarded within the week of production.
Jia Mu It seems that she could not bear to relinquish this new body of hers, unburdened by ailments of both body and mind.
Jia Baoyu G-grandma, is... is there anything we can do for her?
Jia Mu The Head... will not suffer those who have broken their taboos to live.
Jia Mu This is the omnipresent terror they cast over us; they are always watching, always primed to appear no matter where you are.
Jia Mu Even as you eat. Even as you slumber. Even as you are wed.
Jia Mu The circumstance matters not; the context is meaningless. If a taboo is broken, they will be there to carry out the sentence. Almost as if they are... the executors of the natural law.
Jia Mu Let us leave here, Baoyu.
Daiyu Be careful! Don't touch her!
Daiyu I... I think she's gone. She's not breathing.
Jia Baoyu B-but look, her eyes are still open.
Jia Baoyu I want to... help her close her eyes. It’s too cruel and sad for her to be all alone, even in her final moments... looking at this lonely place.
Daiyu Baoyu...
Daiyu ... Then come here again tomorrow, then again the day after.
Jia Baoyu Grandma brings me here everyday anyway...
Jia Baoyu It's going to happen whether I want to or not. Why would you say such a thing, Daiyu?

Daiyu ... I see the face of someone who's just about ready to leave this world forever.
Daiyu Okay? Promise you won't leave me alone in here.
Daiyu I'm just as scared of this place as you are, it feels too big, too vast... But... just by thinking about playing with you, flying kites with you, it makes...
Daiyu ... it all makes me feel a little better.

Once the memory faded, Lin Daiyu stumbled before leaning on a wall.

Daiyu Until one day, completely out of the blue, you said you'd be leaving Daguanyuan.

Daiyu ... In fact—did you ever, truly care about anyone to begin with?
There was a silence. Her questions were sharp and thorned, but Hong Lu made no attempts at making excuses or denying her accusations.
Hong Lu ... You're right, Daiyu. You must've suffered so much worse than I have. So much so that I can't even begin to imagine it.

Daiyu ... Then, please excuse my intrusion.
Daiyu I will try my utmost to not be a... burden to you.

Location: Hongyuan's Laboratory, Past
Kong Youjin I understand that I may be letting the impatience get the better of me, but...

Jia Mu Ultimately, a family's power comes from the Heishou they wield. Yet, ever since the olden days, there have been but twelve branches of them—which is what maintains this stalemate between the great families.
Jia Mu Yes, the Heishou are the shadow of Daguanyuan, its most dexterous and capable limbs, yet... they have their failings. An immense physical cost follows their explosive strength.
Jia Mu Even if you wield a Heishou Pack, it is difficult to expand their numbers, as their population is strictly controlled by the Heishou-Xianren of each branch.
Jia Mu Indeed... no one could even attempt to create a new branch, for the Heishou-Xianren have concealed their unique Bolus recipes.
Jia Mu Yet I am wise in the ways of Bolus-making, and armed with the Xianren's insight. With help from the Kong family, this is certainly a viable endeavor.
Jia Mu The Kong family once led the forefront of the City's medical sciences with your bioengineering achievements, yet now... You must know that your family's place in the City is quite precarious.
Jia Mu There have been developments for easier treatments, better modifications... superior Singularities are rising from all corners of the City; at first, they were only subjects of study and research, but through various applications, many of them are now entering the stages of mass commercialization.
Jia Mu H Corp. will fall by the wayside if the current trend continues... and one day, it may even decline so far as to fall prey to a war of the Wings.
Jia Mu Hongyuan hides many valuable secrets, as they are often passed down from generation to generation; certain areas within the territory even lead into the Ruins as well. Many Wings even consider us a treasure chest to be cracked open.
Jia Mu For the City to fear Hongyuan, to fear the Kong family, you must wield absolute power. A power that... perhaps, a new branch of Heishou with mass-production capabilities could provide.

Daiyu Most refuse to give anyone other than themselves a chance. Everyone's so blinded to everything but their immediate profit and interests.
Daiyu But the people of the Kong family, at least the ones I remember... sought to give others a chance, at the very least.
Daiyu It was only by their support that our Lin family, formerly so insignificant, could become a family of guards because they prioritized selection by merit, not by the nobility of their births.
Daiyu But once the Kong family was eradicated, every family other than the four pillars lost any means of upward mobility.

Daiyu ... I was just a child then, but I vividly remember that crushing feeling.

Daiyu Because I no longer had any place to return to.

Daiyu Brief though this journey may have been, I am glad that we were able to resolve many misunderstandings.
Hong Lu Daiyu...
Daiyu I will... wish you safe passage.
Daiyu So please, do return this time.
Host The game is racing to its end!
Host Let's try something unique this time to really enhance the experience, shall we? More immersion, more drama, more danger~!
Host Something like... let's see. What if we corralled the top three candidates into the same room...?
Host The candidates' placements seem pretty concrete now, don't they? But can we shake that up somehow, in the greatest turnabout of history?!
Host Games with predictable endings~ can get pretty boring for our dearest spectators.
Dante <Which means...?>
Host Let's review the current rankings, shall we? First, Jia Qiu of the Jia family! Second, Jia Huan of the Jia family! Third, Jia... Baoyu of the Jia family!
Ishmael ... They're going to put us in the same room as them?
Host Are we about to witness a turnabout? Is it even possible? Well, we'll find out soon enough!
Jia Huan Haah...
Jia Huan Now isn't this interesting.
Jia Huan If you've made it to third place with those paltry coins, then... the first place must've really been hoarding all the coins for himself.
Jia Huan Allow me to enter first, little brother. I'd loathe to display even the faintest semblance of amity with you.
Jia Huan Although, I wouldn't mind if you would make a correct assessment of your limitations and drop out of the game now.
Gregor ... Turnabout?
Gregor What even is the point of this 'turnabout'...? Isn't it just another way to make the show more interesting for the viewers to enjoy?
Ishmael If we come in third place... considering that they're also likely shooting for the Golden Bough, we are almost guaranteed to lose our objective to them.
Ishmael Okay...
Ishmael So how the hell are we going to beat that Jia Qiu guy...?
Ishmael Especially with Jia Huan breathing down our necks?
Hong Lu But... we have no other choice, do we?
Hong Lu If there's no way out, then our only path is inward.
Heathcliff Oi, you sure about this?
Heathcliff Both of 'em waiting for you in there, they...
Heathcliff They...
Heathcliff trailed off.
Neither of them are even remotely fond of Hong Lu, so they are likely going to go all-out on trying to kill him. Heathcliff knew that.
Hong Lu Big brother Qiu must be waiting for me in there.
Hong Lu …….
Hong Lu Brother Qiu... followed his father's last name, but he was pretty much a part of the Kong family. He survived only because he happened to be away on the day of the Kong family's ruin.
Hong Lu He found out only after he returned. Both his mother from the Kong family and his father from the Jia family were killed in that bloodbath, and... he didn't even have a single, close relative left.
Hong Lu What welcomed him upon his return were the empty ruins of this building, the silence of the Daguanyuan people, and the tale of the Kong family's disgraceful greed, and how it destroyed them.
Hong Lu Some servants warned me that brother Qiu might come to take my life, as anyone could guess that I probably had something to do with that day.
Hong Lu But he never came to find me. He simply left Daguanyuan, then Hongyuan.
Hong Lu So... the fact that he has returned...
Hong Lu ... must be proof of his indefatigable determination and will.
Hong Lu Of course, I wouldn't... know what that's like.
Episode: 43
Location: Final Room of the Family Hierarch Evaluation
Jia Qiu …….
Jia Qiu was waiting for us, just as Hong Lu had predicted.
We couldn't tell how long he'd been waiting for us in here, as he didn't appear to be even remotely tired or angry.
He only regarded us in that same, collected silence we remember seeing from the day we first met.
Jia Huan How nice of them to bring us all together.
Jia Huan Isn't their intent quite obvious? Gathering all of us in here...
Jia Huan ... They're telling us to rid ourselves of the trouble of finding each other, and determine who comes first among us.
Jia Qiu Still your insolent tongue, Jia Huan. You possess not even an inkling of the path ahead.
Jia Qiu You have taken that name for a better purpose than to assume such a boorish display of vanity, have you not?
The tension was palpable. No one was going to make the first move.
There was Jia Huan, who's always been hostile toward Hong Lu and us.
Then there was Jia Qiu, whose innermost thoughts we couldn't hope to grasp... but most likely harbored much anger toward Hong Lu and carried the torch of vengeance for his family's destruction.
Ishmael Look, there's... something written up there.
Ishmael whispered.
A question, written in large, red letters.
‘State the virtue of the Family Hierarch.’
Host Now, we have the top three candidates all gathered in this room. Are we about to find out the winner of this game right here, right now, right in this room?
Host So... with the gravity of this particular situation clearly communicated... let's try something completely different this time. Different, but most appropriate for the ceremony of selecting the next Hierarch of Hongyuan.
Host Behold the wall and ponder the question! This is the time for our finalists to debate the very question at the core of the Family Hierarch Evaluation!
Jia Qiu …….
Yi Sang We are to... engage in a dialogue?
Jia Huan Hilarious. Had enough of the bloodshed, then? Shall we end this game with a sophisticated little confabulation on the sanctimonious ‘virtues’ instead? Might as well put a bow on it, why don't you?
Host If the opponent accepts your argument... perhaps you could indeed flex your rhetorical muscles and finish the second round with a parlay of words... But wouldn't you like to know what happens if you can't?
Host It changes absolutely nothing! Simply return to what you've been doing for this entire event! Take or be taken! Grab as many coins as you can!
But all of this was but the host's 'suggestion', nothing more.
If either Jia Qiu or Jia Huan decides to just attack us anyway, we'd have no choice but to fight them.
Dante <What now...?>
However, Jia Qiu...
... only wordlessly gazed up at the writings on the wall.
Hong Lu What now, brothers?
Hong Lu asked casually.
I have to start thinking about every permutation of events that could happen this moment onward.
What if he decides to ally with Jia Huan to take us out? Wait, no. Someone like Jia Qiu might not even have to ally with anyone to destroy us.
Which means that, for us to come second, at least one of them must be eliminated.
Faust There is a possibility that forfeiting the game now could result in us placing third.
Faust However, what must also be considered is that, outside this room, there are other candidates who have collected a similar number of coins as we have; it is possible that there are additional coins to be collected, the sum of which may be greater than our current sum.
Faust ... A small variable, but a risk nonetheless.
Ishmael ... Yeah, but the biggest problem right now is that the only other clan that's aware of the Golden Bough... currently ranks higher than we do.
Outis Not only are they aware of it, it's probably the whole reason they're participating in this game. At this point, they might as well have already obtained it if they were to forfeit now.
Outis The ideal scenario would be for Jia Qiu to utterly destroy the N Corp. forces, take all of their coins, and eliminate them from the game. But...
Outis Dammit, I can't strategize without knowing what he's thinking. He is impenetrable.
Outis, of all people, appeared completely stumped... This certainly does not bode well for our plan.
Gregor That big fella... he's not much of a talker, and seems to be the kind of guy who prefers to destroy his way to success than to talk things out...
Jia Qiu …….
Jia Qiu They have given us a platform to parlay. Thus rightly parlay we shall.
Dante <…!>
What Jia Qiu said was a surprise to all of us.
Jia Huan Now that's unexpected. You're going to play along with this meaningless game, Jia Qiu?
Jia Huan The long years spent away from Hongyuan must've been quite smooth-sailing for you.
Jia Qiu There was loneliness and impecuniosity, but it was indeed smooth-sailing.
Jia Qiu I was deprived of those who would stand with me, for I was wanting in the fortune with matters of people; thus, I sought out the new, embraced them, and learned much.
Jia Huan I don't know just who you could've possibly met and learned from out there, but... your ambitions have certainly inflated.
Jia Huan I met this Zhao of the Wang family on my way here...
Jia Huan And he, whom we had all known to be quite clever, was sitting alone without coins, waiting for his elimination to be confirmed.
Jia Huan And do you know what he said to me then?
Jia Huan That he'd already given all of his coins to the one who should have them.
Jia Huan That he'd already achieved 'his' victory in this game, as he'd already given his coins to the one who deserves them most before anyone who does not could claim them...
Jia Huan I was tickled by that insolence, so I thought to separate his head from his torso... but the Heishou of this evaluation site leaped in to protect him.
Jia Huan Jia Qiu, why would you seek the Wang family's alliance now, of all times?
Jia Qiu Alliance? Quite the lofty phrasing for what that was.
Jia Qiu I had merely discerned what he deemed to be good—and promised that I would make it so.
Jia Huan What is good, huh...
Jia Huan What could you possibly have, after having essentially severed yourself from Daguanyuan for years, to offer him that the Wang family doesn't already have?
Jia Huan Fine, then... I'll play along with your game for now. If you have something to say, then say it.
Jia Huan gave Jia Qiu a sarcastic grin as he leaned against the wall.
Jia Qiu To ask one to state the virtue of the Family Hierarch...
Jia Qiu ... is to ask one to state what it is that Hongyuan, soon to be under the lordship of the new Hierarch, needs the most.
Jia Qiu I saw naught but two kinds of people as I was raised in this vast yet confined room they call Hongyuan.
Jia Qiu Those who kill, and those who die.
Jia Qiu To dissolve this vile distinction, to restore to the righteous path this land's trajectory of history, dyed crimson with the blood spilled in the name of our selfish avarice... we need these two virtues: humanity and propriety.
Jia Huan Your words are utterly meaningless. Do you seriously think the people who clamber around every restructuring day to secure just enough room for them to live have any care left to give about either of your pretentious virtues?
Jia Huan What Hongyuan needs is simple and pragmatic: the power to dominate and the administrative efficacy to wield it. Not to mention the ability to maintain the constant upward growth of technological innovation to keep up with the other Wings.
Unlike the other two who seemed to be more engaged in this debate than I'd expected...
... Hong Lu kept his aloof silence, as though none of that was of any interest to him.
This seemed to irk Jia Qiu, who turned to look at Hong Lu.
Jia Qiu ... Speak, Jia Baoyu.
Jia Qiu Dare speak your mind—what does Hongyuan need?
Hong Lu …….
Jia Huan Don't treat him as though he's on the same scale on which we operate, Jia Qiu.
Jia Huan He doesn't even know what he needs, let alone what Hongyuan needs. This is a waste of time.
Jia Huan He does not even possess an ounce of ambition nor the heart to bloviate meaninglessly about his purposes.
Hong Lu ... Yes, brother Huan is right. How could someone like me even dream of participating in such a... grand discussion of great causes?
Jia Qiu I will not formulate my judgment of you based on conclusions Jia Huan or anyone else in Hongyuan has drawn. They will be heard, indeed, but my Way is forged only by the answers that spring from my own deliberations.
Jia Qiu Thus, Jia Baoyu—do not allow the judgment of others to guide your tongue.
Jia Qiu replies sternly. Hong Lu looks toward the ground, somewhat taken aback, before looking up at Jia Qiu.
Hong Lu Would it not be much more... productive for you to tell us more of your thoughts, big brother?
Jia Huan Hah... just listen to him.
Zilu To reply to my lord's question with such a fatuous query signifies that he lacks the vision to perceive the grand picture.
Heathcliff Oi... This ain't the kind of question you can just pop out an answer for, is it? Don't put 'im on the spot, give him some time to—!
Zilu Do you still fail to realize which party among those present wields the sharpest blade?
Zilu Shame that you do not understand the significance of the powerful choosing to engage in rhetoric over crushing others with sheer might in times of chaos...
Jia Qiu That is enough, Zilu.
Jia Qiu I ask you again. What virtue must the Hierarch possess? What does Hongyuan need the most?
... For a split second, Hong Lu's lips part.

Jia Baoyu …….
Jia Qiu …….
Location: Final Room of the Family Hierarch Evaluation
Hong Lu I...
But they soon shut again, as though he was shaking himself from an illusion.
Hong Lu Honestly, I have no idea what kind of answer you're looking for from me, brother.

Jia Qiu This was my first act of goodwill toward you… and quite possibly, the final opportunity I may be able to afford you.
Jia Qiu Will you discard it regardless, blinded to its significance?
Hong Lu Brother Qiu...
Hong Lu You must be anticipating something from me.
Jia Qiu Anticipation, is it...
Jia Qiu An imprudent anticipation begets nothing but despair in the face of futility, leaving nothing but a hollow heart in its wake.
Jia Qiu Even still... I have deigned to grant you my valuable time for that slim potentiality I once saw within you.
Jia Qiu And by doing so, I risk delaying everything that I have prepared for a long, long time.
Jia Qiu Yet... you still evade my every query.
Jia Qiu To swallow one's words when it is their turn to speak is to hide them.
Jia Qiu As you insist on stopping and veiling your thoughts, I am, perforce, compelled to act in a manner unbecoming of a noble man.
Jia Qiu It seems that I must dabble in your methods today, Zilu.
Zilu As you command, my lord.
Jia Qiu I shall afford you neither the wherewithal nor the time to mask your ruminations.
Jia Qiu Bring forth a real answer; do not let it languish behind your tongue.
Location: Final Room of the Family Hierarch Evaluation
Jia Qiu does not give us even a moment to catch our breath; the unrelenting storm of strikes pummels Hong Lu and the rest of us to the ground. But he doesn't seem even remotely winded by that effort.
But I could tell that this wasn't his full force; he wasn't looking to kill us here outright.
Jia Qiu awaits Hong Lu's answer...
... but it seemed that his patience was running low.

Jia Huan I would love to watch you tear his useless head from his torso.
Regardless of Jia Huan's snide remarks, Jia Qiu only looked down wordlessly at Hong Lu, who was still trying to catch his breath.
Jia Qiu ... You have no answers, still?
Hong Lu I...
Hong Lu's eyes wander, like someone swimming through veils of time.
Hong Lu What Hongyuan needs...
But the silence continues, letting the countless moments in time to pass by unseen.
Jia Huan Don't pretend like you are ruminating upon some great secret of the world.

Jia Huan You want someone to end your life. To cut off your head.
Jia Huan But oh, you don't even possess the courage to do the deed yourself, nor do you have the persistence to struggle on.
Jia Huan Jia Baoyu... what is true greed, if not that?
Location: Daguanyuan - Yihongyuan Yard, Past

Jia Baoyu Humans die. It's what they're born to do.
Jia Baoyu It's naive to wish for an eternal blossom.
Jia Baoyu Because everything that blooms is destined to wilt away.
??? …….
Location: Final Room of the Family Hierarch Evaluation
Hong Lu stops himself. The sudden reemergence of this memory has put his reply to sleep, still and silent.
And the familiar, aloof, and cloud-like words fill the vacuum.
Hong Lu Even if an answer to your question exists, what meaning would it have?
Hong Lu In our lives that are but sparks that go out in the blink of an eye, what meaning would all this suffering, happiness, pain, and sorrow have? They'll all float away with the flow anyway.
Hong Lu So... if Hongyuan needs anything, I guess, it might need to find something like... contentment in poverty and the joy of having principles. (安貧樂道)
Hong Lu To not desire more, nor to discard what is given to us... and instead, to simply and fully accept the present. That must be the remorseless path to true inner peace, right?
Jia Qiu "Even in poverty-stricken lives, if one finds contentment with what is given to them, they will find inner peace," I see.
Jia Qiu However, Jia Baoyu... I must doubt the truthfulness behind your words. For you... do not know poverty.
Hong Lu …….
Jia Qiu If you knew true poverty, you would also know that it is not something to be uttered so lightly with that insouciant smile of yours. None of us here in Daguanyuan, neither you nor I, deserve to discuss it in the manner with which you have.
Jia Qiu Thus, I am compelled to believe that you are still yet to give me a real answer.
Rodion ... He's right.
Rodion You want us to just accept what's given to us... that it just is what it is...? That's too wretched and pathetic for the poor.
Dante <……. >
Shadow draws over Jia Qiu's expression as though he observes every hour that has been slipping through Hong Lu's fingers.
And he... remains patient. It seemed as though he was waiting for a reply he thought Hong Lu must rightly give.
Jia Qiu I will ask again.
Jia Qiu What does Hongyuan need?
Jia Qiu What is it that its people need—those who are too busy dying, too busy living, too busy simply persisting, breathing?
Hong Lu What Hongyuan needs is...
The silence has grown.
Location: Daguanyuan - Yihongyuan Yard, Past
Daiyu You're leaving Daguanyuan?
Daiyu After all those years... you keep your silence to the final moments of your departure.
Daiyu Not even... a hint of an answer about that day.

Daiyu Why...
Daiyu Why won't you stop smiling like that?
Daiyu Oh... I see. You...
Daiyu ... buried it all.
Daiyu Then I hope you'll never come back here again.
Daiyu Because you have abandoned me. You've abandoned Daguanyuan and Hongyuan both.
Location: Final Room of the Family Hierarch Evaluation
Hong Lu's mouth opens and shuts, once again caging the words that ache to be let out.
And his lips once again assume the familiar arch.
The same, lonely smile that has seen far too many things they care about float away.
Hong Lu Hongyuan needs...
Hong Lu ... a long life expectancy, fortune, and health in both body and spirit. (壽福康寧)
Hong Lu Wouldn't it be nice to live a long, fortunate life, free from any inequities of the world from the beginning to the end of your existence?
Jia Qiu You spew such hollow, worthless lies in place of the truth that you so nearly uttered.
Jia Qiu Let it out. Your truth.
Jia Qiu That is what I wish to hear.
Jia Qiu To be content with what is given to us, and to live a long life unburdened by sickness and worry on account of inequities...
Jia Qiu They may both be answers, indeed.
Jia Qiu If they were, truly, replies risen from the fathoms of your heart, then I would have accepted them and thereby drawn my conclusions.
Jia Qiu Yet...
Jia Qiu I am yet to hear your answer.
Jia Qiu That answer, hiding in the shadows of your hesitation.
Jia Qiu The answer that you buried deep within.
Hong Lu I...
Zilu My lord, while there is effort, he is—
Jia Qiu Withdraw now, Zilu. It seems that a brutal winter must come afore I am to estimate the green within him.
Jia Qiu Reflect upon yourself! Exhume your humanity, your righteousness from deep within!
Episode: 44
Location: Final Room of the Family Hierarch Evaluation
Jia Huan Haah...
Jia Huan lets out a frustrated sigh.
Jia Huan This is unbearable. What an utterly vain exchange.
Jia Huan As I said earlier, what Hongyuan needs is a realist at its helm who knows how to pursue the practical interests. How do none of you understand that there is nothing more, nothing less to it than that?
Jia Huan Those who are so busy living and dying need their immediate and tangible interests to be fulfilled.
Jia Huan It doesn't matter if they're just delusions or fantasies. All they need is for someone or something to enable them to visualize and witness their desires and dreams. That is all there is to it.
Yi Sang …….
Don Quixote That is...
Jia Qiu ... Not incorrect.
Jia Qiu Yet Jia Huan, while your Way is sound in reason, it is hollow.

Hong Lu ... walk the Way of humanity and righteousness?
Jia Qiu What did you see? What shape did my 'Way' take in your eyes?
Hong Lu ... I saw fervor. Burning.
Hong Lu Like fire, melting many things away with its warmth.
Jia Qiu Fire that melts.
Jia Qiu So that is what you see.
Hong Lu If you indeed walk the Way of humanity and righteousness... then what does it mean to be virtuous?
Jia Qiu You have said it yourself.
Jia Qiu Years of fell deeds have shaped the valleys that devoured men; people have accepted the broken, iniquitous establishment as reason, as part of immutable nature.
Jia Qiu And in this malformed existence, the hearts of men were cooled and hardened. But benevolence—the true humanity, and righteousness, is what softens the calcified heart.
Hong Lu …….
Jia Qiu Daguanyuan demanded me silence.
Jia Qiu Do not ask about that day, do not try to learn more of that day.
Jia Qiu It was but the consequences of the forbidden avarice, pitiful yet deserved.

Jia Qiu The difference is... that I never did let go.
Hong Lu ... But there was nothing.
Location: -1
Jia Baoyu …….
Hong Lu There was nothing but an infinite, bottomless darkness.
Location: Path to the Revered Xianren
Hong Lu All I could think of was that I wanted someone to hold me and tell me that it was all going to be okay.
Hong Lu The elders could be stern from time to time, but...
Hong Lu ... they cared for me more so than anyone else in Daguanyuan did.
Jia Mu Enter now, little Baoyu.
Jia Mu The revered Xianren await.
Hong Lu I wanted to let it all out. All of it.
Hong Lu Everything that I witnessed, but never should have been made to.
Hong Lu The ecstatic screeching of the eldritch things, the echoing hatred of the dying and the dead... the wailing universe.
Hong Lu Laughter. Shouting. Screaming. Then nothing.
Hong Lu After today, nothing good will ever happen to me again.
Hong Lu This is the moment that will wrest me from slumber every morning.
Hong Lu And every night, it's going to drag me from sleep.
Hong Lu So please... please comfort me.
Hong Lu Tell me that everything's going to be okay. Tell me I don't have to be scared anymore.
Jia Baoyu …….
The Elders Welcome, little Baoyu.
The Elders I have not watched anything as exhilarating as that sight in centuries.
The Elders The beginning was the most enjoyable part. The one that pathetically clung to her life, scrambling away from the chaos in spite of his twisted ankle—oh, it truly is fascinating how a mere crawling human could be so engaging to watch.
The Elders The entity from the Outskirts, conceived and born from the Kong mother's womb certainly reached adulthood swiftly—truly, it was a most magnificent sight. I'll not soon forget the glint of hunger in its eyes when the reproductive instincts kicked in.
The Elders Did you see the contortion of the mother's face when she saw the creature burst from her womb? Madness took her swiftly.
The Elders Indeed, and what a dramatic finale it was! To watch the Claws arrive just in time... They have exceeded our expectations indeed, leaving quite literally nothing behind. It was just as we had heard.
The Elders A most heavenly offering, it was. We shall reminisce it to sustain our amusement for months to come with this rare gift of yours.
The Elders Baoyu, oh dear little Baoyu... You...
The Elders ... are our family's peerless jade. Its shine is like a mirror and a window that reflects to us what lies beyond the iron threshold of the Tiekan Temple.
The Elders Do persevere to cleanse and shine your light—ensure that its glint is unmarred by cloudiness.

Jia Baoyu …….
Daiyu What are you doing, big brother?
Daiyu Come on, your kite's flying away, go catch it!
Jia Baoyu ... And do what?
Jia Baoyu Let it float away to wherever the wind takes it.
Hong Lu Over yonder, on a small field, I made a burial of flower-petals.
Hong Lu I collected the petals and blossoms in my flower pouch and gave them a pretty burial.
Hong Lu That way, even when they return to dust... they'll still be clean like they were never ever here... right?
Hong Lu And now that I've buried them...
Hong Lu ... I found myself freed from this suffocating, endless flood of colors.
Hong Lu Only then could I...
Hong Lu smile.
Location: Final Room of the Family Hierarch Evaluation
Jia Qiu Jia Baoyu. You have abandoned your Way in Daguanyuan.
Jia Qiu But this Way of mine, learned beyond Daguanyuan's hedges...
Jia Qiu ... it taught me patience, gave me peace.
Jia Qiu Desire bereft of humanity and righteousness begets only self-immolation.
Jia Qiu Yet desire guided by adherence to the Way maintains its embers.
Jia Qiu If fire does not rise to meet the darkness upon its descent, all roads shall converge on a path with nothing but nihility at its culmination.

Jia Qiu So what lies within, Jia Baoyu?
Jia Qiu What has slumbered, nestled within you all those years?

Hong Lu On the same day the peach blossoms whirled like in a gale.

Jia Qiu In the end, only I alone enter the crater.
Jia Qiu Thus, I am the only one who may lift myself out of its depths.

Hong Lu What Hongyuan needs...
Location: Hongyuan, Past
Jia Mu Little Baoyu, you cannot save everyone.
Jia Baoyu I know I can't save everyone. But...
Jia Baoyu At least this one person who's about to fall, please...
Location: Final Room of the Family Hierarch Evaluation
Hong Lu ... is kindness.
Hong Lu To be kind is to care about one another, to embrace those who suffer.
Hong Lu It is to cry alongside a grieving friend. It is to join in laughter when they are elated with joy.
Hong Lu It needs the warmth of kindness and gentleness.
Jia Qiu …….
Jia Qiu Your words...
Jia Qiu ... flow like a vast, winding river that wishes to bring all of existence into its gentle embrace.
Jia Qiu Yet kindness alone, while it may illuminate those who surround you, will never be enough to embrace all those who need it.
Jia Qiu Not to mention how unbecoming of the lord of Hongyuan it would be for him to weep and guffaw at such little, insignificant things.
Hong Lu That's not true.
Hong Lu continues, his voice carrying more confidence than it did a moment ago.
Hong Lu If people can see, feel, and share the same sorrow and joy they see in others...
Hong Lu And if that moves them to hold one another, even if it's just one other person...
Hong Lu ... everyone can be moved to embrace someone, to share the warmth of a fellow human... even if I can't hope to hold them all by myself.
Jia Qiu …….
Jia Qiu That was quite the lacking answer, given all the time I have granted you.
Jia Qiu But...
Jia Qiu It suffices.
Jia Qiu In nihility, everything becomes consumed by the monotonous, gray meaninglessness; but an empty canvas can be painted anew.
Jia Huan Jia Qiu, you've been waiting and prodding this whole time for these... wishy-washy platitudes?
Jia Huan I just don't understand.
Jia Huan That idiot's drivel could not be further from what it means to rule.
Jia Huan Kindness can't give people the satisfaction they desire. No kindness has ever saved any lives, nor did it ever fill a starving stomach.
Jia Huan You can't change Hongyuan with such foolish flights of fancy.
Jia Qiu Jia Huan, you need only walk the path of your own choosing.
Jia Qiu But in this room, I shall pursue my own idea of true humanity with clarity, without a moment's hesitation.
Jia Huan ... What are you doing?
Jia Qiu It means that I...
Jia Qiu ... will forfeit the Family Hierarch Evaluation.
Host …!
Dante <Wha-what?!>
There was a shocked, hushed gasp from the speakers.
Jia Huan …….
Jia Qiu Now, only Jia Baoyu and his clan must remain.
Jia Qiu Should you choose to forgo the same choice that I am about to make, then prepare to spill much blood.
Jia Qiu But it is not the throne of the Family Hierarch you have come here to seek, is it?
Jia Huan ... Hah!
Jia Huan You know me well. My goal lies far beyond this insignificant squabble surrounding who becomes the next Hierarch of Hongyuan.
Jia Huan But I don't appreciate being told what to do by someone who presumes he has some sort of control over me.
Jia Qiu Beneath your mask of unscrupulousness and temperamentality, you are someone who pursues nothing but the extremes of reason and logic.
Jia Qiu ... And I believe your reason would lead you to forfeit here as well.
Jia Huan You know something...?
Jia Huan You're all disgusting hypocrites, the both of you! This stench of hypocrisy follows you both and haunts every meaninglessly convoluted word born from your deceit.
Jia Huan ... Gubo, we are leaving.
Jia Huan I will forfeit the game as well.
Jia Huan I've already collected more than enough of these stupid coins.
Hong Lu ... Brother Qiu?
Jia Qiu You are like a tuft of cloud, floating high up in the heavens.
Jia Qiu Yes, clouds do not bring suffering to trees, to earth, or to anything—it is not a force that tramples.
How bizarre.
Jia Qiu walks past us, making his way toward the exit of this room of his own accord.
Jia Qiu But clouds cannot do more than that. To embrace a fellow human, as defined by the shape of humanity and righteousness you spoke of, you must walk the earth with your own two feet as a human yourself, not float by as a lofty tuft of cloud.
Jia Qiu Mind this as you open your own path.
With that, Jia Qiu unfastened the rope from his waist and handed it over to Hong Lu.
A huge bundle of coins, several times greater than the sum of every coin we've collected so far, jangled heavily.
Ishmael Wai-wait...! But why...?
Hong Lu …….
Jia Qiu left the room without saying another word.
Host …….
Host Jia Qiu and Jia Huan of the Jia family have both been simultaneously eliminated from the game via forfeiture!
Rodion ... H-hold on, doesn't that put us in first place...?
Heathcliff What's wrong with that? I'd much rather come in first than second.
Ishmael That's not the problem! We're here to pick up that Golden Bough from the treasury, not seat Hong Lu in the throne of the Family Hierarch...!
As the Sinners were chaotically scrambling from this unthinkable turn of events...
Sinclair Wait, there's someone out there who's still trying her damnedest to become the Family Hierarch.
Sinclair And she still hasn't given up.
Host Looks like we all have a pretty good picture of who's going to be our next Hierarch, huh? There's only ten minutes to go 'till the Evaluation is complete!
Dante <…….>
Dante <Hey, guys...>
Dante <... Are you thinking what I'm thinking?>
Some time later...
Location: Daguanyuan - Aojingguan Banquet Hall
Jia Yuanchun Thus the Family Hierarch Evaluation has come to an end. I extend my admiration and congratulations to every candidate and their clan for their exemplar participation in this event.
Jia Xichun So... uhm... this is actually happening, right? Someone, tell me how this is actually happening.
Jia Yuanchun I implore upon all those present to accept this sacred outcome with grace.
Jia Yuanchun The victor will first descend to the Tiekan Temple and pay their respects to our revered elders. Then, upon returning to the surface, they will march to the first floor of Daguanyuan, and assume the seat of the Family Hierarch of Hongyuan.
Rodion I'll be honest, we're all still trying to understand how we actually got here...
Jia Yuanchun The following are the final results of this Family Hierarch Evaluation.
Jia Yuanchun Third place: Huan of the Jia family.
Wei My lady, please compose yourself... there are many eyes... you have a certain dignity to uphold—
Jia Yuanchun Second place: Baoyu of the Jia family.
Yi Sang ... Have you an inkling of why he has done such a thing... Hong Lu?
Hong Lu Um... no.
Hong Lu I don't know.
Jia Xichun What the hell are you guys all talking about...?
Gregor Well... All's well that ends well, right...?
Jia Xichun No, that's not... I don't... But why me—why would I...?
Jia Yuanchun And first place, our next venerable Hierarch, and the final victor of the Family Hierarch Evaluation...
Jia Xichun I'm...
Jia Yuanchun Xichun of the Jia family.
Jia Xichun I'm really the... next Hierarch?
The games ended with a hush, devoid of even the perfunctory applause to mark its closing.
Jia Xichun stood dumbfounded, still processing the situation.
And I still had no idea what Hong Lu was looking at.
That's how the Family Hierarch war... came to a close.
Episode: 45
Hong Lu Let flourish from my back the pinions of flight,
Hong Lu To chase the parting blossoms, their wilting voyage a sky-high plight.
Hong Lu Ah, where at the edge of heaven does it lie, this flower-mound?
Hong Lu I bury you today, for you have passed on
Hong Lu But when will I be buried when I am gone?
Hong Lu I bury the petals, under people’s mocking laughter
Hong Lu But who shall be burying me then, in the thereafter?
Hong Lu No one will cry at my burial-mound.
Hong Lu For, as morning springs die and blossoms wilt
Hong Lu They all float away and turn to silt.
Rodion Alrighty, boys and gals! Grab your cups, on my mark~
Rodion Ahem, long may Xichun reign, the Family Hierarch!
Location: Daguanyuan - Aojingguan Banquet Hall
Rodion Long may she reign!
Once all the guests had taken their seats, the banquet hall became packed, crowded, and chaotic.
... Except for where we were sitting.
Yi Sang ... L-long may she reign!

Yi Sang Yet... I have...
Rodion Ugh~ Oh, right. I wonder if Saude's written something to congratulate us?
Rodion Heya, hey! Did anyone send us a letter or something?
Reticent Servant ...? We haven't even received any notes, let alone a letter...
Rodion Tsk, rude. We're the team that came in second, ya know~?
Rodya grumbled. I wasn't sure whether it was this poor servant or the oddly silent Saude she was calling rude.
Lady Wang Baoyu... are you hurt? Any scratches?
Hong Lu No, I am unhurt.
Lady Wang I was so anxious throughout the Evaluation... Just what errant fancy has taken hold of you to risk yourself in such a dangerous ordeal...?
Lady Wang So... how did you get to the banquet hall?
Don Quixote Aha! Thou wishest to hear our tale, then? Forsooth, were I to bestow a title upon this adventure, I would call it IN WHICH LIMBUS COMPANY CLAIMETH A MOST GLORIOUS HONOR OF ATTAINING THE RANKING OF THE RUNNER-UP IN A CONTEST OF MIGHT AND WIT! Now, worry thee not, for this tale shan't consume overmuch of thy time. To recount a few highlights of this adventure~
Don Quixote One might call attention to the merciless march of walls closing in! Verily, some might even recall the interminable onslaught of rival candidates! Yet these triflings have all failed to smite us down, for... we! Are!
Lady Wang ... It seems that she has misunderstood my... question. My intent was to ask by which means of travel you have come here.
Hong Lu Aha. We took a palanquin, mother.
Lady Wang ... I see. Then I suppose you are yet to have visited the revered Xianren?
Lady Wang Shouldn't you... pay your visits to them first... don't you... think?
Lady Wang They must be so anxiously waiting for you, to hear about you.
Hong Lu Yes, I'll visit them soon.
Hong Lu Though I don't believe they're exactly waiting to hear about me.
Lin Daiyu So... you've come back safely.
Rodion Daiyu~! You're okay!
Lin Daiyu Yes, I've gotten much better.
Lin Daiyu As luck would have it, the injury was not so severe as to require using the Life Insurance.
Lin Daiyu So… what are the circumstances that led to you sitting here?
Don Quixote Aha! If thou wishest to hear the tale in which— Ah, uh...
Don Quixote Ahem... we were carried... by a palanquin.
Lin Daiyu ... Come again?
Gregor Don Quixote, I think she's actually asking us how we managed to come in second place.
Don Quixote ... Aha, verily!?
Lin Daiyu Yes, that was indeed my question. Please tell me what has transpired during the game, if you wouldn't mind.
Don Quixote Then...?
Gregor Yeah, yeah. Feel free to get the ball rolling.
Don Quixote Muahaha, eheh... Then I shall do as thou askest! Ere embarking upon this tale, one must first explore...
Don Quixote ... how we were made to convene in the fated chamber along with Jia Qiu! ...And Jia Huan, that discourteous cur. Thereafter—
Location: Final Room of the Evaluation, Recent Past
Don Quixote ... the dialogues complete, Jia Qiu, all of a sudden...
Don Quixote ... departeth the chamber, taking his entire retinue alongside him! A most puzzling decision, wouldst thou not say?!
Heathcliff Oi! Quit screamin' every bloody sentence in my ear!
Don Quixote Ahem... thus... uhm... at the climactic finale...
... we were the only ones left in that room.
Alone with over one-hundred coins that Jia Qiu had left behind...
... as he and Jia Huan both suddenly elected to forfeit from the game.
Ishmael W-well... what now?
At this strange turn of events, we all stood around aghast and dumbfounded.
Even Ishmael was stuttering, just as confounded and lost as anyone else was about what happened.
Ishmael So... claiming these coins is going to shoot us up to the top of the leaderboard, right...?
Ishmael B-but why...? Why'd he dump all these coins on us?
Heathcliff Lass, you know this is the fifth time you've asked that exact same question, yeah?
Hong Lu Hm... I don't have a clue, either. Brother Jia Qiu really is hard to read...
Yi Sang I see that your expression has grown a touch brighter, Hong Lu.
Hong Lu ... Has it?
Yi Sang Mm. Perhaps something has been unshackled from within.
Hong Lu I just didn't think I'd ever say anything like that.
Location: Final Room of the Evaluation, Recent Past
Hong Lu ... is kindness.
Hong Lu To be kind is to care about one another, to embrace those who suffer.
Hong Lu It is to cry alongside a grieving friend. It is to join in laughter when they are elated with joy.
Hong Lu It needs the warmth of kindness and gentleness.
Jia Qiu …….
Jia Qiu Your words...
Jia Qiu ... flow like a vast, winding river that wishes to bring all of existence into its gentle embrace.
Hong Lu I thought...
Hong Lu I thought I'd already let all of it flow past me a long, long time ago.
Hong Lu's expression had changed, just as Yi Sang observed. There was a degree of surprise shown toward something new, but... it was also the smile of someone whose burden had suddenly been lifted.
Gregor Never in my wildest dreams did I imagine that we'd find ourselves enough coins to come in second place, let alone first.
Sinclair ... Hey, that reminds me.
At that moment, I'm pretty sure we were all thinking of the same person.
Sinclair Wait, there's someone out there who's still trying her damnedest to become the Family Hierarch.
Sinclair And she still hasn't given up.
Location: Evaluation Arena B2, Recent Past
Jia Xichun Gyah...! Huff, huff... Holy crap, I almost got pancaked...
Wei Are you alright, my lady?

Jia Xichun What... what? Somebody translate, please?
Jia Xichun Why's everyone giving me that funny look?!
Some time later...
Jia Xichun You're... just giving me all these coins?
Rodion Totes~ We're cool now, right? No hard feelings?
Xichun and Wei couldn't appear more serious if they tried, despite Rodya's chummy attempts at breaking the ice.
Wei …….
Jia Xichun What… what the hell is this? Is this your way of showing pity? What kind of—
Hong Lu Here’s what I think happened, Xichun.
Hong Lu Brother Qiu isn't trying to seat me as the next Hierarch by giving me all these coins.
Hong Lu I believe he gave them to me because he's anticipating that I'd put them to good use.
Hong Lu So no, this isn't pity.
Hong Lu I just feel like they'd find more use in your hands than in mine.

Jia Xichun Don’t... don’t you dare presume this’ll suddenly make us even.
Jia Xichun You... owe me much, much more than this, brother. You owe me time.
Wei ... My lady expresses her nigh-unutterably fathomless gratitude.
Normally, Xichun would get irritated whenever Wei butted in, but she appeared to have grown calmer. Much calmer.
Jia Xichun …….
Instead of lashing out with her usual exasperation, she only stared at the tall pile of coins with a quiet but conflicted look.
Jia Xichun Funny.
Jia Xichun Now that I’m looking at these piles of coins, it feels like…
Jia Xichun It feels like I’m looking at all the rooms of Daguanyuan. I used to hate that sight so much as a kid…
Jia Xichun ... but I eventually grew out of that feeling. Stopped minding that scenery.
Jia Xichun I guess that's when... I guess that's when I decided to leave Daguanyuan, too.
Jia Xichun The Family Hierarch, huh...
Jia Xichun Can I... can I really be a good Hierarch to Hongyuan?
Hong Lu Yes, you can.

Hong Lu The Family Hierarch Evaluation will end soon.
Ishmael … What are you doing, Heathcliff?
Heathcliff Givin’ that camera the finger. What are they gonna do, disqualify me? Game’s over, you twits.
Don Quixote Alas! With eyes shut, with my mind's focus sharply upon that image, the vision cometh to me! Oh, there cometh the roaring applause...!
There was no audience, no applause, nor dramatic stage lights to celebrate our success, but...
... we still managed to neatly and comfortably secure both first and second place nonetheless.
Which means that we managed to successfully complete our objective here at the Family Hierarch war.
Location: Daguanyuan - Aojingguan Banquet Hall
Gregor ... Yeah, that pretty much sums it up.
Gregor, who took the reins of Don Quixote’s epic retelling after she left mid-explanation to share her adventurous tales with the servants, finished the story.
Lin Daiyu ... I see. So it was Jia Qiu...
Sinclair I'm still having some trouble understanding the choice he made. Why'd he just give it all away?
Lin Daiyu Perhaps the part of Jia Qiu's past we witnessed...
Lin Daiyu ... and the life he lived beyond the hedges of Daguanyuan, of which we do not know...
Lin Daiyu ... have created this schism of understanding between us. The same kind of separation responsible for my misunderstanding.
Ishmael I initially thought he was just some dangerous guy with a lot of hatred in him, but...
Ishmael ... there's definitely something else going on under the surface. It doesn't seem like he's here only to take revenge against Daguanyuan, either...
Sinclair But... I doubt he never considered vengeance. I'm sure he's killed those who took his family away from him again and again in his head.
Sinclair Maybe... maybe he still hasn't let go of it completely.
Sinclair It must take a lot of effort to keep all of that simmering resentment under the surface.
Sinclair muttered in a placid, yet almost imperceptibly trembling voice.
Heathcliff Yeah, I've got no clue what's goin' on in that bloke's mind, but...
Heathcliff He didn't seem like the type to give up so easily.
Outis I agree. We should continue to stay vigilant of his presence.
Rodion Well, anyhoo!
Rodion What really matters is that Xichun's gonna be the next Hierarch!
Rodion And not only that, we came in second in the contest! Mission accomplished, huh?
It appeared to me that Rodya was already in a post-mission mode as though the Golden Bough was already in our hands.
Gregor Ahem, so... I'm just saying, just in case you think we're already out of the woods...
Gregor We should... probably cool it with these early celebrations until we actually accomplished the mission...
Rodion Nah, no way... They wouldn’t boldly lie to our faces like that, would they?
Rodion ... I feel like I just jinxed it.
Sinclair We were really down to the wire this time, to be fair.
Sinclair And I'm not talking about just us—Xichun, too.
Heathcliff Hah. That's why they say it ain't over 'til it's over, lad.
Heathcliff Oi, I think this is a prime opportunity for you to head over to those pompous sods from earlier. Now's your chance to really take the piss out of 'em.
Hong Lu Fuhu, I don't think that's necessary.
Not every candidate we ran into during the Hierarch war was here.
And those who were present were either quietly glaring down at their tables or pulling their hair out and muttering to themselves.

Rodion How's it feel to achieve your lifelong dream? Ooh, what's the first thing ya wanna do, hm?
Gregor I immediately clocked you as a special one when I saw you back at La Manchaland. We weren't half bad as partners, huh?
Yi Sang Let Wei not be excluded from this round of acknowledgements, as he has contributed much in the service of Miss Xichun as well. Your unwavering determination was most inspiring.
Sinclair Yeah, right? Never give up, always see things through to the end!
Don Quixote Verily, verily!!! Thy sentiment rings most true! Thus share the tale of young Xichun and Limbus Company with the rest of the City shall I, so that every soul may one day learn of our adventure most stupendous! I shall personally see to it that every single Citizen hears of it!
Heathcliff Doesn't have to be every soul, you know...

Even Ishmael joined in to impart a sheepish 'congrats'.
But...

... it seemed that, in their excitement, they all failed to realize that Xichun herself was nowhere to be seen.

Dante <I see, thanks... Also, would you mind telling us stuff like that sooner...?>
Heathcliff ... Huh, hold on. I know that bloke...
Heathcliff rolled up his sleeves before striding full-speed toward someone.
Heathcliff Oi, you there. Got anythin' clever to say to our faces now, smartarse?
Sinclair Yeah, smart... guy?
Wang Zhao …….
Wang Zhao Nice to meet you again, and kudos for getting what you came here for. Is that what you wanted to hear?
