Wang Zhao Well, my coins have circulated from hand to hand and landed in the hands of the one who truly deserved them.
Wang Zhao Which clearly wasn't you guys, given that your team's just a runner-up.
Heathcliff You little—
Wang Zhao Let me tell you something as my final token of appreciation.
Wang Zhao Stormclouds are gathering. And it'll be making landfall soon enough.
Ishmael ... Huh? What's that supposed to mean?
Wang Zhao Try to enjoy the party while you can. In no time, you'll find out what everyone's been hiding in their hands.
His concerning reply put a pause on our celebrations. We then slowly observed and took in our surroundings.
People were talking, negotiating in serious, hushed voices. Some were constantly and anxiously running their hands through their hair...
We also noticed some servants running to whisper certain messages to their masters, who in turn jumped to their feet before hurriedly leaving the banquet.
... Looks like we're the only group of people who are even remotely enjoying anything.
Rodion Sure, it's a banquet, but...
Rodion Xichun, our Hierarch girl, isn't even here... everyone's acting all shifty and suspicious...
Rodion This party sucks!
Rodya whined loudly...
... as she chewed on a shrimp with just as much gusto.
Lin Daiyu I… I must express my regrets for this state of affairs.
Daiyu apologized as though she somehow felt responsible for this.
Lin Daiyu Well, I... I do have some minor tricks of my own that could entertain you...
Lin Daiyu I learned a lot of things as a child, blade dance being one of them...
Rodion Ooh, for real? Let's see, let's see.
Ishmael Hey, what the hell! We're here as guests, remember? Don't be a jerk...
??? Hey... Baoyu...
Episode: 46
Location: Daguanyuan - Aojingguan Banquet Hall
It was Xue Baochai who approached us so carefully.
Xue Baochai I'm really glad you're safe. And... congrats on making it as the runner-up.
Her demeanor had completely shifted, her chipper attitude nowhere to be seen. Now, she was more anxious than anything as her eyes darted around nervously.
Xue Baochai But I...
I hadn't known her for too long, but I knew that this wasn't like her.
Xue Baochai ... I know I'm not supposed to tell you this. Mother really pressured me to keep these things a secret. But...
Xue Baochai But I couldn't just keep quiet about this, not with you.
Hong Lu Okay, big sis Baochai. What is it?
Xue Baochai It's, uh...
Her eyes glanced down to her restlessly fidgeting feet, then to Daiyu, then back to her feet.
It was a while before she could look at Hong Lu in his eyes again.
Xue Baochai Baoyu...
Xue Baochai Are you... You know, like mother and Jia Mu said... really going to come back to Daguanyuan and... become engaged to me?
Her eyes dart away as hastily as she wraps up her sentence.
Something tells me that this wasn't what she was really trying to tell Hong Lu. There was something that was left unsaid, like... she made a last-second swerve from what she was really about to say.
Lin Daiyu …….
Hong Lu Yes. If that's what everyone wants.
But there's no hesitation or fear of regret in Hong Lu's reply.
Xue Baochai …….
Xue Baochai …….
Xue Baochai To be with you... It's... almost like you're back here for good.
Xue Baochai ... It's so pretty, isn't it?
Hong Lu Yes, it is.
Xue Baochai Remember...
Xue Baochai Remember when you told me that I smelled fragrant, Baoyu?
Xue Baochai You know, I couldn't stop repeating that to myself once I returned to my room.
Xue Baochai Back then, I always made sure to shower myself with the most expensive perfumes and fragrances of Hongyuan...
Xue Baochai ... except that day, I didn't have the time to put on any of it.
Xue Baochai So, I was in a hurry to return to my chamber. To the place where hundreds of bottles of rare, luxurious perfumes were waiting to shower me with their fragrances.
Xue Baochai And that's when I ran into you.
Xue Baochai …….
Xue Baochai My mother... she sent assassins to kill you, didn't she?
Xue Baochai Why didn't you say anything when you saw me?
Hong Lu Big sis Baochai... many people have tried to hurt me, tried to lure me into a trap.
Hong Lu I could've asked them why they'd say or do something like that. Or why they'd hurt me so.
Hong Lu But even if I did, they wouldn't have told me why, and they wouldn't have treated me any differently had I asked.
Hong Lu So I don't bother asking.
Xue Baochai So I'm... just another one of them... to you.
Xue Baochai No, actually. This isn't what I'm here to talk about.
Baochai smiled again. It was a forced, awkward smile.
Xue Baochai Baoyu... you're the runner-up, right? The results are now locked in.
Xue Baochai So...
Xue Baochai ... now might be a good time for you to leave Daguanyuan. No—you have to leave, right now.
Xue Baochai I don't know what it is that you're looking to find in Daguanyuan's treasury, but you can just send someone from your clan to pick that up later, right?
Lin Daiyu ... Miss Baochai, what is the meaning of this?
Lin Daiyu What is— Is something about to happen here?
Xue Baochai I-I... I've got to go now.
Xue Baochai Mother will realize what I'm doing if I'm gone for too long.
Hong Lu …….
Hong Lu There's a conspiracy to commit treason against Daguanyuan, isn't there?
Baochai was trying her damnedest to find an excuse to retreat from the conversation... until Hong Lu asked her this simple, yet piercing question.
She froze in place, her eyes widened—perhaps out of horror, perhaps out of panic.
Xue Baochai I... I don't know all the details.
Xue Baochai I just overheard mother and the other relatives talking.
Xue Baochai Baoyu, if you stay here, you'll get caught in the crossfire.
Xue Baochai So, so many forces are...
Her eyes restlessly darted left and right through the entire exchange, searching for any listening ears.
... Just what could have made her so afraid?
Hong Lu I can tell you're terribly scared, big sister.
Hong Lu But you've come to warn me anyway?
Xue Baochai …….
Xue Baochai I won't lie, your departure from Daguanyuan is so, so painful.
Xue Baochai But the sheer thought that I could lose you forever is like being stabbed through the heart.
Ishmael Xue... Baochai. I do appreciate that you thought to warn us ahead of time, but...
Ishmael ... you didn't actually tell us anything about how, when, or what the danger is.
Ishmael prodded with a grim voice.
Ishmael You need to tell us what exactly this 'treason' entails.
Ishmael Is someone planning to challenge the results of the Family Hierarch Evaluation? Is it a conspiracy to overturn or nullify the results?
Lin Daiyu Well... excuse my intrusion in this discussion, but...
Lin Daiyu ... I believe that this is as much as Miss Baochai can realistically divulge regarding this matter.
Lin Daiyu Leaking such family intelligence is already an act of treason against her own house. Outsiders may find this difficult to understand, but...
Lin Daiyu ... given the gravity of what she has already shared, you must understand that she has...
Lin Daiyu ... already told you more than she safely could.
Outis Jia Huan... I don't see him here.
Gregor That Jia Qiu guy's not here, either. Fellas, I'm getting a real bad feeling about this...
Faust Given that you have specifically mentioned 'so many forces'...
Faust ... one could come to suspect that you are referring to the presence of forces foreign to Daguanyuan as well.
Faust asked in a low voice.
Xue Baochai That's...
Jia Qiu Yes.
Jia Qiu This is now beyond what Daguanyuan alone can handle.
Lin Daiyu ...! When did he—!
Xue Baochai ... B...big brother Qiu...?
Baochai looked at us, then at Jia Qiu and his faction, then took a few stumbling steps backward.
Xue Baochai I... I really have to leave now, Baoyu. I shouldn't be here anymore.
Lin Daiyu Then... I must excuse myself as well alongside Miss Baochai.
Xue Baochai Please... you have to stay safe.
Jia Qiu Did she advise you to leave Daguanyuan with haste?
He did not look away from Hong Lu even as Baochai hurriedly walked away.
Gaze unshaken, interested in observing no one, nothing else but Hong Lu and his actions.
Dante <…….>
I thought I had a lot of questions to ask Jia Qiu if we were to ever meet again.
But now that he's actually right here, I couldn't recall a single word of it.
Hong Lu Do you... know something, brother?
Zigong My lord—
Zigong tried to butt in, clearly perturbed, but Jia Qiu raised his hand and stopped her.
Jia Qiu You must already be aware that this banquet is but a distraction from the fact that the currents have begun to shift.
Jia Qiu Her advice is sound. It is also true that now is the only time you could escape this place ere the storm arrives, should you wish to save your lives.
Outis ... But I doubt you've come here just to confirm that for us.
Jia Qiu Correct.
Zigong lets out a deep sigh before explaining with a defeated expression.
Zigong Once a Family Hierarch properly ascends to the throne, it becomes a hopeless endeavor to measure when the next great shift in power shall come.
Zigong One must remember that the prospect of a long wait for the next Evaluation, the end of which has not been and will not be in sight, ofttimes stains men's patience with lingering avarice and causes it to fester into possessiveness.
Zigong Is it not the most predictable thing that these rotten, grasping hands are loath to lay down their arms and accept the results with grace? Would those hands not deem it much more favorable to seize and change the results by force?
Rodion Yeah, we all know you read the thesaurus... So, basically, there's a truckload of dumbasses out there who're bent outta shape with how the Family Hierarch war turned out, right? And they wanna change the outcome by force?
Rodion But our one and only Xichun's already been chosen as the Family Hierarch. Like, it's final.
Rodion What happened to the Family Hierarch being the seat of absolute power here? What kinda treason can they even hope to commit if they aren't even willing to flip this old and tired system upside-down?
Zigong …….
Zigong The only things that have been determined are the rankings of the candidates; strictly speaking, we are still waiting for her appointment to be completed.
Rodion ... I'm not too fond of your word games, lady.
Ryoshu Hah.
Ryoshu So that's why I couldn't smell those beasts anymore.
Outis ... I see. I understand now.
Rodion Outi—?
Outis I don't even see a trace of them, even in a place as crowded as this.
Outis The Heishou are gone.
Outis Even the ones that have been following you like shadows.
Zigong ... The measure of might in Hongyuan lies in the number of Heishou Pack branches one wields.
Zigong The Family Hierarch maintains control over at least three of those branches.
Zigong Yet, who holds their leash when the throne of the Hierarch is vacant?
Rodion So, like I said, Xichun's the—
Zigong The gears of your mind are ponderous, slow things to turn, aren't they? Have I not already given you the answer, that her appointment is still underway?
Rodion Huh...? But... Wait, then... who's the Family Hierarch now—
Outis In the brief window between the former Hierarch's abdication and the new Hierarch's ascension... Hongyuan has no lord. Is that correct?
That's when I suddenly recalled what Jia Yuanchun said as she announced the results of the Family Hierarch war.
Location: Daguanyuan - Aojingguan Banquet Hall, Recent Past
Jia Yuanchun The victor will first descend to the Tiekan Temple and pay their respects to our revered elders. Then, upon returning to the surface, they will march to the first floor of Daguanyuan, and assume the seat of the Family Hierarch of Hongyuan.
Location: Daguanyuan - Aojingguan Banquet Hall
Outis Then... what of these masterless Heishou? What are they doing now?
Zigong Nothing.
Zigong And that is precisely what the present predicament revolves around.
Zigong Look around you—do you see how the shadows have descended on every corner of this place? They're the beasts that have melded into the dark for their hushed respites.
Outis So all Heishou branches are currently... neutral.
Rodion Wait, wait. Then...
Rodion ... does that mean Daguanyuan becomes completely vulnerable every time this happens?
Zigong ... No. This would not have come to pass had a different individual been made to ascend.
Zigong Jia Xichun, that girl has... no substantial foundation, a base, to call her own. What clan she did have prior to the Evaluation, scattered to nothingness like grains of sand in a gust.
Zigong It is entirely reasonable to assume that, as long as the Hierarch-to-be is yet to gain control of her Heishou Pack branches, they have a good chance of overthrowing her.
Dante <…!>
Zilu My lord.
Zilu The Whisper Office has arrived as well.
Jia Qiu ... I see.
Dante <Things were way more dire than I'd thought...>
But what's Jia Qiu doing here chatting us up now, of all times?
Jia Qiu Pay attention.
Jia Qiu There are those who seek to enter here, and those who seek to stop them.
Location: -1
Jia Qiu R Corp.'s 2nd Pack,
Jia Qiu X Corp.'s Expedition Order of Excavators,
Jia Qiu The Thumb's underboss, the accompanying Capo, his Soldatos, and their various subsidiaries.
Jia Qiu Then there are the Jialan Guards(賈藍隊), the indigo guardians of the Jia family,
Jia Qiu K Corp.'s Special Excision Unit,
Jia Qiu N Corp.'s New League of Nine Littérateurs...
Jia Qiu ... and numerous other Fixers and clans.
Jia Qiu And those are just the ones that I have been informed of.
Jia Qiu Most of them are waiting, biding their time outside the walls of Daguanyuan, or are soon to arrive...
Jia Qiu ... but the Thumb's forces are already engaged in melee with my army.
Location: Daguanyuan - Aojingguan Banquet Hall
Jia Qiu Some factions of the Wang family have joined the defenders, but it is uncertain how much longer they can hold out.
Zigong And should the de facto leaders of each of the major families say the word, it is likely that R Corp., K Corp., and X Corp. may soon choose their own sides in this war.
Gregor … What?
Outis ... Is that reliable intel? Why would they—
Jia Qiu Many here believe that the title of the Family Hierarch is simply a different name for the lord of Hongyuan.
Jia Qiu It is a belief that many forces beyond Hongyuan's walls share.
Ishmael In other words...
Ishmael This isn't just about Daguanyuan. There are forces from the other Nests and Districts seeking to sponsor a different, prospective Hierarch, to expand their sphere of influence here.
Zigong ... Correct.
...The cigarette slipped from Gregor’s fingers. Outis’s face darkened with a grimness I’d never seen in her before.
Don Quixote Eight... nine... I-I have thus counted over nine different powerful factions among the ones thou hast mentioned...
This is... too much.
Zigong As fortune would have it, only the Thumb has deemed it appropriate to act.
Zigong But Lei Heng, the Capo of the Thumb, poses the greatest threat. He is one of the Ten Blades of the East, and... his might is formidable to any foe.
Ryoshu Haah...
Jia Qiu I shall meet him in battle, as planned.
Jia Qiu He must be the one leading the charge against the gates.
Outis If what you say here is true, then this is no mere treason within a Wing.
Outis hissed in a low, menacing voice.
Outis Which family spearheads this treachery? How many Wings are backing them?
Jia Qiu Nothing is certain at present. The tangle of allegiances and bloodlines is a knot that cannot be undone until the dust has settled.
Jia Qiu It will only take a single, whistling arrow for chaos to engulf Hongyuan. The forces that have gathered here have drawn their bows, and the moment one of them lets loose... it will only be a matter of time before it becomes a full-scale war.
Jia Qiu And when it does, the crack that has formed in the walls of Hongyuan will widen; vultures of the City will smell the rot and tear into the wound to pilfer the Boluses and their recipes.
Jia Qiu The Smiling Faces, The Corpse Corps, the Yakshas...
Jia Qiu I must also emphasize that the Ring will never let such an opportunity slip.
Yi Sang This conflict will utterly lay waste to the lives of the common folk in Hongyuan... The fire has already conflagrated beyond a competition amongst candidates.
Jia Qiu That is why this fissure must be mended ere it spreads. Should the throne of the Hierarch remain vacant, should this instability be prolonged, then...
Outis ... the Wings will march to war.
Gregor ... No, no way. I don't believe this, tsk.
Outis The consequences will be about as far-reaching, at the very least.
Jia Qiu ... Such is the weight of Hongyuan's Family Hierarch.
Jia Qiu It holds as much power to save countless lives as it does to take them.
...The banquet hall was quickly starting to become barren as people began to hurry away.
I don't have any direct memories of a Wing War, but... even I could feel the prickly goosebumps rising from my skin. The air in the hall was quickly turning razor sharp.
Hong Lu Then... brother, what is it that you expect us to do?
Jia Qiu I am of the belief that all of you are, collectively, the key to overcoming this tribulation.
Hong Lu ... The key?
Jia Qiu Hurry her ascension to the throne.
Jia Qiu Jia Xichun should still be at the Tiekan Temple where the Xianren reside, preparing for the ritual of ascension.
Jia Qiu Given that the "Xianren" must be utterly oblivious to the circumstances outside their chamber, there is no way of knowing the time it might take for them to officially name her the next Hierarch.
Zigong And they will not be swift, as entry to their chamber is permitted only to the Family Hierarch. There is no one to relay this message to them.
Jia Qiu But there is another.
Jia Qiu There is another who is permitted to enter the Temple.
Hong Lu …….
Jia Qiu Jia Baoyu.
Jia Qiu When the Hierarch takes the throne, and seizes the leash of her rightful Heishou Packs...
Jia Qiu ... she should have more than enough might to ward Daguanyuan against the invaders.
Jia Qiu And when the invading forces realize that the Family Hierarch has returned, they will retreat; the spark of war should shrink enough to be snuffed out with a stomp.
Zigong My lord...
Zigong I must beg your forgiveness, for there is still doubt in my heart.
Zigong How can he... be the key?
Zigong My lord, I know you not to be one to engage in such gambles...
Jia Qiu It is better to gamble than to allow this opportunity to slip away in vain.
Zigong Yet I must beg your forgiveness once again, for I insist that your mere presence here is a waste of time.
Zigong You mustn't tarry downstream—we must rise to the fountainhead and cut off the stream from its origin...
Zigong looked at us and Jia Qiu anxiously.
Jia Qiu You needn't consider this a waste.
Jia Qiu For it is a worthy task in my eyes.
Zigong ... Had you followed the blueprint of the painting I had initially drawn for the Family Hierarch war...
Zigong ... we would have already arrived at Tiekan Temple via... 'alternative methods'.
Ishmael Alternative... methods?
Jia Qiu ... Zigong. That would not have resolved anything; it would have only caused further loss, no more.
Jia Qiu And I wish to make one thing clear.
Jia Qiu That this is but an offer; a plea, not a command.
Jia Qiu For one mustn't do what does not move their heart.
Jia Qiu However, Jia Baoyu...
Jia Qiu You may not have realized this, but...
Jia Qiu ... I have already gambled once with you as my hand during the Family Hierarch war.
Jia Qiu I sought to draw your true humanity forth, to have you wear it on the outside.
Jia Qiu And the reply you gave me then, the one that emerged from behind the obscuring veil of clouds, was proof enough that it was certainly no waste of my time.
Hong Lu ... Why do you seek to involve yourself in the politics of Hongyuan, brother?
Hong Lu Neither Hongyuan nor Daguanyuan bind you any longer, not by cause or force.
Jia Qiu ... It was a long undertaking for me to uncover the truth of the ruin that came to the Kong family.
Jia Qiu At first, my heart was engulfed in fiery wrath.
Jia Qiu Daguanyuan had to be uprooted from the ground. For that, every single person of power or influence in Daguanyuan had to be killed, their throats slit in vengeance...
Jia Qiu ... Or so I thought, once.
Jia Qiu But I learned, from a worthy teacher.
Jia Qiu That is when... I realized this wrath was burning my body to ash.
Hong Lu Then... did your fiery wrath... extinguish?
Jia Qiu Had I truly attained enlightenment, found all there was to understand of the nature of this world, Jia Baoyu...
Jia Qiu ... then I would not have given you the power to elect the Hierarch.
Hong Lu …….
Jia Qiu I am still but a student, a seeker of the answer.
Jia Qiu Yet... I do not wish to let chaos devour this land when I have the means to save it.
Jia Qiu Thus, once again I ask you.
Jia Qiu When you decided to relinquish the coins to Jia Xichun...
Jia Qiu ... what was it that moved your heart?
Hong Lu …….
Jia Qiu Certainly, your heart had changed enough then not to simply hand them over for the simple reason that she desired them.
Hong Lu You must know this already, brother, but...
Hong Lu The children of Daguanyuan have no such thing as birthdays, save for myself.
Hong Lu When a child is born, they aren't celebrated—they are hidden, concealed for years in the dark, so that the competition wouldn't take notice of a new rival...
Hong Lu Xichun was one of those children who had never experienced a birthday before. She didn't even know what it meant.
Hong Lu So, when we were young... whenever grandmother would hold a banquet to celebrate the day of my birth...
Hong Lu I dedicated that day to Xichun.
Hong Lu Because it's nice to have your existence celebrated once every year, for no other reason than the fact that you exist.
Hong Lu But when I stopped leaving my room... when Xichun and I grew distant... the secret birthday parties we shared also came to an end.
Hong Lu She probably doesn't remember any of it now. She was too young then.
Hong Lu But if I could gift this to her, to make up for all those lost years...
Hong Lu ... then I thought... maybe she would be happy again, just as she was then.
Location: Evaluation Arena B2, Recent Past
Jia Xichun Now that I’m looking at these piles of coins, it feels like…
Jia Xichun It feels like I’m looking at all the rooms of Daguanyuan. I used to hate that sight so much as a kid…
Jia Xichun Can I... can I really be a good Hierarch to Hongyuan?
Location: -1
Did Xichun like the gift, as Hong Lu wanted her to?
... We had no way of knowing.
Location: Daguanyuan - Aojingguan Banquet Hall
Hong Lu Does that answer satisfy you, brother?
Jia Qiu It was not your answer that I had sought.
Jia Qiu It was to see the way your heart stirs—and that was proof enough.
Hong Lu …….
Jia Qiu I had never met these 'Xianren', the self-proclaimed 'Enlightened Ones', before, as I was not permitted entry into Tiekan Temple. But I know of their existence.
Jia Qiu And what I have come to learn in my observation of Hongyuan, and then the City itself, gave me certain ideas of what form the Hierarch ascension ritual might take.
Jia Qiu ... Had you not surrendered yourself, you could have deduced what the ritual entails.
Hong Lu Are you saying that... something bad may happen to Xichun?
Jia Qiu This may be a hasty speculation. From a certain perspective, this may simply constitute a rightful ascension of the new Hierarch.
Jia Qiu But I want you to be there, to behold with your own eyes what it entails.
Jia Qiu My wager in this gamble was that you indeed had the potential to achieve that purpose...
Jia Qiu ... and that the faint warmth in your heart I had once seen still gently burned.
Hong Lu You... want me to achieve your purpose, brother?
Jia Qiu No, your own purpose would not be the same as my own. Such a pursuit would be devoid of meaning.
Hong Lu …….
Jia Qiu The decision is yours.
Jia Qiu So decide.
Episode: 47
Location: Daguanyuan - Aojingguan Banquet Hall
Jia Qiu and his forces left the banquet hall to assess the situation, leaving only me and the Sinners there.
Outis Our only remaining task is to receive the Golden Bough that we are owed. That much is a given.
Outis Retrieve it, and our mission here is done. We only need to wait for the LCA for extraction.
Outis ... None of you know, let alone understand what a war of the Wings is like. To rush out into these unknown waters is nothing short of imprudence. We must not entertain this idea.
Don Quixote Alas, if our meager strength may be sufficient to prevent this war and save the lives of many innocents...
Don Quixote ... then... I wish to do as that man hath said.
Outis No, it is in our best interest that we do not get involved.
Outis Don Quixote, I will speak to you plainly, as I trust that you have regained some sense as to how this world works. War is not just another incident or a quest to be resolved. Your sense of justice may shine like a beacon in times of unrest, but...
Outis ... war... will crush and grind it into the dirt indiscriminately as it does any life caught under its bootheels.
Don Quixote Lady Outis. I have also lived through my share of wars. Even still, Jia Qiu's path is that of justice—thus, he shall have my support.
Outis How are you still so—!
Don Quixote To fight for the pursuit of justice deserveth not thy scorn nor ridicule!
Don Quixote 'Tis no short-sighted tantrum—'tis but mine adherence to, and pursuit of, a certain responsibility of those who can!
Outis …….
Gregor Outis. I've also had my share of the war. So hopefully you'll let me put my two Ahns in.
Gregor Battles and wars aren't the same thing, either... You can't see the crashing waves of intense emotions in battles when looking at it as a great flow of war.
Gregor But all that built-up heat is what becomes a flow, not the other way around. It never is.
Outis …….
Yi Sang Jia Qiu wished to convey to us that the levees are beginning to crack; that the fractures must be filled forthwith afore they rupture.
Yi Sang While the words you speak may contrast one another...
Yi Sang ... the intent that pushed the both of you to speak is shared; that the war mustn't conflagrate beyond what has already occurred.
Outis ... It is.
Gregor Yeah, exactly. Thanks for summing it up, Yi Sang.
Meursault Outis's assessment would have been correct had the discussion concerning our participation been about a war that has already progressed beyond a certain degree.
Meursault However, accepting Jia Qiu's suggestion and preventing the war from expanding beyond localized skirmishes could bring greater benefits than avoiding it altogether.
Rodion Yeah. This could also give them the opportunity to destroy and uproot all the...
Rodion ... inequities of Hongyuan.
Rodion Wellll~ I dunno if that's what Hong Lu wants, though.
Sinclair B-but... even if Jia Qiu and his people are strong... there's just too many of them. Do we really have a chance against all of them?
Ishmael If I'm being honest... we simply can't know. We don't have the time to meticulously analyze every facet of this situation.
Yi Sang …….
Yi Sang Manager of ours, if I may...
Yi Sang carefully began as the Sinners' opinions began to clash and fracture.
Yi Sang As you must have observed, the Sinners fail to find a common ground.
Yi Sang However, though narrow my vision may be, it appears to me that there is not a single Sinner whose insight is born solely from their emotions.
Yi Sang There is sound reason behind every suggestion that has heretofore been presented; thus, it is difficult to gauge the validity of each of them. This must not be an easy decision for you.
Yi Sang Thus...
Yi Sang paused, taking his time to carefully select his next words.
Then, after a subtle nod, he continued.
Yi Sang Dante, perhaps... this judgment belongs to Hong Lu.
Dante <…….>
Yi Sang Perhaps I speak at the risk of not knowing my own station. However...
Yi Sang ... should we allow this opportunity to slip away, Hong Lu may never leave that smile of his behind.
Dante <…!>
Yi Sang You must see it as well.
Yi Sang That Hong Lu's smile is but a different shape of sorrow for those who have no tears left to shed.
What Yi Sang was trying to tell me was clear as day.
So what I must do, must consider, as the manager...
... isn't a discussion of wars and battles. It's not pragmatism or the measurement of the pros and cons.
... A manager has to support their team.
Dante <Faust.>
Faust ... Once again, I have nothing to offer but objective information and suggestions strictly from the corporate perspective.
Faust Dante, given your position as the manager of the LCB team, it is recommended that you continue to follow the plan outlined by the LCCB, retrieve the Golden Bough, and quickly arrange a safe extraction for you and your team without unnecessarily involving your team in a high-risk operation.
Dante <That’s…>
Faust However.
Dante <…?>
Faust continues... slowly.
Faust But if you...
Faust ... believe that you possess enough persistence to endure all that it entails, and if you believe that your role is to lead them, and us... to the right path, then...
Faust ... I will follow your lead.
Dante <... Thank you.>
Now the answer must come from Hong Lu's own mouth.
Hong Lu Looks like things really got out of control.
Hong Lu Sorry, Dante.
Dante <Hey, earlier... during your dialogue with Jia Qiu...>
Dante <... The conclusion you arrived at didn't come out of nowhere, did it? There must've been something that brought you there.>
In that long, long conversation, Hong Lu was finally able to give an answer of his own.
And the biggest reason he could was...
Hong Lu At first...
Hong Lu I didn't think that I'd be able to give a real answer to brother Qiu's questions.
Hong Lu But suddenly, like a thick fog clearing...
Hong Lu ... something emerged from the haze of forgotten memories past.
Hong Lu What I gave as an answer was that something, and... I realized what it was only after it had left my mouth.
Hong Lu That word must've been burrowed deep within me for a long, long time.
Kindness.
Because I wanted to believe that kindness was enough. That it could truly bring change to Hongyuan.
Dante <... This is not about us. It's about you and Hongyuan's future.>
Dante <So I think I'll leave the decision up to you.>
Hong Lu was never the type to clearly state his beliefs.
He usually did as I asked without question, without even the smallest complaint.
He did not speak of pain when he suffered, nor did he cry to us from agony.
His eyes remained unshaken even as he witnessed the countless deaths and injustices committed before him.
The eye that lets everything float away.
The accepting eye of someone who has resigned himself to the reality that everything that exists has an end.
Hong Lu …….
I wait patiently for him to speak.
Hong Lu Dante, I...
Hong Lu, who only ever quietly accepted whatever life threw at him...
Hong Lu ... I want to go to Tiekan Temple.
Hong Lu Where Xichun and the elders... where the Xianren are.
Hong Lu I think Xichun might be in danger.
Dante <Danger, as in... her life might be at risk?>
Hong Lu No, I think... I think her life might be the only thing that's not in danger.
Hong Lu Thinking back to what brother Qiu told me...
Hong Lu I'm... afraid. That I might lose the Xichun I know forever.
For the first time, he speaks of the path he wishes to walk.
Hong Lu's jade eye gazes beyond the walls of Daguanyuan.
Hong Lu Like brother Qiu said, at this moment, I'm the only one who can freely open the gates of the Tiekan Temple.
Hong Lu I want to be there to watch Xichun become the Hierarch, so that, if something dangerous were to happen... I can put a stop to it.
Dante <Okay, sounds like a plan.>
Outis ... I had a feeling that this would be your decision, Executive Manager.
Outis Our judgments are shaped by our upbringings and environments...
Outis ...so, for you, Executive Manager, who has only the time spent with the rest of us to reflect on, it is understandable how you could come to this conclusion.
Dante <I... keep disappointing you, don't I?>
Outis You haven't. ... Not yet.
Outis replies sternly.
Heathcliff Well... it ain't much our style to just sod off after pickin' up the Golden Bough, innit?
Ishmael That's... yeah, you're right...
Ishmael agrees with Heathcliff for the first time since forever.
Gregor Well, I know I might've come across as kinda harsh or snappy earlier, but... hey, there weren't any hard feelings, Outis.
Outis ... I would have kicked you in the shin had I considered your entire speech to be senseless drivel.
Gregor Heh.
Outis and Gregor, whose stances were always diametrically opposed, have stopped shooting bitter remarks at each other.
... We're all growing more familiar with each other.
Dante <... Perfect. Then let's do this.>
And in that strange air, we found our purpose.
Jia Qiu I will send out my best blade, Zilu, in the same direction.
Jia Qiu She will not accompany you, but she will rendezvous at your destination nonetheless.
Heathcliff Didn't you say earlier that the Heishou's all become masterless or somethin'?
Jia Qiu ... It is a long story. Let me just say that Zilu is an exception.
Ishmael Hold on, what about you...?
Jia Qiu At the moment, stopping the underboss and his primary officer, Lei Heng, is the most pressing concern. Zigong and I will take to the main battlefield at the gates of Daguanyuan and stall them.
The plan was now in motion; there was nothing more to discuss.
And we both walk away, to our destinations in opposite directions.
Zigong ... My lord, I have seen that smile many times in the past.
Zigong That is the smile of a hollow shell.
Zigong Do you truly believe that a man such as him is capable of moving in genuine dedication to the cause?
Jia Qiu Each heart has a different cause that moves them.
Jia Qiu How can one speak of the fathoms of a lake when all they have seen is the water's surface?
Zigong …….

Location: Way Down to Tiekan Temple

Episode: 49
Location: Way Down to Tiekan Temple

Outis Hmph, gathering an army is the easy part.

Hong Lu I wouldn't even know where I'd begin.
Outis …….
This seemed like the perfect moment for Outis to brag about her experience, but she fell silent at that remark.
Heathcliff There ain't anything too complicated about it, mate. If it's shite, it's shite. Don't think twice about it.
Heathcliff Like the lad does.
Sinclair ... Like me?
For a while, Sinclair continued to ask Heathcliff if he really was talking about him.
Hong Lu I haven't ever walked down this hallway accompanied by so many other people...
Hong Lu I usually walked alone.
Rodion Why? Didn'tcha take your servants with you?
Hong Lu Sometimes, I did. Because I was scared to go there alone. But...
Hong Lu ... I learned something as I grew older.
Hong Lu It's that my heart is most at ease when walking down this road alone.
Dante <... Why?>
I imagined Hong Lu, slowly walking down this hallway alone with a dark expression.
... It wasn't a pleasant sight.
Hong Lu Tiekan Temple...
Hong Lu I was the only one who was allowed to freely enter and exit. The Family Hierarch can technically be let inside, but...
Hong Lu ... even grandmother couldn't enter without their summon.
Gregor W-wait, Jia Qiu wasn't being metaphorical?
Heathcliff So... why are they called the Xianren...? Are they actually some supernaturally enlightened blokes or something?
Hong Lu Yes. They endured the time of suffering, opened their eyes to the secret to freedom from aging and death, and eventually attained Enlightenment, earning themselves the exalted title of 'the Xianren'.
Rodion But is that even... possible? What happened to them still searching for the answer to 'true immortality'?

Sinclair At least this place... feels much more tranquil than the world outside. It's quiet. And it smells nice, too.

Hong Lu Not many people know the actual path to reach Tiekan Temple.
Hong Lu But at least there's less chance of us running into any outside forces here.
Rodion ... Can we not with the foreshadowing?
Episode: 50
Location: Passageway to Tiekan Temple
Unfortunately, it was indeed a foreshadowing.
... It didn't take very long before another faction appeared before us.

Hong Lu Because we have a place to be.
Hong Lu What are you doing here?
Xue Family Captain ... You're working for Jia Qiu, aren't you?
Xue Family Captain Trying to visit the revered Xianren? You're trying to speed up the Hierarch ascension ritual, aren't you?
Outis Nice try. Ask the right questions, and we'll just tell you all about our plans, won't we? Greenhorn...
Outis I know you're all lost. You've probably been going in circles for hours by now.
Xue Family Captain ... Yeah, this place is irritatingly large.
Xue Family Captain Just point us in the right direction and go back the way you came, and I won't give chase.
Xue Family Captain Give up on your ridiculous idea of ushering in that hopelessly inadequate girl as the Family Hierarch.
Ishmael We already heard that one before.
Ishmael Might wanna get some new material.
Episode: 51
Location: Passageway to Tiekan Temple
Outis So tell me. Who's your master?
Xue Family Captain …….
Xue Family Captain You two... you've been in a war, haven't you?
Outis ... No need to deny that, I suppose.
Gregor You can still tell, huh...?
Outis And I learned many, many things in my war.
Outis A few hundred ways to convince a grunt to talk, for example.
Xue Family Captain ... Too bad.
Xue Family Captain Because unlike you, I have but one way to keep my mouth shut.
The man who appeared to be leading the soldiers stabbed himself in the chest without hesitation.
Outis …….
Outis So he'd kill himself without even a moment's hesitation to protect his master's name...
Outis ... His master must be a formidable individual.
Hong Lu Or... it could also be that he was under the influence of a suicide Worm—an Anamnaworm that activates on an information trigger to manipulate the host's psyche to take their own life.
Noticing that there was a previously unseen, serious look in Hong Lu's eyes, we forged onward.
Episode: 52
Location: Passageway to Tiekan Temple
Gregor …!

... That incomprehensible exchange between the pair was soon followed by the sight of a severed tongue rolling in the dirt.

Outis But now I know that it was never a strategic 'decision' at all, but a brainless obsession of idiots who refuse to decide for themselves.
The Thumb Henchman ... Let's see if you can keep babbling like that when we cut off your tongue.
Episode: 53
Location: Bridge to Tiekan Temple

There was a small hill in front of the bridge leading into Tiekan Temple.

Hong Lu They're Xichun's mercenaries.
... There was a small hill of bodies, all of them mangled and broken to the point we couldn't even tell how many of them there were.

And the heavily wounded figure in front of him was...
Sinclair Wei...!
Wei ... We don't... ever seem to meet in fine circumstances, do we...?

Lei Heng Ya know, I was kinda excited 'bout this showdown, given that he's supposed to be this... Adept of the Heishou - pony branch or whatever. He ain't hot shit without that poison in 'im, huh?

Outis And it seems that Jia Qiu sending Zilu alongside us was an insurance for this exact scenario.

And as if on cue, Zilu arrived.
She was covered from head to toe in blood, but I could easily guess that the blood wasn't hers.

Lei Heng Naw, girl’s gotta head back to the main house and park herself on that throne to wrap up her ascension. Me? I just gotta catch 'er before that.

Lei Heng The concept of manners alien to y'all?

Lei Heng Real disrespectful of ya'll to sit there jawin', shootin’ the breeze with me like I’m one o’ yer buddies.

Hong Lu Excuse me, I've got something to ask.
Lei Heng ... Hwell, alrighty. Young master Baoyu of the mighty Jia family's got 'nuff clout to talk to my face without makin' things awkward.
Lei Heng Well? Yammer on, then.
Hong Lu Is there a reason you haven't killed Mister Wei just yet?
Hong Lu This setup you have here makes me think that... you'd like for us to negotiate.
Lei Heng Negoti-ate... Hot damn.
Lei Heng Negotiation's usually done on equal ground, ain't it? Kinda funny of y'all from Limbus Company to call it that.
Lei Heng Aw, heck. I guess you ain't wrong.
Lei Heng But here's the thing—I just ain't got a clue as to how important this sonofagun is to y'all.
Lei Heng He's still breathin', that's for sure, but I dunno if he'll be any good for a negotiation... tsk. Bein' a Heishou Adept don't mean much if he can't do shit, don't it? Got some kinda weird curse on ya or something?
Zilu Speak.
Zilu, who's been standing beside us in silence this whole time, suddenly spoke up.
Zilu What do you want?
Her voice was so deep, cavernous, and sincere, that...
... it almost made me think that she really was going to give him whatever he wanted in return for Wei.
Lei Heng Ya got a real convincing voice, don'tcha? That gets me in the mood, I'll tell ya hwat.
Lei Heng Yeah, well... what I want...
Lei Heng I want you, ya pesky rabbit.
Zilu …….
Ishmael Don't tell me you want Zilu to die for—
Lei Heng Aw, 'course not. I ain't that shameless.
Outis Then...?
Lei Heng Lemme cut ya up. Just one slice.
Lei Heng Don't matter what comes next—bite it, don't bite it, fight me... don't matter. Take a single cut from my blade and I'll hand over the feller.
Lei Heng Aw, c'mon, girl. Don'tcha look at me like that! You know how this is! I've been in this business long enough to know, huh?
Lei Heng Fair fight! Duels! Love 'em! Would love nothing more than to do 'em! But the things bein' what they are... it's a no-can-do kinda situation.
Lei Heng We're both hired guns, ain't we? Yanno we gotta do what we gotta do.
Lei Heng Y'see, honey bunny, I ain’t so sure I like my odds goin’ up against a direct counter.
Ryoshu Shithead. You haven't changed.
Lei Heng That so? Heh heh.
Ryoshu He'll cut you in half. Guaranteed.
Ryoshu Just admit you want to kill her... hah. Doesn't your tongue ever get tired of being a part of you?
Lei Heng Ain’t ya one of them students learnin' stuff from Jia Qiu? Heard tell y’all been usin’ some kinda strange technique from out yonder.
Lei Heng 'Shin(心)', wassit? Usin' some energy protection technique, right? 'Parently you'll become tough as augmentations they say.
Lei Heng And ya convert that 'Shin' or whatever into strength to make light rings 'round your body parts or weapons, and that's 'sposed to be 'Mang(望)', am I right?
Lei Heng I've been tryna learn how that thing works... 'been waiting for an opportunity to test it out. Purdy sure I can make one Mang by now.
Lei Heng I wanna see ya try your own against mine, see.
Lei Heng looked at Zilu with a shit-eating grin.
Zilu …….
We don't know Zilu. We're barely even acquaintances. There's no way she'd risk her life for people who are essentially strangers.
And what about Wei? Do they even know each other? I seriously doubt he's as close to her as he is to us.
... And it might sound cold, but even we're not really that close to Wei, either...
Dante <…….>
I can't bring myself to ask her to risk her life like that.
He's probably not kidding, either.
Lei Heng's surrounded by at least a few dozen bodies... but there's not even a scratch on him.
Wei …….
Wei struggles to speak through labored breaths.
... But his eyes tell me that he's already accepted his fate.
Wei I only need...
Wei ... I only need my lady to be safe. This... catastrophe was entirely my fault... if I'd paid more attention to our surroundings...
Wei She won't have anyone when I'm gone... Please, keep her safe...
Instead of begging for his life, Wei asks us to look after Jia Xichun instead.
As he's always done...
Zilu Is Wei...
Zilu looks at Hong Lu.
Zilu ... important to you?
Hong Lu …….
Truth be told, Wei probably isn’t all that important to Hong Lu.
Wei was Jia Xichun's loyal follower, and that was pretty much it. Hong Lu said he hadn't interacted much with him back in Daguanyuan, either.
But... I imagine that Hong Lu...
... would probably rather not see the people he cares about shed any more tears. He'd seen more than enough of that since the annihilation of the Kong family.
And that goes for us, too. Can we really cut him off, just like that?
We hadn't talked to him very much, but we'd spent a pretty significant amount of time together. And quietly, we've grown to care more about him.
We learned more about who he was. About the kind of person his master, Jia Xichun, was.
Whenever we ran into them in all kinds of odd places, we were happy to meet them. And we really wanted them to do well.
We... didn't want either of them to die.
And they were the first allies we'd ever made of our own volition, no matter how short-lived that alliance was.
... If we let him kill Wei here, we'd...
... we'd be adding another regret to our pasts, knowing that we'd let someone down again...
... As we are reminded every time we meet Saude and see her subtle yet noticeable sadness.
We'll blame ourselves, we'll resent our weakness, we won't stop thinking about how we could've prevented this if we were stronger.
We've died and killed countless times on our journey here, but death is the kind of force that swoops in our moments of dejection to remind us that we can never get used to it.
Zilu Speak.
I know. I know we can't save everyone.
I've seen enough deaths of our friends, allies, and those who could've been friends to know that.
There wasn't any reason Wei should be special. I wasn't making some promise with myself to never let anyone even remotely close to us die again, either.
But...
But Hong Lu...
Hong Lu I...
Hong Lu ... I want Mister Wei to live.
Hong Lu And I don't want Xichun... to be sad when we meet again.
Zilu …….
Hong Lu I know you don't have any reason to listen to me, Zilu, but—
Zilu Okay.
Zilu didn't even let Hong Lu finish. She strode up to Lei Heng.
Zilu Cut me down, Tiantui Star, the Winged Tiger Chachihu.
Lei Heng ... Huh!
Lei Heng Very well, Tianjiu Star, the Unrestrained Meizhelan.
Ishmael Wait, what are you—
Flame bursts forth, wreathing Lei Heng's intimidating podao, then rises into a raging pillar of fire before a single ring of light materializes around it.
On the other hand, a warm, comforting light, presumably the same light Lei Heng mentioned earlier, began to radiate and shimmer from Zilu's body.
Lei Heng I am Lei Heng. Capo of the Thumb, one of the Ten Blades of the East. I will now cut you down with all my might.
Zilu Do you intend to cut me with your tongue?
And as though on cue, Lei Heng slashed at Zilu's unmoving body with a diagonal cut.
Dante <…!>
The sheer wind pressure and the heat from the slash... it was powerful enough to push some of us back.
But...
Zilu was still standing, silently as she had been.
Lei Heng Hot diggity... Know I wasn't goin' for the head, but it's some miracle ya managed to survive that hit.
Lei Heng That 'Shin' thingamajig's one mighty sturdy thing, ain't it? My hand's all tingly.
Lei Heng Hwell... it still ain't quite invincibility, is it?
Lei Heng Yer barely hangin' on... ain't ya?
Blood burst from Zilu the moment Lei Heng asked, and...
Hong Lu Miss Zilu...!
Hong Lu ran up to Zilu to stop her fall.
Hong Lu Miss Zilu...
Hong Lu Why did you...?
Zilu Because it sufficed.
Zilu The reply that you did not wish to see the one you care dearly for, sad.
Zilu continues resolutely, despite the gushing blood.
Zilu And that is the 'true humanity' that I have learned... my path of justice, my humanity.
Zilu I'll leave the rest to you, clock.
Dante <…….>
This woman, whom I'd not even exchanged a single word with, calls me a friendly nickname.
When her own life's on the line.
Lei Heng Hoo-ie! Finally got that annoyin' bunny outta the way.
Lei Heng Awrighty, I'm a man o' my word, and she knows it. That's why she let me cut 'er up so good.
With that, Lei Heng kicked Wei in our direction.
Lei Heng Take 'im. Three, four months of recovery and he should be back on his feet.
Lei Heng Well... if ya survive me today, that is.
Lei Heng Yer gonna take the young master and get that door open, ain't ya?
Lei Heng Hwell, then...
Lei Heng begins walking in our direction, cracking his neck.
Lei Heng ... y'all ready to go a round?
Lei Heng Should be able to wrap this up by the time they're done with the ritual thing.
Lei Heng C'mon... Let's dance.
Location: Bridge to Tiekan Temple
Lei Heng Shoot, ya sure this is everything y'all got?
He's overwhelmingly powerful.
So this is a Capo of the Thumb... and one of the Ten Blades of the East.
I had to admit it. We simply don't have enough power to defeat him yet... especially with him coming at us with the intent to kill.
Ryoshu That sword... Just as enticing as always.
I think back to one of our previous battles... Don Quixote of La Manchaland. He was undeniably a more powerful foe than Lei Heng.
There's a significant gulf of power between them two, I can sense it.
But we're struggling against him so much more...
... because unlike Don Quixote, this guy's actually trying to kill us.
His jocular demeanor seems to imply that to him, this was just another day at work, but...
... he's got no intentions of toying with us... he's going for the kill.
Didn't know that could make this much of a difference.
There was so much that separated him from the rest of us—his sheer physical strength, experience and skill, not to mention the powerful armor and the apparently famous weapon...
All of that combined into one became a wall that stood between us and our goal.
At least...
If we can somehow fight on equal ground...
Hong Lu Dante... What... should we try next?
Hong Lu asks with a slightly exhausted voice, but...
... he is smiling still.
That's strange.
Hong Lu's never been the first one to ask the questions or share his opinions with the rest of us.
He'd reply to others' questions, or share a few detached observations when we were at an impasse, but...
Dante <Hong Lu.>
This is probably a bad time to ask him this, but...
I had a burning question that needed to be answered.
Dante <Why... did you ask that?>
Dante <I mean, what I'm asking is— hm.>
Dante <Whatever I'm throwing at him doesn't seem to be working, and while I can keep bringing you guys back...>
Hong Lu I think... I think I know what you mean.
Hong Lu But... I don't really know why I asked.
That was an odd thing to say, but Hong Lu's expression did not seem confused or complicated at all.
His eyes carried that sense of freedom of someone looking far off into the distant horizon.
Hong Lu I felt the window open slightly ajar in a dark, stuffy room.
Hong Lu Muffled noises have finally found a place to go, and a pleasant breeze has drifted through my room...
Hong Lu ... and it carried me away to someplace else, little by little.
His eyes focus on me.
Hong Lu Maybe that wind is why I became curious of your thoughts... and why I asked you about them, Dante.
Dante <... But...>
Dante <I don't know what to do anymore. I don't know what more I can do to get past this monster...>
Hong Lu Dante.
Hong Lu When you said you wanted me to make the decision...
Hong Lu ... did you expect that it would be this difficult?
Dante <... No. I didn't. Not like this.>
Hong Lu Then, did you think that this task would be nothing more than a breeze?
Dante <... Of course not.>
Hong Lu But you gave me a chance to choose for myself anyway.
Dante <That's...>
Dante <That’s because I had faith that it was the right thing to do.>
Dante <…!>
Hong Lu Hehe.
Hong Lu You already know, don't you?
I didn't have a clue as to what Hong Lu was going to do, but...
... I believed that his choice would be correct.
That's why he...
Hong Lu Even if you feel lost, even if you're not sure of our options now, Dante...
Hong Lu ... I have faith that you will be able to find a different path.
Hong Lu That's what the gentle breeze whispered to me as it tickled my back.
... That's why Hong Lu trusted me.
Very well... then.
Dante <Under mercy, all shall be made equal...>
Lei Heng Huhh...? Hwat in tarnation...?
Dante <By entering a contract with me, the Sinners' strengths were all raised up or dragged down to a similar level... despite the disparity before that.>
Dante <If we're in an unfair fight... all we need to do is level the playing field.>
Lei Heng Hah! No darn clue just what happened, but ya sure are keepin' this interesting.
Lei Heng Some kinda trick to bring me down to y'all's level, huh?
Lei Heng Now that's mighty unfair. Though, when the goin' gets tough, I get ya gotta do what ya gotta do.
Lei Heng Awrighty then. Let's keep this rollin'.
Hong Lu ... So, have you decided what you want to do, Dante?
Dante <Yeah. >
Dante <Time for round two.>
Episode: 54
Location: Bridge to Tiekan Temple
Lei Heng More of a sprinter than a marathoner, eh...

Heathcliff encouraged us with his usual bluntness, but... it was true that determination was the only thing keeping some Sinners on their feet.

... we're stopped by this one man on a bridge between us and the Temple.
I thought I'd finally found a way to even things out by resonating with the Golden Bough, but...
... I just don't see how we can get past this wall.
Jia Qiu Do not kneel.
A low, deep voice boomed from behind us.
Lei Heng Well I'll be— Ya sure got here fast.
Lei Heng You coulda just taken yer sweet darn time, but you just had to get here now right as I was 'bout to finish 'em off, eh?
Lei Heng Ohhh~! I see now. Honey bunny didn't dig that hole for no reason, huh.

Jia Qiu For they are not the kind of people who must stagnate here.
Lei Heng That so?

Lei Heng Always wanted to kick yer behind. Ain't this a mighty fine place to do it?
Lei Heng Hot dang, I'm burnin' up...!
Despite Lei Heng's gung-ho provocations, Jia Qiu paid him no mind. He looked to Zilu, who was barely breathing. She was slumped against the wall.
Jia Qiu How long will you remain in slumber, Zilu?
Lei Heng She ain't gonna wake up anytime soon, friendo. I really cut 'er up good this time.
Lei Heng Why don't I put ya to rest right next to 'er?
Lei Heng's blade flashed with fire once again, and he charged like a lightning strike toward Jia Qiu.
But...
Jia Qiu's staff brought Lei Heng's blade to a screeching halt.
Hong Lu Brother...
Jia Qiu Go.
Jia Qiu Lei Heng's forces have already been alerted to the fact that Jia Xichun has already entered the Tiekan Temple.
Jia Qiu Thus... in that brief moment where Jia Xichun completes her ascension and exits the Tiekan Temple...
Jia Qiu ... they will attempt to cut off her head before she gains full control of the Hierarch's Heishou Pack.
Jia Qiu They will use the loophole that the ritual to become the Family Hierarch isn't truly over until she rises to the surface.
Jia Qiu Jia Xichun does not have any substantial foundation nor sponsor who protects her—no family will come to her aid; it is most likely that they are simply waiting for someone to kill her in their stead.
Jia Qiu However...
Jia Qiu One thing I can give you is that, once you enter, and until you exit the temple alongside Jia Xichun...
Jia Qiu ... not a single foe shall cross this bridge as long as I stand. Jia Xichun will survive this day.
Hong Lu And we will bring Xichun safely back to the surface and escort her to the seat of the Family Hierarch.
Jia Qiu Indeed. It will be a considerable undertaking for any family to strike down a Family Hierarch, even one without a foundation like Xichun.
Lin Daiyu ... If that is your will, then I will help as well.
Hong Lu Daiyu...? How did you...
Lei Heng What in the goshdarn... I thought the Xue family'd turned against Daguanyuan already.
Lin Daiyu ... Not all Xue has.
Lin Daiyu Miss Baochai has sent me in secret to assist you.
Hong Lu …….
Lin Daiyu I have not come to discuss or pursue a lofty goal like... the future of Daguanyuan.
Lin Daiyu I only wish that— ... Neither I nor Miss Baochai wish to see you fall here.
Lin Daiyu ... That is all.
Jia Qiu ... Then stand with me.
Jia Qiu Stand with me against the tide and defeat any foe that has made it through.
Lin Daiyu Gladly.
Hong Lu ... Thank you, Daiyu.
Outis …!
Outis Over there, soldiers...! A different force is marching toward the temple.
Lei Heng You knew darn well that this was only a matter of time.
Lei Heng If y'all think ya got what it takes, just try 'n stop us. Lessee if y'all can live up to your boasts.
Jia Qiu Go forth, Jia Baoyu.
Jia Qiu I have faith that your heart is true.
Episode: 55
Location: Tiekan Temple Entrance
With them defending the bridge, we managed to reach Tiekan Temple's entrance...
... only to find the last people we ever wanted to see waiting at its gates.
Dante <N Corp.... And their troops, all of them wearing E.G.O Gear...>
It almost looks like they came here ready for a war.
Jia Huan It has happened exactly as the Director said so herself, Gubo.
Yi Sang … Goodness.
Gubo What brings you such distress, my wilted and fallen, old fellow?
Gubo It would have been no trouble for someone of your intelligence to surmise that we would be waiting where your journey ends.
Gubo Or... has your love for the company of these new fellows slowed your mind?
Yi Sang The path I walk is a busy one.
Yi Sang ... And I have no words or sentiments to impart to someone such as yourself, when a dear fellow of mine requires my support and haste.
Gubo ... Huh.
Gubo opened his mouth to say something in response, but Yi Sang swiftly brushed past him without hesitation.
And...
Jia Huan You certainly took your time, little brother.
Gregor What's he...?
Jia Huan Just waiting out here to greet you and your friends.
Jia Huan Do not glare at me so—you need only accept our offer, and we shan't have to fight.
Jia Huan A... temporary truce, if you will.
Ishmael ... Seriously, a truce? Here and now?
Jia Huan It so happens that we have business to see to in there.
Jia Huan ... And Jia Baoyu... you're our only key.
Jia Huan You must've come here in search of the Golden Bough, as you always are.

Sinclair And you just expect us to believe—

Jia Huan We thought coming in third would be more than enough to procure what we came for.

Jia Huan I have not once lived for this family since the day I changed my name.

Gregor We're not, but... do we have any alternatives? He's already stalled us enough.
Sinclair He's right, we're the ones running out of time...
Sinclair Jia Qiu is strong, really strong, but... not even he can stop all those soldiers on his own forever.
I'm growing anxious.
He says he's willing to leave us alone once he gets what he wants, but... there's no way for us to be sure of that.
But it's hardly a good idea to fight them now or remain locked in this standoff for who knows how long.
Dante <If this fight is inevitable... it's better to enter a truce with them for now, find Xichun, and then fight them if we must.>
Besides, Hong Lu said Xichun might be in danger. I had to prioritize that, no matter what.
Dante <... It can't be helped. Let's head inside.>
So I made the call.
Hong Lu Okay, let's try your idea.

And we...

Hong Lu approached the gate handles.

Hong Lu It's so that I can visit the elders whenever they want me there.

Jia Huan I wanna play a Bolus making game!
Jia Huan Gather a bunch of sand, and pebbles, and leaves, and seed to make a Bolus, and the best Bolus wins!
Joy.
Hong Lu
Hong Lu Huan always liked to follow me around. He probably wanted grandmother to recognize him.
Hong Lu Huan always had this... dream, even as a little boy.
Hong Lu He wanted to be one of the top Bolus makers in the City.
Jia Huan Bro...ther... I'm... sorry... I should've listened... to you...
Jia Huan But I was just so… envious… I just wanted to know… what they were gonna show here...
…….
Hong Lu Maybe he really could have achieved that.
Jia Mu Come, little Baoyu. It is time for you to visit the elders.
Sorrow.
Hong Lu
Hong Lu They were always so kind to me, the elders. But I wanted to play with Daiyu instead.
Hong Lu With time, I stopped being so afraid of them. But...
Hong Lu ... they always speak as though they know every little thing about me.
Hong Lu My only use is to be a window, an amusement for the elders in their long, tedious lives.
Hong Lu I don't need to talk much. I only need to see as many interesting things as possible and wear a pleasant smile for them.
Xiren It cannot be helped, young master.
Xiren The prudent option would be to witness it all in silence.
…….
Hong Lu I wish Xiren could be back to her old self again.
Hong Lu But I know that can't happen. So I smiled.
Jia Xichun Play with me, big bro.
Jia Xichun This room's tooooo big for just Xichun.
Jia Xichun You... never should have said that. To me.
Jia Xichun ... I won't be visiting you ever, ever again.
Wrath.
Hong Lu
Hong Lu Xichun was once a child who found happiness in the smallest things. A child who used to like playing with me.
Hong Lu But once she gets older, she'll be like every other child in Daguanyuan.
Hong Lu She will resent me, envy me, and try to kill anyone else who's shooting for the seat of the Family Hierarch.
Hong Lu But... I hoped that she wouldn't come to hate me. So once again, I smiled.
Xue Pan I... I didn't have to die yesterday... I didn't have to die yesterday if you'd just helped me.
Xue Pan Do you have any idea how much it hurts when they chop off your neck? It hurts. It really, really hurts, but you can't even scream.
Xue Pan ... I wish for nothing but the worst sufferings in what's left of your miserable life.
…….
Hong Lu Xue Pan never wanted to fight. He was a pacifist with a soft heart that could easily be brought to tears.
Hong Lu But after a few deaths, his every word became a stabbing thorn.
Hong Lu And he gladly impales me with them as he curses me. And I end up hoping that everything that he curses me with comes true.
Hong Lu So I smiled again.
Xue Baochai Baoyu, Grandma and Mother tell me that there are no other women in Daguanyuan who can possibly hope to match up to you... other than me.
Xue Baochai Let's live the happiest life we can together, okay? We'll see only the pleasant sights, eat only the best food out there, and enjoy the beautiful luxuries life has to offer. Aren't you excited?
…….
Hong Lu Baochai loved me, but what she loved was not a person—only the light that I radiate.
Hong Lu Just as I loved her fragrance.
Hong Lu Letting the will of Daguanyuan carry me away would have had me wed big sis Baochai.
Hong Lu But this feeling she spoke of, this excitement, was nothing more than a heavy, cumbersome accessory.
Hong Lu It was unwieldly, and it was much more than what I deserved. So I smiled.
Lin Daiyu So now you'd rather isolate yourself in this room?
Lin Daiyu I don't know what to do anymore. Whenever I see your smile, I...
Lin Daiyu I find myself drawn to it… before I become so hateful of it that I never want to see it again.
…….
Hong Lu Daiyu will now hate me for the rest of her life, just as everyone else in Daguanyuan does.
Hong Lu So it's better that I shut myself off in my room.
Hong Lu She could have left me then, but she chose to remain by my side.
Hong Lu Maybe it wasn't a choice at all. Maybe she was bound to me.
Hong Lu It's my fault that she has nowhere else to go.
Hong Lu So the only thing I could show her in response was...
Location: Tiekan Temple Interior
Jia Mu Your only duty is to witness.
Jia Mu That is all you are, that is all you will ever be capable of. You know this better than anyone else.
Yi Sang ... Hong Lu, your smile has changed not once. Then or now.
Yi Sang But we have come to know that your smile is more than a shell.
Yi Sang I know that it is the same smile that brought me to the past, the same smile that I thought resembled Brother Young-ji's.
Yi Sang Thus... I know your distant yet true heart, Hong Lu.
Yi Sang There was aught you had felt from us, was there not?
Location: -1
Hong Lu Solitude. Steadfast. Lingering. So bitter, yet... so intolerably exhausted...
Hong Lu Loneliness. Regret. Anticipation. The castle of ice was so lonely and cold, despite your smile...
Hong Lu Conflict. Anguish. Courage. But there was a desperate resolve to overcome it all nonetheless...
Hong Lu Longing. Melancholy. Warmth. The wings unfurled were so blinding, so brilliant...
Hong Lu Passion. Adventure. Ferocity. The journey, finally in search of a destination, found liberation...
Hong Lu Futility. Determination. Love. The declaration was beautiful, though to whom I could not know...
Hong Lu Exhilaration. Tragedy. Excitement. I learned how beautiful and incandescent the light of a continuing dream could be.
Location: Tiekan Temple Interior
Hong Lu But I also know that they're just fleeting things, destined to be lost to time.
Hong Lu As all things return to dust, so will these emotions, no matter how hotly they once burned.
Hong Lu I'm not like the rest of you.
Hong Lu I don't want to change anything. I don't want to achieve anything, either.
Hong Lu So I just watch... with a smile, a perpetual smile.
Dante <You don't have to want to achieve anything.>
Dante <But as long as you're on this bus with the rest of us, things will keep happening, both good and bad.>
Dante <Something's probably going to blow Heathcliff's fuse again.>
Dante <You'll see the Sinners, your friends, get killed again.>
Dante <We'll fail again, too. The kind of failure that leaves us with nothing. The kind of failure that leaves us stagnant.>
Dante <But...>
Dante <Among those inevitabilities, think about the other things that are sure to happen.>
Location: -1
Dante <You're going to miss the days you went out kiting.
Dante And when Don Quixote starts to regale us with yet another one of her tales of adventure, you're going to join in to indulge her.>
Dante <You know for sure that you'll be listening to Rodya heap praises about her favorite food whenever we get the chance to try them.>
Dante <You're going to suddenly realize that the scenery past the bus windows have changed, and that they've become beautiful for once.>
Dante <You're going to feel your heart swell for no reason, when you listen to the Sinners laugh and giggle behind you.>
Dante <You know how I know this?>
Dante <Because I'm talking about myself here.>
Dante <These moments in time… they’re what I use to fill the void my memories left behind.>
Location: Tiekan Temple Interior
Hong Lu ... How can you... and everyone... bring yourselves to care about anything, knowing that it always has an end?
Dante <One end... or, at least what we thought would be the end...>
Dante <... was always just the starting line for something new.>
Dante <Each finish line was just another arbitrary mark, another step in our journey, right?>
Dante <And it's those little steps that... keep us going.>
Dante <And hey, Hong Lu... you're not stagnating. You're changing, too.>
Dante <Tell me. Why did you decide to go with Jia Qiu's plan?>
Hong Lu It wasn't about the war, the Golden Bough, or... Daguanyuan.
Hong Lu The first thing that came to mind was...
Hong Lu was...
Hong Lu ... that I wanted Xichun to genuinely smile again.

Dante <In ways you hadn’t seen.>
Hong Lu I thought I’d already let these fragments of my heart float away from me.
Hong Lu After all, all of existence is but a passing dream, destined to return to emptiness…

Faust Before your onboarding, you may present a name or an alias of your choosing that others should address you by.
Faust Will you use your name, Jia Baoyu?
Jia Baoyu Um...
Jia Baoyu No.
Hong Lu Hong Lu. I want to be Hong Lu.
Location: -1
Hong Lu But now, I realize that they’ve been buried here all along.
Hong Lu They weren’t lost... I'd only forgotten about them. That’s why I felt like my heart was trapped.

Dante <But at the end of the day... only you can save yourself.>
Hong Lu Oh, I thought the kite had floated away, never to be found again.
Hong Lu But it was still here.
Location: Tiekan Temple Interior
Hong Lu Every meeting is a promise of a goodbye…
Hong Lu And the loveliness of fresh blossoms only sharpens the pain of wilting.
Hong Lu But...
Dante <But the world you witness will always be beautiful.>
Dante <Because you are a kind person, Hong Lu. Kinder than anyone else.>
Dante <So, your world must be painted in the fairest color of jade.>
Hong Lu ... if those petals refuse to surrender and live on in the brief moments they are given,
Hong Lu despite knowing that they will eventually scatter to the winds…
Dante <Then, show them the petals you’ve gathered.>
Location: Tiekan Temple Interior
Hong Lu You, grandmother, and the elders have always been caged by your desperate search for immortality.
Hong Lu Searching for ways to perpetuate your existence, searching day and night for new ways to be freed from death.
Hong Lu But grandmother, have you ever freed yourself from that very suffering, even for a moment?
Jia Mu ... I cannot allow myself to be attached to such moments of insignificance.
Jia Mu They are but foolish human afflictions, a waste of intellect.
Hong Lu Every emotion is such a fleeting thing, mere sparks in moments that will be lost in time.
Hong Lu Maybe it really is foolish to be so attached to them.
Hong Lu But an eternity of existence without them is... an eternity of emptiness.
Hong Lu To exist is to live in the culmination of moments, after all.
Hong Lu Happiness, pain... they all scatter away as fast as they arrive, but I would rather be honest to those feelings.
Hong Lu I will do more than just witness them. I want to reach out and let my swelling emotions run wild.
Hong Lu In happiness, in wrath, in sorrow, and in joy... I would still cast my life into the vast world.
Hong Lu And that... is how I will find an eternity in a glimpse.
Jia Mu But there is so much left for us to accomplish…
Jia Mu Without us, Daguanyuan will… Hongyuan will…
Hong Lu No, Hongyuan will be okay.
Hong Lu Because it'll be its people that bring change to Hongyuan, not the Family Hierarch.
Jia Mu Such... such insolence...! Stupid, thankless child...! You... you will do no such... no such thing...!
Hong Lu Maybe I can't. It's just my opinion, after all.
Hong Lu So... with that, I leave you here to enjoy the immortality you so desired, grandmother. Dear elders.
Hong Lu You’ll have all the time in the world to watch as I live my tomorrows.
Location: -1
Hong Lu May the rest of your lives be long and unending.
Episode: 58
Location: Tiekan Temple Interior, Recent Past
We quickly made our way outside as the flooding Tiekan Temple turned into a lake.
Jia Huan Dammit, it must've been swept away by the cascade! It must be here somewhere, find it!
Gubo ... Here! Drat, the precious specimen...!
... I briefly turn to see Gubo wading through the cascading flood, searching frantically amid the rising waters. Jia Huan, meanwhile, stands gazing toward the hall… before quietly making his way to the center of the Tiekan Temple.
Jia Huan …….
Then, all of a sudden, Jia Huan raises his blade... then stabs it into the center of the Tiekan Temple...
... and the sceneries that the Xianren have been peeping at begin to grow delayed, fuzzy, and warped.
Jia Huan ... Hah.
Jia Huan Let's get out of here for now...
The "Xianren", swept off their pedestals by the powerful flow of water, crawl pathetically toward the door as Jia Huan shoots them a contemptuous glare and escapes the chamber. Gubo follows, not far behind him.
Location: Tiekan Temple Entrance
... But we still didn't have anything to break through the defensive field put up by their E.G.O gear.
Jia Huan Tsk... you never have anything more than empty platitudes to convey...
Gubo So this is the true form of the Xianhuang Worm... We were supposed to capture it alive.
Gubo Well... it can't be helped. Even half dead, it is extremely close to the form of the pure human she seeks. This specimen will still be of use to us.
Jia Huan Don't be too vexed, old-timers. At least it's the rightful heir of the family that's taking the Xianhuang Worm.
Location: Way Down to Tiekan Temple
Jia Huan Hold on, Gubo. Was that also an ability of that E.G.O?
Gubo ... This is technically not my area of expertise. I had only made an educated guess from context clues that this E.G.O would allow for such a usage... and my guess simply happened to be true.
Gubo I thought we were the ones who had a direct hand in choosing these E.G.O, but... perhaps we were actually guided to 'choose' the appropriate ones for ourselves.
Gubo Mm. It seems that the other team has secured our escape route.
Jia Huan ... The newcomer's team? One led by the former Chief Butler? Hmph, she's competent, I'll give her that.
Location: -1
A ripple radiates from the clear, jade-blue lake...
Location: Tiekan Temple Exterior
... until stillness comes.
Tiekan Temple reflects clearly on its surface.
The initial sense of oppressiveness was replaced by... peace.
Ishmael ... Looks like Tiekan Temple's been completely cut off from the rest of the world.
Dante <... I guess no one's ever getting in or out of there again.>
Hong Lu The people in there... they won't hold any sway on Xichun or any subsequent Family Hierarchs to come.
Hong Lu So... now they have an opportunity to really bring about change to Hongyuan. If they can utilize it.
Ishmael No one'll ever know what... happens in there. No one'll be able to help them if something were to happen, either.
Meursault It is likely that the sole nutrient supplier for them was the Family Hierarch. Their deaths will be very slow.
Ryoshu Puff... just like a gu poison jar. Ultimate solitude.
Besides, all they'll ever get to witness in their last moments is the blurred, barely-recognizable, and heavily delayed display. It's gotta be pretty infuriating.
Jia Xichun Big bro...
Jia Xichun What'll happen to me once we leave here?
Jia Xichun I couldn't do anything in there but shudder with fear. Do I... even deserve to rule over Hongyuan and its families?
Hong Lu Here's what I think, Xichun.
Hong Lu I think the people who most deserve to be the Family Hierarch...
Hong Lu ... are the people who are afraid of becoming one.
Jia Xichun ... You think so?
Jia Xichun Well... if you say so, I'll try to convince myself of that, too.
Hong Lu Let's leave this place, now.
... Unlike the lake overlooking Tiekan Temple, however, what greeted us outside was far from peaceful.
Location: Bridge to Tiekan Temple
The view outside had become even more gruesome.
Jia Qiu The promised Chen hour is come.
In midst of striking up a storm with his staff, Jia Qiu notices us—and gives us a barely perceivable look of relief.
Jia Qiu You've done it, little brother.
Surrounding him were piles of dead and heavily wounded bodies...
He was covered in so many cuts, bruises, and bloodstains that I couldn't even tell if all that blood came from him, or from those around him, or how many people bled on him.
Lin Daiyu Bao...yu...
Lin Daiyu I'm... so glad...
Behind him stood Daiyu, looking terribly exhausted.
They've been guarding this entrance against this endless stream of enemies this whole time, to keep their word.
Lei Heng ... Hah.
The only ones still engaged in battle were Jia Qiu and Lei Heng.
Lei Heng Dangit. Shit's fucked, ain't it?
Lei Heng I'm all outta gas... my boys are dead as shit... and now that y'alls got yourselves twelve fresh fellers... I reckon I don't got that many options left...
Lei Heng And when y'all get the girl to the seat... them yaller dogs out there'll pack up 'n go home 'n pretend none 'o this ever happened.
Lei Heng looks at us despondently, panting with fatigue.
Lei Heng Awright, lemme be straight with y'all. Any way I get to walk outta here alive?
He begs for his life in an impressively self-assured manner.
Jia Qiu …….
Of course, Jia Qiu had no reason to accept this request.
But...
Instead of rebuking Lei Heng, he slams the ground with his staff with a heavy boom before addressing him.
Jia Qiu ... Very well, Tiantui Star, the Winged Tiger Chachihu. Then I will make you the same offer you gave Tianjiu Star, the Unrestrained Meizhelan. Take a singular hit.
Lei Heng I ain't even worth unwrappin' that staff of yours, am I?
Lei Heng let out a hollow laugh, then produced a cigar from his pocket.
Lei Heng Hold your horses, be done in a jiffy.
He bit one end of it off, then...
Slowly, carefully lit the cigar in an almost ritualistic reverence.
Lei Heng ... Hit me.
Jia Qiu lifted the staff and placed it lightly on Lei Heng's right shoulder.
Jia Qiu …….
Warm rings of light materialize around the staff...
... until there were five of them.
Dante <…….>
Lei Heng I see... Five Mangs(五望) of the Tiangang Star...
Lei Heng Puff... Ain't that a real motherfu—
The staff gently slid across Lei Heng's shoulder even before he got to finish his sentence...
... and his head exploded into chunks of meat, then rained down in tatters like fireworks.
Kong Qiu ... He would rather call me by the star's name, hm. Yet my name is Kong Qiu.
Ryoshu Puff... the Pinky.
Ryoshu Omnipresent yet unknown to each other...
... Everyone fell silent for a moment.
Kong Qiu ... We have no time to waste on ruminations.
Kong Qiu Our task is not over until she ascends to the seat of the Family Hierarch and seizes the Heishou Packs' leash.
Jia Qiu's resolute voice woke us from that stunned silence, and...
... with him at the vanguard, one by one, we routed the forces that still sought to stop the new Hierarch from assuming the responsibility.
It was no easy task, but...
Hong Lu …….
... Hong Lu appeared more unburdened than ever, so...
... I was pretty happy.
... A few days later...
Location: Daguanyuan Front Gates

Wei Indeed I will. There is much work to be done.

Wei But you have broken one of many cycles here; I am certain that Hongyuan will become a better place to live under my ladyship's rule.

Zigong Ah, whichever was the case... What will you do next, my lord?
Kong Qiu ... Today, I observed that the Pinky has strayed from the path of humanity. Thus, I will now join Yan Hui, journey to Mount Liang, and come to a few agreements with the Mohists.
