Kong Qiu Indeed we must. Then we shall journey to Q Corp. next.
Dante <The Pinky?>
Faust Yes. ... It seems that Kong Qiu's allegiance lies with the Pinky.
Kong Qiu Indeed. As one of the Pinky, I intend to change the world with the Way of true humanity.
Sinclair Given what Ryōshū said...
Sinclair Lei Heng and Zilu are both from the Pinky, right...? So how come they were trying to kill each other?
Faust Members of the Pinky gather and scatter when certain conditions are met. However, when there is no call...
Ryoshu ... they just live their lives without knowing which is which. No call, no solidarity.
Ryoshu P.O.S.
Sinclair Playing on Solo-mode... right?
Faust It seemed that Zilu and Lei Heng were aware of each other's identities, but did not know about Kong Qiu.
Zigong You know this well. I hear that you are the primary purveyor of esoteric knowledge in your group?
Faust …….
Zigong Then, you must also be aware of the weight of information regarding our, and our lord's allegiance to the Pinky is rather heavy.
Zigong I trust that you will maintain your silence regarding the matter, as it is right to do so.
Kong Qiu I have aught to ask you.
Kong Qiu approached me as the other people were starting to scatter.
At first, I looked away because I couldn't imagine that he could possibly be talking to me.
Kong Qiu Dante, the manager.
Kong Qiu Will you continue to push to open their paths...
Kong Qiu ... for every Sinner under your management, no matter which road they walk?
Kong Qiu As you have done for my brother?
I nodded.
Kong Qiu Even if one of them seeks to walk the path of Asura?
Kong Qiu's gaze briefly lingered on one of the Sinners before moving on.
The Sinner takes a long draw from the cigarette and releases the smoke with a large sigh, which then turns into a scattering plume. Her hand rests, out of habit, on her never-drawn sword.
I'm going to keep helping them as long as they have the will to move forward, no matter what. My thoughts on that matter haven't changed at all. They never will.
I nodded once again.
Kong Qiu ... I see.
Zigong ... Ah. My lord, I have another subject to discuss. While this is but a conjecture at the moment... evidence seems to point to Jia Yuanchun being among the treasonous forces of Hongyuan, in cahoots with the Xue and the Shi families.
Kong Qiu While this suspicion is yet to be developed beyond supposition, it seemed likely that Jia Yuanchun had aligned herself with the treasonous forces of Hongyuan.
Kong Qiu She made herself scarce as soon as the troubles were quelled, which could mean... yes.
Zigong The first thread to find is the influential individual within the Shi family who ordered Shi Yihua's execution. Once their identity is determined, it should be no trouble making the connection to the masterminds behind this incident.
Hong Lu Will you continue to roam the lands, brother?
Kong Qiu Indeed I will.
Kong Qiu I will walk the City, converse with the lords of each Nest.
He gives a muted reply to Hong Lu before turning around to look at Jia Xichun.
Kong Qiu ... None may say for certain if Jia Xichun, over her long tenure to come, shall not be tempted by promises of immortality.
Jia Xichun Ugh... seriously?! I'm—
Kong Qiu Yet, if one's heart truly lies steady upon the path of humanity, they will not be swayed to commit evil...
Kong Qiu ... thus, I believe that you are worth watching.
Kong Qiu Upon our next meeting...
Kong Qiu Hm, though I cannot say for certain whether our goals shall be aligned then as they were today, but...
Kong Qiu ... I suppose we shall have much to take in from each other.
Kong Qiu What are your thoughts, Zigong?
Kong Qiu Did you enjoy this lesson as well?
Zigong Yes... I was... foolish, my lord. Once again.
Kong Qiu It is all right.
Kong Qiu Learning and understanding must go hand-in-hand, as I always say.
Kong Qiu You are a student worthy of discourse still.
Zigong ... I have much to learn.
Zigong It seems that you weren't repeatedly recounting that story over and over at me again for nothing.
Zigong You were trying to insinuate that he was the only one in Hongyuan who was worthy of faith...
Kong Qiu ... Zigong, Zilu, let us converse in private for a moment, for I have an important task for you...
Location: Daguanyuan Gardens
Xiren …….
Xiren's expression that regarded us was the same as it always was.
Hong Lu Your nu'er tea is always so delicious.
Hong Lu Thanks, Xiren.
Xiren Yes, young master.
Hong Lu …….
Hong Lu I will be departing again soon. I don't know when I should return.
Xiren Understood.
Hong Lu ... Stay safe until then.
Hong Lu A-actually, no.
Hong Lu What do you think, Xiren? About the fact that I'll be leaving soon.
Xiren …….
Xiren Walk the path of your choosing, young master. Whichever that may be.
Her reply sounded as cold as ever, to the point that the now lukewarm, clacking tea cups on her clean-up tray sounded warmer...
Hong Lu Alright.
... but Hong Lu smiled as though something had been lifted from his heart, as though he found something he'd been looking for.
Location: Daguanyuan Pavilion
Lin Daiyu Even the opulence of Daguanyuan fades.
Lin Daiyu The trees are wilting... as the once beautiful pavilions and towers now lay in ruins and abandonment.
Lin Daiyu It seems that all of existence is, indeed, but a great cycle of rises and falls.
Hong Lu It is.
Hong Lu But isn't that...
Hong Lu ... exactly why every moment in life is so beautiful?
Lin Daiyu ... Yes, yes it is.
Lin Daiyu …….
Lin Daiyu I will no longer wait for you.
Lin Daiyu And I might one day disappear from Daguanyuan myself, now that I know that idle waiting is not the sole answer.
Hong Lu …….
Hong Lu Daiyu, I loved that day when we went out kiting together.
Hong Lu That was my favorite game.
Lin Daiyu ... And mine as well.
Location: -1
Hong Lu leaves Daguanyuan as the happiest descendant it has ever produced.
Finding meaning in every moment of his life...
No longer a passive witness to tragedy, as he once was to the deaths and suffering of his siblings,
Hong Lu will walk tall with his friends.
Yet even that will one day fade. For in the end, we have but one chance at life, and to live at all is to exist in futility.
His home, too, shall one day be taken by loneliness and solitude, gradually eroding away with time...
and we will all one day go our separate ways.
But every wilting fertilizes the next blossom, every fallen home may become a place for new beginnings, and every goodbye is a promise of new meetings.
Thus Jia Baoyu, once the peerless treasure of Daguanyuan...
... boards the bus once again as Hong Lu.
The clouds I once saw in his jade-eye had all but withdrawn.
I only see an incandescent, radiant smile.
Location: Daguanyuan Pavilion
Jia Xichun Well...
Jia Xichun I guess it's a bit of a shame to just let you guys go like this.
Jia Xichun But I tried to make our farewell a memorable one. Made sure you got the best of the best food we had to offer, to commemorate the day I took office...
Rodion Mffh, I mew Xichewwn's ze bescht~!
Ishmael Just how are you still finding all that leftover food? Everyone's already left the banquet.
Rodion Cam't washte gooh fooh~!
Gregor 'Course... Uh, hey... is the bus not starting or something?
Sinclair Yeah... wait, where are we headed to, anyway?
Heathcliff How should we know, lad? Guide's gonna tell us soon anyway.
Heathcliff Uh... hang on, where'd that bloke go?
Saude Hi, I'm subbing in for him today~
Rodion Huh? We could've switched out our guide all along? Well, why didn't we get Saude to—
Saude No, that's not— that's not how it works... ha ha.
Saude It's just that you have some unfinished business here.
Saude For your information, the Red Gaze is currently away because he's accompanying Pilot on a mission elsewhere. More urgent LCCB business~
Yi Sang What misery it is to be him...
Yi Sang ...? Ah, I did not mean to insinuate that Pilot would be the source of his misery.
Jia Xichun You have more business here at Daguanyuan...?
Saude Oh yes, we do.
Saude Very, very important business, in fact.
Jia Xichun ... Why are you looking at me like that? What is it this time?
Saude So, you know how Miss Jia Xichun, a very important and friendly ally of ours, has become the de facto leader of a Wing?
Outis ... Oho?
Outis You're a crafty one, aren't you?
Saude Oh, of course~ Veterans like me tend to pick up a thing or two after some experience in the field.
Outis Ha ha! Very well, this more than makes up for your subordinate's blunder from last time!
Saude Aww~ I knew you'd be the first to pick up what I'm putting down! We both know what's the best for our company~
Jia Xichun Okay, now I'm starting to get really creeped out... why are you both looking at me like that...?
Ishmael ... Oh.
Ishmael I see how it is. Even the biggest catch of the day'll just rot in the shed if you don't bother to fillet it, right?
Saude Alright, I'd like to have everyone's attention for the LCB's next mission.
Jia Xichun ... Wait, just wait a damn second. Do you need me here for this?
Saude Miss Jia Xichun, as you've quickly become one of our most precious human resources, as the Family Hierarch...
Saude ... we're going to give you a total makeover training!
Jia Xichun …? ?? ?!?
Saude Ah, we can't spend too much time on the training, though. So we're gonna have to fast-track this.
Jia Xichun Y-you dare?! I'll have you know, I'm still the—
Wei I am very much in agreement that there is much you must learn to be an effective Family Hierarch of Hongyuan.
Wei To further solidify your base within Daguanyuan... Ahem, ahem.
Outis Then we should get right to it.
Outis Meursault! You seem to be well-versed in the art of physical fitness.
Meursault Your intent has been understood, but it is up to the manager to command me.
Dante <... Well. I don't see why not.>
Meursault Then it will be done.
Jia Xichun Huh?! Hey, put me down!
Outis The first order of business is to improve your fitness level! Now, on my count—
Jia Xichun Y-y-yo-you bastards...! Would it kill you to go a single second without ruining my day?!!!
Jia Xichun You're all like a family of bedbugs I can't get rid of, you know that?!!! I'm gonna make you throw up everything you ate today, you assholes!!!
Location: -1
- FIN -
Location: ???
Xue Baochai I-it's so dark...
??? We have brought her here, my lord.
Jia Yuanchun I wish to be left alone with her. Leave us.
??? Your wish is my command.
Xue Baochai S-so, big sister Yuanchun...? Why did you...?
Jia Yuanchun You appear troubled.
Jia Yuanchun It is no wonder to me that you are, for you have betrayed your own Xue family.
Xue Baochai H-how did you...?!
Xue Baochai I... didn't think anyone would notice in all that chaos...
Jia Yuanchun Ha ha ha ha!
Jia Yuanchun Baochai, oh dear Baochai, my poor child.
Jia Yuanchun Can you hide from a black kite by blocking out the sky with your palms? Can tiptoeing hide your footsteps from earthwyrms?
Xue Baochai ... N-no, big sis Yuanchun... If my parents were to find out...
Xue Baochai Wait, do they... do they already know?
Jia Yuanchun Wouldn't you like to know?
Xue Baochai …….
Jia Yuanchun If not, I have ways to make sure that they don't know.
Jia Yuanchun Not even your parents... hm, no. I can make this story...
Jia Yuanchun ... stay between just you and I in this vast Daguanyuan.
Xue Baochai W-what do you want from me...?
Jia Yuanchun Fuhu... that is the wrong line of thinking, little Baochai.
Jia Yuanchun I only... wish to help you achieve your desires.
Jia Yuanchun Your betrayal wasn't to make an enemy of your own Xue family, I understand.
Jia Yuanchun It was for Baoyu. Someone you were afraid would never return.
Xue Baochai ... Your gaze is so penetrating, so piercing that... I feel so naked, even in the dark.
Xue Baochai Will... Baoyu never come back to me?
Jia Yuanchun Baochai, it is pointless to ask whether he will or will not return.
Jia Yuanchun Why seek the sway of currents, when you can simply make him return?
Xue Baochai B-but how...?
Jia Yuanchun Come closer to me.
Jia Yuanchun The night is long, and we have much to confer.
